quotes.quote: I don't think I've ever met nachos that I didn't like before. It's almost inconceivable that nachos can be bad. It makes no sense.
quotes.author: Pete Wells

quotes.quote: I find it almost comforting to count calories, because it makes me conscious of what I'm eating. But on Super Bowl Sunday, I thought, Surrender to it. It's nacho time. Then I ate nothing but Doritos all day.
quotes.author: Kristen Bell

quotes.quote: I have my once a month nachos, but it's soy cheese and turkey chili on it, so it's somewhat safe. But it's still a big vice for me, because I have a big bowl of it.
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.quote: He was chugging brown pop from a can Jack had handed him while he stuffed nacho cheese Doritos in his face. I was glad to see he looked lots better, almost completely like himself, which proves Doritos and brown pop really are health foods.
quotes.author: P. C. Cast

quotes.quote: We've all invested emotionally in nachos.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: A small pepperoni pizza on a tortilla is healthier than salmon teriyaki with rice and carrots.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Tacos are the perfect food.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.quote: Life is a nacho. It can be yummy-crunchy or squishy-yucky. It just depends on how long it takes for you to start eating it.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Everybody loves something, even if it's only tortillas.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: A woman is helpless only when her nail polish is drying.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nail polish is like the icing on the beauty cake.
quotes.author: Mary Helen Bowers

quotes.quote: Nothing improves your mood like a new manicure.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is not just nail art. It is ART.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There were two kinds of women: those who wear nail polish and those who don't. Which do you prefer?
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: Life just wouldn't be the same if we didn't have nail polish.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Great nails don't happen by chance they happen by appointment.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You can't buy happiness, but you can buy nail polish and that's kind the same thing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When life gets tough there's always nail polish.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When life gives you nail polishes, make nail art.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nude nail polish wins hands down over intricate nail art.
quotes.author: Ashley Madekwe

quotes.quote: Nail polish speaks louder than words.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Life is too short to wear boring nail polish.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Happiness is freshly painted nails.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A man who was completely innocent, offered himself as a sacrifice for the good of others, including his enemies, and became the ransom of the world. It was a perfect act.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There are no innocents. There are, however, different degrees of responsibility.
quotes.author: Stieg Larsson

quotes.quote: One of the most predictable things in life is there will be change. You are better off if you can have a say in the change. But you are ignorant or naive if you don't think there will be change, whether you want it to or not.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.quote: The essential self is innocent, and when it tastes its own innocence knows that it lives for ever.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Too many people get lost in the game of having a good time and being naive about things.
quotes.author: Steve Brown

quotes.quote: An advantage of being naive is being able to believe in oneself when no one else will.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: Only the most naive of questions are truly serious.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Nothing is to be gained by arguing with fools. Nothing can be gained by reasoning with ignorant people.
quotes.author: T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: In all our lives, there is a fall from innocence. A time after which, we are never the same.
quotes.author: Gordie LaChance

quotes.quote: Every true genius is bound to be naive.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: It is well for the heart to be naive and the mind not to be.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: It's easy to be a naive idealist. It's easy to be a cynical realist. It's quite another thing to have no illusions and still hold the inner flame.
quotes.author: Marie-Louise von Franz

quotes.quote: There is a naive belief that injustice only had to be pointed out in order to be cured.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: From naive simplicity we arrive at more profound simplicity.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: All things truly wicked start from innocence.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: We are all exceptional cases. We all want to appeal against something! Each of us insists on being innocent at all cost, even if he has to accuse the whole human race and heaven itself.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Naive you are if you believe life favours those who aren't naive.
quotes.author: Piet Hein

quotes.quote: Innocence is like a dumb leper who has lost his bell, wandering the world, meaning no harm.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: No human being is innocent, but there is a class of innocent human actions called games.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Innocence is always unsuspicious.
quotes.author: Thomas C. Haliburton

quotes.quote: One may appear naive or illogical but it's not naivete or being illogical. It arises from one's faith.
quotes.author: Anita David

quotes.quote: People are naive about such things, and they would rather write them off as evil than attempt to understand them. An unfortunate truth, but a truth nonetheless.
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.quote: A naive man is nothing better than a fool. But you women contrive to be naive in such a way that in you it seems sweet, and gentle, and proper, and not as silly as it really is.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: The purely natural we describe as 'naive' insofar as it is morally pleasing. Naive subjects, therefore, are the domains of art that should be a moral expression of what is natural.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: What is naive, being natural, is cognate to reality. Reality, devoid of any moral spect, is what we term common.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: He who does not open his eyes must open his purse.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: It is better than ten guilty persons escape than one innocent suffer.
quotes.author: Sir William Blackstone

quotes.quote: Gullibility and credulity are considered undesirable qualities in every department of human life—except religion
quotes.author: Hitchens

quotes.quote: Your noblest natures are most credulous.
quotes.author: Chapman

quotes.quote: My wife was afraid of the dark... then she saw me naked and now she's afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: I can be shy, but I'm not shy with my body. Everyone is naked under their clothes - so what?
quotes.author: Cameron Richardson

quotes.quote: Beware of the naked man who offers you his shirt.
quotes.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quotes.quote: We are all born naked into this world, but each of us is fully clothed in potential.
quotes.author: Emmitt Smith

quotes.quote: Man’s naked form belongs to no particular moment in history; it is eternal, and can be looked upon with joy by the people of all ages.
quotes.author: Auguste Rodin

quotes.quote: There are those who so dislike the nude that they find something indecent in the naked truth.
quotes.author: F. H. Bradley

quotes.quote: Once we are aware that our nudity makes us objects of desire, we become naked.
quotes.author: Chloe Thurlow

quotes.quote: What a frail, easily hurt, rather pathetic thing a human body is, naked; somehow a little unfinished, incomplete!
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence in society.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I don't trust people who don't love themselves and tell me, 'I love you.' ... There is an African saying which is: Be careful when a naked person offers you a shirt.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Your naked body should only belong to those who fall in love with your naked soul.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Even if you’ve taken off every stitch of clothing, you still have your secrets, your history, your true name. It’s hard to be really naked. You have to work hard at it. Just getting into a bath isn’t being naked, not really. It’s just showing skin.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: Eros will have naked bodies; Friendship naked personalities.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Hope is nature's veil for hiding truth's nakedness.
quotes.author: Alfred Nobel

quotes.quote: Nakedness reveals itself. Nudity is placed on display. The nude is condemned to never being naked. Nudity is a form of dress.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: Nakedness is uncomely, as well in mind as body, and it addeth no small reverence to men's manners and actions if they be not altogether open. Therefore set it down: That a habit of secrecy is both politic and moral.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: There are few nudities so objectionable as the naked truth.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: The naked intellect is an extraordinarily inaccurate instrument.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: The naked truth is always better than the best-dressed lie.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Reality is modest, it won't be seen naked.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Truth is a naked and open daylight, that doth not shew the masks and mummeries and triumphs of the world, half so stately and daintily as candlelights.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Only when the tide goes out do you discover who's been swimming naked.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: No real gentleman will tell the naked truth in the presence of ladies.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Craftiness must have clothes, but truth loves to go naked.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Two or three things I know for sure, and one is that I'd rather go naked than wear the coat the world has made for me.
quotes.author: Dorothy Allison

quotes.quote: Who knows what true loneliness is - not the conventional word but the naked terror? To the lonely themselves it wears a mask. The most miserable outcast hugs some memory or some illusion.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: How much has to be explored and discarded before reaching the naked flesh of feeling.
quotes.author: Claude Debussy

quotes.quote: Naked is the best disguise.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Naked and pure is the spirit that transcends the existence mediocre.
quotes.author: John Wilbanks

quotes.quote: The nakedness of the indigent world may be clothed from the trimmings of the vain.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: What do you mean you're leaving? You're a baby sitter. Baby sitters don't leave, they sit. Baby leavers leave.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: If I open my eyes just a little bit more / I can see Nanny's dressing-gown on the door; / It's a beautiful blue but it hasn't got a hood, / God bless Nanny and make her good.
quotes.author: Melanie Safka

quotes.quote: I done been through a lot and I can't never forget / All the women turned they back and they called it a quit / When my nanny died that shit hurt I was feeling so sick
quotes.author: KountUp

quotes.quote: Wanted a nanny for two adorable children / [Sung] / If you want this choice position / Have a cheery disposition / Rosy cheeks, no warts! / Play games, all sort
quotes.author: Richard Sherman

quotes.quote: What a pleasure it would be / Chatting so delightfully / Nanny bakes, fairy cakes / Every Sunday morning
quotes.author: Paul Mccartney

quotes.quote: Do it for all family / Do it for Granny / Did it for all for the Nanny / Do it for Grammy
quotes.author: Soul the American Dream

quotes.quote: I'm a baby and i don't have a daddy / Did you know i was raised by my nanny / No one understands me like granny
quotes.author: Bombaby

quotes.quote: She was there to sell make-up, / But the father saw more. / She had style! / She had flair! / She was there. / That's how she became the Nanny!
quotes.author: Ann Callaway

quotes.quote: But I knew life before I left my nursery, huh / Left alone with big fat Fanny / She was such a naughty nanny / Heap big woman, you made a bad boy out of me
quotes.author: Brian Harold May

quotes.quote: And Nanny's very sorry too for you-know-what-she-did, / And she's writing Alexander very blackly on the lid, / So Nan and Me are friends, because it's difficult to catch / An excited Alexander you've mistaken for a match.
quotes.author: Alan Alexander Milne

quotes.quote: In a corner of the bedroom is a great big curtain, / Someone lives behind it, but I don't know who; / I think it is a Brownie, but I'm not quite certain. / (Nanny isn't certain, too.)
quotes.author: Alan Alexander Milne

quotes.quote: And what of pretty Nanny this hot summer weather? / She stays not contented with little or with muckle, / Straining for daisies at the end of her tether.
quotes.author: Robert Graves

quotes.quote: Nanny blushes when I woo her, / And with kindly chiding eyes / Faintly says I shall undo her; / Faintly, O, forbear! she cries.
quotes.author: Matthew Prior

quotes.quote: Science tells us that 90 percent of the human brain develops by age three, so any person who cares for you child during these formative years--be it a nanny, a babysitter, or a daycare worker--will without question shape your child's personality.
quotes.author: Tammy Gold

quotes.quote: Nannies can be as different as night and day, and there's no nanny degree or required certification.
quotes.author: Tammy Gold

quotes.quote: The other factor to consider is that the nanny--parent relationship, while it can be rewarding in many ways, is utterly unique and not always easy.
quotes.author: Tammy Gold

quotes.quote: Being a nanny in the city or a highly walk-able urban area is in some ways an easier job because it typically requires less complex navigation.
quotes.author: Tammy Gold

quotes.quote: But the truth is, nanny care serves as a wonderful solution to the childcare dilemma for many families.
quotes.author: Michelle R. LaRowe

quotes.quote: In today's world of dual-income families, many parents have turned to professional nannies to help care for their children.
quotes.author: Michelle R. LaRowe

quotes.quote: Having a nanny allows children to receive personal care in their own home an enables to play an active role in their day-to-day care.
quotes.author: Michelle R. LaRowe

quotes.quote: A nanny can separate herself emotionally from the children because, although she loves the children, they are not hers; thus, she does not have a strong, maternal response to their crying.
quotes.author: Michelle R. LaRowe

quotes.quote: Grandmothers bring special skills to the job of granny-nanny. They usually have more time than the mommies, and therefore can listen more than a busy parent.
quotes.author: Lois Young-Tulin

quotes.quote: Attention seems to be what it's all about for successful granny-nannies...attention and availability.
quotes.author: Lois Young-Tulin

quotes.quote: A loving, giving granny-nanny helps raise a loving, giving grandchildren.
quotes.author: Lois Young-Tulin

quotes.quote: Having the opportunity to be a granny-nanny is a privilege not an entitlement.
quotes.author: Lois Young-Tulin

quotes.quote: When a nanny or au pair becomes responsible for preparing and serving that afternoon snack, this affects both adult and child family members' everyday lives.
quotes.author: Eldén

quotes.quote: Just like any other job, many nanny employers have specific requirements for the nanny.
quotes.author: Kristin Laubenthal

quotes.quote: Being a nanny is about being part of a child's growth and development.
quotes.author: Kristin Laubenthal

quotes.quote: I think a nanny should be ready to do for a family. What I mean is the nanny job is not about taking care of just the the children, it's about caring for the family.
quotes.author: Carol Kelly

quotes.quote: As a nanny you have to sometimes help care take care of the marriage, by willing to work weekends.
quotes.author: Carol Kelly

quotes.quote: Think what a better world it would be if we all, the whole world, had cookies and milk about three o'clock every afternoon and then lay down on our blankets for a nap.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.quote: There is more refreshment and stimulation in a nap, even of the briefest, than in all the alcohol ever distilled.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: I don't feel old. I don't feel anything till noon. That's when it's time for my nap.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Sometimes I try to take a nap before shows. That clears my head.
quotes.author: Louis C. K.

quotes.quote: There is no point at which you can say, 'Well, I'm successful now. I might as well take a nap.'
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: Sleep more at night. If it's allowed at work or home, take a nap in the afternoon. You'll be amazed at how much better you'll feel.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: The replenishing thing that comes with a nap - you end up with two mornings in a day.
quotes.author: Pete Hamill

quotes.quote: But the important thing is to lie down and fall asleep. That little nap means you wake up fresh again and can continue.
quotes.author: James Levine

quotes.quote: My biggest thrill in life is to read in the afternoon until I fall asleep and take a nap.
quotes.author: Sissy Spacek

quotes.quote: No day is so bad it can't be fixed with a nap.
quotes.author: Carrie Snow

quotes.quote: Ah. Naps are good. I highly advocate naps.
quotes.author: Andrew W. Marlowe

quotes.quote: They should take a nap. Then they'll feel better.
quotes.author: Ken Sobol

quotes.quote: A quick nap right now sounds really good.
quotes.author: Fred Olen Ray

quotes.quote: Naps are nature's hugs!
quotes.author: Ciro Nieli

quotes.quote: Air soul kicks and crushed velvet hats / Hanging off the ave with the beautifulest naps
quotes.author: Alton Taylor

quotes.quote: So it’s gonna get better / You took so many / Through alarming weather / I got so many naps / In my woven sweater
quotes.author: Trévor Peterson

quotes.quote: Lay down boys take a little nap, / Seventeen miles from the Cumberland Gap
quotes.author: Woody Guthrie

quotes.quote: Oh, it takes a lot of energy to do this rap / I feel kinda sleepy, better take a nap / Not too long a nap, two hours, that's a winner / I wouldn't wanna sleep to a roast beef dinner
quotes.author: Bryon Cole David

quotes.quote: If I think of me and you / It makes me take a nap at noon / But if I die before I wake / I won't mind, I'm yours to take
quotes.author: Frank Jorge Lopes Jr.

quotes.quote: Read me some of that / Cause I need you to make me take my nap / And I need you to recognize my friends / Cause they're there even though
quotes.author: Devendra Banhart

quotes.quote: No time to sleep, you better take a nap / Wake up, put in the work, and live the dream
quotes.author: Joseph Junior Adenuga

quotes.quote: Drift away like Tom Sawyer. / Ride a raft with old Huck Finn. / Take a nap like Rip Van Winkle. / Lay streaming again. / Oh play me some mountain music.
quotes.author: Randy Owen

quotes.quote: Taking a nap, / feet planted / against a cool wall.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Snugly creep and fall asleep, / O come, my baby, do; / Creep into my lap, and with a nap, / We'll break the day in two.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Then lunchtime comes and after that / I might just sit and yap / Sometimes I’ll write a verse or two / Or even take a nap.
quotes.author: Alan Parry-Booth

quotes.quote: I would sleep until infinity / nap / til kingdom come succumbs / to my reality in its totality / vicariously / seeing you as I / see you / my most beautiful / angel
quotes.author: Odonko-ba

quotes.quote: But for some reason we have been led to believe that once we hit adolescence, we outgrow our need for a nap. Nothing can be further from the truth. The desire for a nap never leaves us.
quotes.author: Martha Bolton

quotes.quote: Again, the nap wasn't the problem--it was the timing.
quotes.author: Martha Bolton

quotes.quote: There are so many benefits to the napping experience, we should all cut ourselves some slack and go ahead and reward our bodies with a little midday siesta.
quotes.author: Martha Bolton

quotes.quote: So napping helps. According to a recent survey, napping is not only healthy, it burns calories too.
quotes.author: Martha Bolton

quotes.quote: There's nothing more narcissistic than being sure that you are built in the image of an all-powerful Creator-God, and that same God answers your prayers, knows your name, and has a personal relationship with you.
quotes.author: David G. McAfee

quotes.quote: The greater our own level of narcissism, the more we detest it in others.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Narcissus does not fall in love with his reflection because it is beautiful, but because it is his. If it were his beauty that ent hralled him, he would be set free in a few years by its fading.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Withhold admiration from a narcissist and be disliked. Give it and be treated with indifference.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The paradox about narcissism is that we all have this streak of egotism. Eighty percent of people think they're better than average.
quotes.author: Mark Leary

quotes.quote: Whoever loves becomes humble. Those who love have, so to speak, pawned a part of their narcissism.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Narcissism and self-deception are survival mechanisms without which many of us might just jump off a bridge.
quotes.author: Todd Solondz

quotes.quote: I thought narcissism was about self-love till someone told me there is a flip side to it... It is unrequited self-love.
quotes.author: Emily Levine

quotes.quote: Narcissus weeps to find that his Image does not return his love.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: It is especially painful when narcissists suffer memory loss because they are losing parts of the person they love most.
quotes.author: David Brooks

quotes.quote: For the most part people are not curious except about themselves.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The narcissist devours people, consumes their output, and casts the empty, writhing shells aside.
quotes.author: Sam Vaknin

quotes.quote: No one has probably helped me more with my narcissism than my dog.
quotes.author: Tucker Max

quotes.quote: A narcissist is someone better looking than you are.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: He that falls in love with himself will have no rivals.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Nobody can be kinder than the narcissist while you react to life in his own terms.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: It is possible to have a strong self-love without any self-satisfaction, rather with a self-discontent which is the more intense because one's own little core of egoistic sensibility is a supreme care.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: I don't care what you think unless it is about me.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: There is a difference between supporting someone and feeding someone's narcissism. One is support and the other is not.
quotes.author: Fathom

quotes.quote: Loving yourself and being in love with yourself are two entirely different things. Differentiate.
quotes.author: Fathom

quotes.quote: When narcissism is viewed as good; good is viewed as narcissism.
quotes.author: Fathom

quotes.quote: Self-awareness is not self-centeredness, and spirituality is not narcissism. 'Know thyself' is not a narcissistic pursuit.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Hate is the complement of fear and narcissists like being feared. It imbues them with an intoxicating sensation of omnipotence.
quotes.author: Sam Vaknin

quotes.quote: The difference between narcissism and self-love is a matter of depth. Narcissus falls in love not with the self, but with an image or reflection of the self with the persona, the mask. The narcissist sees himself through the eyes of another, changes his lifestyle to conform with what is admired by others, tailors his behavior and expression of feelings to what will please others. Narcissism is voluntary blindness, an agreement not to look beneath the surface.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: Some narcissistic people end up believing their own lies.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Narcissistic people are always struggling with the fact that the rest of the world doesn't revolve around them
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Self-love for ever creeps out, like a snake, to sting anything which happens . . . to stumble upon it.
quotes.author: George Gordon Noel Byron

quotes.quote: It is not love that should be depicted as blind, but self-love.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a life-long romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Half the harm that is done in this world is due to people who want to feel important. They don't mean to do harm, but the harm [that they cause] does not interest them. Or they do not see it, or they justify it because they are absorbed in the endless struggle to think well of themselves.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: If NASA is to reach beyond the Moon and someday reach Mars, it must be relieved of the burden of launching people and cargo to low earth orbit. To do that, we must invest more in commercial spaceflight.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: In 1966, NASA took over in space, and it has been a bureaucratic mess ever since.
quotes.author: Chuck Yeager

quotes.quote: NASA will send up a big sun shade that will be in orbit between the earth and sun and deflect 2 or 3 percent of the sunshine back into space. It would be cheaper than the international space station.
quotes.author: James Lovelock

quotes.quote: Not until the space shuttle started flying did NASA concede that some astronauts didn't have to be fast-jet pilots. And at that point, sure enough, women started becoming astronauts
quotes.author: Henry Spencer

quotes.quote: NASA projects often have romantic names that link into a long history of exploration and adventure: Atlantis and Discovery, for example.
quotes.author: Hanna Rosin

quotes.quote: NASA is an engine of innovation and inspiration as well as the world's premier space exploration agency, and we are well served by politicians working to keep it that way, instead of turning it into a mere jobs program, or worse, cutting its budget.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: NASA should start thinking about this planet.
quotes.author: Wally Schirra

quotes.quote: With any luck, by the time NASA's space probe hits Pluto, you'll be booking a spaceflight with a privately run suborbital airline.
quotes.author: Burt Rutan

quotes.quote: Even though NASA tries to simulate launch, and we practice in simulators, it's not the same - it's not even close to the same.
quotes.author: Sally Ride

quotes.quote: Within NASA, the shuttle is perhaps the least-groundbreaking project. Recall that Apollo was about creating brand-new technologies that did something unprecedented - putting men on the moon. The shuttle is, by comparison, a relic designed to make going into orbit routine.
quotes.author: Nathan Myhrvold

quotes.quote: NASA is developing space taxis to shuttle astronauts to the International Space Station. And just like New York taxis, they're all going to be driven by aliens.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: NASA's training philosophy is "no surprises." So what they did is put a simulator on Earth where it looks exactly the same as a shuttle toilet and they put a camera down in the bottom of the opening for solid-waste collection, with a light that basically illuminates your asshole.
quotes.author: Mike Mullane

quotes.quote: NASA needs to focus on the things that are really important and that we do not know how to do. The agency is a pioneering force, and that is where its competitive advantage lies.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: NASA scientists have discovered a new form of life, unfortunately, it won't date them either.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: NASA space scientists have been studying giraffe skin so they can apply what they learn from it to the construction of spacesuits.
quotes.author: Joanna Lumley

quotes.quote: There's a silly notion that failure's not an option at NASA. Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: NASA wanted to assure its ability to examine the spacecraft in orbit for signs of damage.
quotes.author: Marc Garneau

quotes.quote: When NASA says they're going into space, they don't mean up and back. They mean orbit.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: NASA has spin-offs, and it's a huge and very impressive list, including accurate and affordable LASIK eye surgery.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: NASA is a scientific and technological agency and we work very closely with our congressional partners.
quotes.author: Dean Acosta

quotes.quote: NASA is a big organization with a lot of needs that have to be met. So there are a lot of opportunities.
quotes.author: Bruce Pittman

quotes.quote: NASA is an utterly fascinating place, and the fact that the buildings look so anonymous almost makes it more fascinating. You walk by a generic office-park-looking building, and you have no idea what's going on inside.
quotes.author: Moby

quotes.quote: For NASA, space is still a high priority.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: NASA has been one of the most successful public investments in motivating students to do well and achieve all they can achieve. It's sad that we are turning the programme in a direction where it will reduce the amount of motivation and stimulation it provides to young people.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: At the end of our NASA careers, no one had a place for us in the military.
quotes.author: Wally Schirra

quotes.quote: Being at NASA and having the access to both computing capability and satellite observation capability is kind of the ideal research situation to try to understand global climate change.
quotes.author: James Hansen

quotes.quote: NASA takes you to where your imagination has already been.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: All the traditional STEM fields, the science, technology, engineering, and math fields, are stoked when you dream big in an agency such as NASA.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: NASA has been scattered to the four winds.
quotes.author: Eugene Cernan

quotes.quote: NASA is moving the space program to Starkville because it has no atmosphere.
quotes.author: Skip Bertman

quotes.quote: I'm from West Virginia. If you didn't know what was happening in NASCAR, you were on the outside. NASCAR is a big league sport, but it's still also country and redneck.
quotes.author: Randy Moss

quotes.quote: In NASCAR, you can do a lot of banging around and get pretty serious and even get yourself upside down. All of those things can happen - and then you give an interview two seconds later.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: There are some people who watch NASCAR for the highly skilled driving - but most people watch it for the crashes.
quotes.author: John Oliver

quotes.quote: If NASCAR racing gets any more exciting, I may not be able to stand it.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.quote: Once you're a NASCAR champion, you're kind of in another elite division instead of just being a competitor or a race winner.
quotes.author: Kyle Busch

quotes.quote: Unlike other sports, which are largely determined by individual athletic ability or team strength, NASCAR requires its competitors to cooperate in order to win.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.quote: I have a lot to learn about NASCAR. But I've learned if you have the right people in the right places doing the right things, you can be successful at whatever you do.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.quote: I didn't understand NASCAR until I met some NASCAR fans. You talk to a couple of NASCAR fans and you'll see where a shiny car driving in a circle would fascinate them all day. And I can make fun of NASCAR fans, because if they chase me, I just turn right.
quotes.author: Alonzo Bodden

quotes.quote: In NASCAR, you don't have to be as physically strong as in some other forms of racing. You've just got to be able to endure the heat and endurance of it.
quotes.author: Jeff Gordon

quotes.quote: NASCAR does a good job of trying to keep things equal with new rules. We're not allowed to have computers in our cars to tell the crew what's going on. So the only thing you have is the driver, and the driver-crew chief relationship. That's the most important thing.
quotes.author: Jimmie Johnson

quotes.quote: NASCAR stepped up their safety concepts, and I think the drivers feel NASCAR is doing everything that can be done. So we are a little behind NASCAR in that respect. Someone in NASCAR realized there were certain things that could be done to make it safer. The same thing has to happen in football.
quotes.author: Jim Brown

quotes.quote: NASCAR is a bunch of farmers driving around in circles.
quotes.author: Eddie Irvine

quotes.quote: I know one thing. If a NASCAR driver ever got on the court with me, they wouldn't be able to keep up. That would be like me driving a bus in a NASCAR race.
quotes.author: Keny Smith

quotes.quote: NASCAR, there's nothing wrong with it, it's very competitive, but the specs are very tight on tolerances.
quotes.author: Robby Gordon

quotes.quote: The cooperation of NASCAR - or any other system, it turns out - persists only when everyone believes he has the opportunity to win.
quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

quotes.quote: NASCAR racing provides more brand awareness and interest than any of the other major sports. The opportunities to build business-to-business relationships within the racing community are endless.
quotes.author: David Fricke

quotes.quote: In this country, the most popular form of car racing is the huge multibillion dollar industry that`s called stock car racing. That`s what NASCAR is. That`s what the SC stands for in the middle of NASCAR, Stock Cars.
quotes.author: Rachel Maddow

quotes.quote: There is such a cool vibe in Nashville. It is has the excitement of a big city, but also has this amazing small town feel. I have definitely come to call it my home, and have my favorite go-to spots. But most of all it's the people. The southern charm, and hospitality. And some great shopping never hurts. As fun as Music City is during the day, the real magic happens at night ... The lights, the energy, the music, how could you not love this town?
quotes.author: Hayden Panettiere

quotes.quote: Nashville is wicked. It’s like a proper music community, but it’s also quintessentially American. You bump into people there with cowboy hats that spit in jars and call you ‘boy.’ I just love that.
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: Nashville is one of the greatest places for the best songwriters in the world. It’s been fantastic to live there and to raise our family there. It’s a great town.
quotes.author: Faith Hill

quotes.quote: Nashville is the place where I first realized how impossible it is to look at someone and know what is inside them, what special something they possess.
quotes.author: Callie Khouri

quotes.quote: I came to Nashville, not to bring inspiration, but to gain inspiration from the great movement that has taken place in this community.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: It's the warmest, loveliest community I've ever set foot in. For me, it's the perfect place to live. It's the best part of America.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: Nashville is such a fantastic city, with this great creative music energy. Then there's that Southern hospitality, you can't beat that.
quotes.author: Sam Palladio

quotes.quote: I admire this town a lot. They take care of their own. There's not a lot of places in the world, much less America, that do that. It's just a great place.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: The enticing allure of Nashville is that there is always something new coming down the pike. Put this record on and you’ll hear footsteps.
quotes.author: Tom T. Hall

quotes.quote: I think of Nashville as a very natural place. We're easy going, we are ourselves. There isn't a lot of preening or trying to impress. So it's an easy place to just be and that is a good state from which to write.
quotes.author: Ann Patchett

quotes.quote: Nashville feels like a big little town to me. It's got lots of culture and lots of interesting things to do and lots of interesting people. At the same time, it feels very small and tight-knit and very close. Everyone feels like they know each other.
quotes.author: Ricky Schroder

quotes.quote: I love Nashville. It seems like everywhere you walk, there's great music coming out of every wall.
quotes.author: Imelda May

quotes.quote: To me, songwriting is the backbone of Nashville. Looks can go, fads can go, but a good song lasts forever.
quotes.author: Alan Jackson

quotes.quote: Real folk music long ago went to Nashville and left no known survivors.
quotes.author: Donal Henahan

quotes.quote: Nashville has a great creative atmosphere. It's a small, close-knit music community that you cant find anywhere else.
quotes.author: Kim carnes

quotes.quote: I love Nashville, and I love the South, but on a professional level, I had started feeling smothered by the Nashville way of doing things.
quotes.author: Deana Carter

quotes.quote: Nashville used to have more integrity than just looking at the bottom line.
quotes.author: Crystal Gayle

quotes.quote: I think it took me a while to convince Nashville that what I do is genuine and my heart's in the right place, and I love country music.
quotes.author: Keith Urban

quotes.quote: Holland is to dance music what Nashville is to country.
quotes.author: Afrojack

quotes.quote: The unpleasant events you are passing from will not have been profitless to you.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Evil is a miscellaneous collection of nasty things that nasty people do.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Man is the only creature who has a nasty mind.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: One of the worst things about life is not how nasty the nasty people are. You know that already. It is how nasty the nice people can be.
quotes.author: Anthony Powell

quotes.quote: Everyone always believes everything nasty of everyone else, and especially if it's a lie.
quotes.author: Halldor Laxness

quotes.quote: When you say nasty things about people, you should never say the true ones, because you can't really fully and honestly take those back..
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: What seems nasty, painful, evil can become a source of beauty, joy, and strength, if faced with an open mind.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Everything's very perfectly balanced; for all the horrible things in the world there's lots of good things.
quotes.author: John Frusciante

quotes.quote: A horrible night might be hidden in a beautiful morning!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It's so horrible to realize you're just the same as everyone else.
quotes.author: Grant Morrison

quotes.quote: It is no wonder that people are so horrible when they start life as children.
quotes.author: Kingsley Amis

quotes.quote: It would be horrible to live with someone who didn't like the same things you like.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Everybody had something horrible happen to them at one time or another in their life.
quotes.author: Karin Slaughter

quotes.quote: It is dreadful the way all the comfortable, happy people stay off to themselves.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.quote: For all things are less dreadful than they seem.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: It's dreadful what little things lead people to misunderstand each other.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: How dreadful knowledge of the truth can be when there's no help in truth!
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The nasty little apes that call themselves human beings can do nothing except run and hide.
quotes.author: Michael Crichton

quotes.quote: Sometimes awful things have their own beauty.
quotes.author: Christopher Isherwood

quotes.quote: It's an awful risky thing to live.
quotes.author: Carl Rogers

quotes.quote: The expectation of an unpleasantness is more terrible than the thing itself.
quotes.author: Marie Bashkirtseff

quotes.quote: Without a vision human beings are nasty creatures.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: Only when you're nervous do you get nasty.
quotes.author: Deborah Grey

quotes.quote: When people are nasty, it gets everybody's attention, and it gives them a name.
quotes.author: Steve Guttenberg

quotes.quote: When you start attacking cronyism and people's political interests, it gets nasty.
quotes.author: Charles Koch

quotes.quote: People don't very much like things that are beautiful.. they are so far from their nasty little minds.
quotes.author: Claude Debussy

quotes.quote: Sometimes siblings can get in each other's space.
quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.quote: A brother is a friend given by nature.
quotes.author: Jean Baptiste Legouve

quotes.quote: Your parents leave you too soon and your kids and spouse come along late, but your siblings know you when you are in your most inchoate form.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.quote: When you have a lot of siblings, you always do something to feel special.
quotes.author: Lee Daniels

quotes.quote: Half the time when brothers wrestle, it's just an excuse to hug each other.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: Older siblings get more total-immersion mentoring with their parents before younger siblings come along. As a result, they get an IQ and linguistic advantage because they are the exclusive focus of their parents' attention.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

quotes.quote: Our brothers and sisters are there with us from the dawn of our personal stories to the inevitable dusk.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: Without siblings you get quite a skewed vision of yourself and of the world. I always felt I didn't understand how it worked. I remember feeling quite lonely.
quotes.author: Kate Atkinson

quotes.quote: Having a sister is like having a best friend you can't get rid of. You know whatever you do, they'll still be there.
quotes.author: Amy Li

quotes.quote: I, who have no sisters or brothers, look with some degree of innocent envy on those who may be said to be born to friends.
quotes.author: James Boswell

quotes.quote: Brothers don't necessarily have to say anything to each other â€“ they can sit in a room and be together and just be completely comfortable with each other.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: The mildest, drowsiest sister has been known to turn tiger if her sibling is in trouble.
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: My siblings are my best friends.
quotes.author: America Ferrera

quotes.quote: Comparison is a death knell to sibling harmony.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fishel

quotes.quote: I don't believe an accident of birth makes people sisters or brothers. It makes them siblings, gives them mutuality of parentage. Sisterhood and brotherhood is a condition people have to work at.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Our siblings. They resemble us just enough to make all their differences confusing, and no matter what we choose to make of this, we are cast in relation to them our whole lives long.
quotes.author: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.quote: Having lots of siblings is like having built-in best friends.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.quote: A sibling represents a person's past, present, and future.
quotes.author: John Corey Whaley

quotes.quote: Siblings are the guarantors that the private childhood world â€” so unlike the adult world that scientists are only just beginning to understand it â€” is a fully shared and objective one.
quotes.author: Alison Gopnik

quotes.quote: To the outside world, we all grow old. But not to brothers and sisters. We know each other as we always were. We know each other's hearts. We share private family jokes. We remember family feuds and secrets, family griefs and joys. We live outside the touch of time.
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: The sibling society is the flattening out of the previously democratic society.
quotes.author: Robert Bly

quotes.quote: A sister is a gift to the heart, a friend to the spirit, a golden thread to the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Isadora James

quotes.quote: Brother and sister, together as friends, ready to face whatever life sends.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Siblings: children of the same parents, each of whom is perfectly normal until they get together.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Children of the same family, the same blood, with the same first associations and habits, have some means of enjoyment in their power, which no subsequent connections can supply.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Siblings are the people we practice on, the people who teach us about fairness and cooperation and kindness and caring quite often the hard way.
quotes.author: Pamela Dugdale

quotes.quote: You can kid the world, but not your sister.
quotes.author: Charlotte Gray

quotes.quote: Brothers and Sisters: Separated by distance, joined by love.
quotes.author: Chuck Danes

quotes.quote: Our siblings push buttons that cast us in roles we felt sure we had let go of long ago â€” the baby, the peacekeeper, the caretaker, the avoiderâ€¦. It doesn't seem to matter how much time has elapsed or how far we've traveled.
quotes.author: Jane Mersky Leder

quotes.quote: I do find the sibling connection endlessly fascinating, as I do all family dynamics. I like how siblings seem to create their own parentless mini-civilization within a family, one that has its own laws, myths, language, humor, its own loyalties and treacheries.
quotes.author: Jandy Nelson

quotes.quote: Extreme nationalism objectifies and dehumanizes those from other countries.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: It is not for him to pride himself who loveth his own country, but rather for him who loveth the whole world. The earth is but one country and mankind its citizens.
quotes.author: BahÃ¡'u'llÃ¡h

quotes.quote: Patriotism is the virtue of the vicious.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A good nationalism has to depend on a principle of the common people, on myths of a struggling commonality.
quotes.author: Andrew O'Hagan

quotes.quote: Nationalism and anti-nationalism is a matter of perception. You cannot mandate who is a nationalist and what is not.
quotes.author: Kapil Sibal

quotes.quote: Patriotism is the willingness to kill and be killed for trivial reasons.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Nationalism is a silly cock crowing on his own dunghill.
quotes.author: Richard Aldington

quotes.quote: A nation that doesn't honor its past, has no future.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: It is nationalism which engenders nations, and not the other way round.
quotes.author: Ernest Gellner

quotes.quote: Patriotism is a kind of religion; it is the egg from which wars are hatched.
quotes.author: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.quote: Nationalism is blamed for this century's wars, but nationalism need not mean militarism. And the nation-state has been the laboratory of liberty.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: Nationalism is an infantile thing. It is the measles of mankind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In the beginning of a change the patriot is a scarce man, and brave, and hated and scorned. When his cause succeeds, the timid join him, for then it costs nothing to be a patriot.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A nation that cannot control its borders is not a nation.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: All of nationalism can be understood as a kind of collective narcissism.
quotes.author: Geoff Mulgan

quotes.quote: Patriotism consists not in waving the flag, but in striving that our country shall be righteous as well as strong.
quotes.author: James Bryce

quotes.quote: Nationalism is not to be confused with patriotism.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: True patriotism hates injustice in its own land more than anywhere else.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Nationalism is our form of incest, is our idolatry, is our insanity. Patriotism is its cult.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Nations whose nationalism is destroyed are subject to ruin.
quotes.author: Muammar al-Gaddafi

quotes.quote: A nation is a society united by a delusion about its ancestry and by common hatred of its neighbours.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: It is not easy to see how the more extreme forms of nationalism can long survive when men have seen the Earth in its true perspective as a single small globe against the stars.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Nationalism, and its chum, patriotism, encourage unedifying hyperbole.
quotes.author: Douglas Eaglesham Dunn

quotes.quote: Our true nationality is mankind.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: Patriotism is when love of your own people comes first; nationalism, when hate for people other than your own comes first.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Nationalism is power hunger tempered by self-deception.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Nationalism has a way of oppressing others.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: National identity is the last bastion of the dispossessed. But the meaning of identity is now based on hatred, on hatred for those who are not the same.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Nationalism remains, after two centuries, the most vital political emotion in the world - far more vital than social ideologies such as communism or fascism or even democracy.
quotes.author: Arthur Meier Schlesinger

quotes.quote: Nationalism of one kind or another was the cause of most of the genocide of the twentieth century. Flags are bits of colored cloth that governments use first to shrink-wrap people's brains and then as ceremonial shrouds to bury the dead.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: The naturalist worldview is a good way to feel grounded and feel part of something that isn't based on fairy tales. It's based on observable facts in the human and in the biological history of the planet. I think that can be a source for comfort.
quotes.author: Greg Graffin

quotes.quote: The naturalists have been engaged in thinking about Nature. They have not attended to the fact that they were thinking. The moment one attends to this it is obvious that one's own thinking cannot be merely a natural event, and that therefore something other than Nature exists.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: If naturalists go to heaven (about which there is considerable ecclesiastical doubt), I hope that I will be furnished with a troop of kakapo to amuse me in the evening instead of television.
quotes.author: Gerald Durrell

quotes.quote: Happy indeed is the naturalist: to him the seasons come round like old friends; to him the birds sing: as he walks along, the flowers stretch out from the hedges, or look up from the ground, and as each year fades away, he looks back on a fresh store of happy memories.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: A fossil is so powerful. It's moving. This is my ancestor. The naturalist is moved by the fossil... not the cross.
quotes.author: Greg Graffin

quotes.quote: Naturalistic atheism debunks itself. It has no power to explain even some of the most basic principles of the universe and existence. It cannot even explain how its own claims can be reasonably believed.
quotes.author: Lewis N.

quotes.quote: The ordinary naturalist is not sufficiently aware that when dogmatizing on what species are, he is grappling with the whole question of the organic world & its connection with the time past & with Man; that it involves the question of Man & his relation to the brutes, of instinct, intelligence & reason, of Creation, transmutation & progressive improvement or development. Each set of geological questions & of ethnological & zool. & botan. are parts of the great problem which is always assuming a new aspect.
quotes.author: Charles Lyell

quotes.quote: From the naturalistic point of view, all men are equal. There are only two exceptions to this rule of naturalistic equality: geniuses and idiots.
quotes.author: Mikhail Bakunin

quotes.quote: The naturalist is a civilized hunter. He goes alone into the field or woodland and closes his mind to everything but that time and place, so that life around him presses in on all the senses and small details grow in significance. He begins the scanning search for which cognition was engineered. His mind becomes unfocused, it focuses on everything, no longer directed toward any ordinary task or social pleasantry.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: Either everything in man can be traced as a development from below, or something must come from above. There is no avoiding that dilemma: you must be either a naturalist or a supernaturalist.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Delight itself, however, is a weak term to express the feelings of a naturalist.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: The naturalists of yore esteemed the ocean to be a treasury of wonders, and sought therein for monstrosities and organisms contrary to the law of nature, such as they interpreted it.
quotes.author: Edward Forbes

quotes.quote: To a naturalist nothing is indifferent; the humble moss that creeps upon the stone is equally interesting as the lofty pine which so beautifully adorns the valley or the mountain: but to a naturalist who is reading in the face of the rocks the annals of a former world, the mossy covering which obstructs his view, and renders indistinguishable the different species of stone, is no less than a serious subject of regret.
quotes.author: James Hutton

quotes.quote: Most modern biologists, having reviewed with satisfaction the downfall of the spontaneous generation hypothesis, yet unwilling to accept the alternative belief in special creation, are left with nothing.
quotes.author: George Wald

quotes.quote: Truth as such is not a particularly important concept in naturalistic philosophy.
quotes.author: Phillip E. Johnson

quotes.quote: To be a naturalist is better than to be a king.
quotes.author: William Beebe

quotes.quote: As a naturalist you will never suffer from that awful modern disease called boredomâ€”so go out and greet the natural world with curiosity and delight, and enjoy it.
quotes.author: Gerald Malcolm Durrell

quotes.quote: Darwinism is not merely a support for naturalistic philosophy: it is a product of naturalistic philosophy.
quotes.author: Phillip E. Johnson

quotes.quote: Naturalism teaches one of the most important things in this world. There is only this life, so live wonderfully and meaningfully.
quotes.author: Greg Graffin

quotes.quote: It is essential to naturalist doctrine that literature, to be good, must, finally, be the author's experience worked out literally.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: If life can emerge just from naturalistic circumstances, then God is out of a job.
quotes.author: Lee Strobel

quotes.quote: No naturalist has devoted more painstaking attention to the structure of the barnacles than Mr. Darwin.
quotes.author: Richard Owen

quotes.quote: Man cannot afford to be a naturalist, to look at nature directly, but only with the side of his eye. He must see through and beyond her.
quotes.author: Henry Thoreau

quotes.quote: Evolutionary naturalism takes the inherent limitations of science and turns them into a devastating philosophical weapon: because science is our only real way of knowing anything, what science cannot know cannot be real.
quotes.author: Phillip E. Johnson

quotes.quote: A perfectly poetic appreciation of nature contains two elements, a knowledge of facts, and a sensibility to charms. Everybody who may have to speak to some naturalists will be well aware how widely the two may be separated. He will have seen that a man may study butterflies and forget that they are beautiful, or be perfect in the "Lunar theory" without knowing what most people mean by the moon.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: When we try to pick out anything by itself, we find it hitched to everything else in the universe.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The naturalists of our own time hold equal faith in the wonders of the sea, but seek therein rather for the links of nature's chain than for apparent exceptions.
quotes.author: Edward Forbes

quotes.quote: The happiness even of the naturalist depends in some measure upon his ignorance, which still leaves him new worlds of this kind to conquer. He may have reached the very Z of knowledge in the books, but he still feels half ignorant until he has confirmed each bright particular with his eyes.
quotes.author: Robert Wilson Lynd

quotes.quote: The modern naturalist must realize that in some of its branches his profession, while more than ever a science, has also become an art.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Such beauty, not of human hand / Is there for us to see / All nature is so wonderful / The cost is nil, all free.
quotes.author: Merretta D.L. Parry-Booth

quotes.quote: So Nature keeps the reverent frame / With which her years began, / And all her signs and voices shame / The prayerless heart of man.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: All nature owns with one accord / The great and universal Lord: / The sun proclaims him through the day, / The moon when daylight drops away.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: Nature rarer uses yellow / Than another hue; / Saves she all of that for sunsets,-- / Prodigal of blue.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Nature the gentlest mother is, / Impatient of no child, / The feeblest of the waywardest. / Her admonition mild.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: It's nature's way of telling you something's wrong / It's nature's way of telling you in a song.
quotes.author: Randy Calfornia

quotes.quote: A dripping June sets all in tune.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A short horse is soon curried.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Nature is the art of God.
quotes.author: Latin (on nature)

quotes.quote: No man fears what he has seen grow.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Of all the plants that cover the earth and lie like a fringe of hair upon the body of our grandmother, try to obtain knowledge that you may be strengthened in life.
quotes.author: Winnebago (Native American) (on nature)

quotes.quote: One step leads to another.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One swallow never makes a summer.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: The afternoon knows what the morning never expected.
quotes.author: Swedish (on basic truths)

quotes.quote: The day has eyes; the night has ears.
quotes.author: Scottish (on nature)

quotes.quote: The early bird gets the worm, the second mouse gets the cheese.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The earth has music for those who listen.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The sap rises in the spring.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The shoemaker's children have no shoes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When the wind is in the east, tis neither good for man nor beast.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You can drive out nature with a pitchfork but she keeps on coming back.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I love to think of nature as an unlimited broadcasting station, through which God speaks to us every hour, if we will only tune in.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings. Nature's peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees. The winds will blow their own freshness into you, and the storms their energy, while cares will drop off like autumn leaves. As age comes on, one source of enjoyment after another is closed, but Nature's sources never fail.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: I believe that there is a subtle magnetism in Nature, which, if we unconsciously yield to it, will direct us aright.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Those who find beauty in all of nature will find themselves at one with the secrets of life itself.
quotes.author: L. Wolfe Gilbert

quotes.quote: Everyone can identify with a fragrant garden, with beauty of sunset, with the quiet of nature, with a warm and cozy cottage.
quotes.author: Thomas Kincade

quotes.quote: Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces us up, snow is exhilarating; there is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Give me odorous at sunrise a garden of beautiful flowers where I can walk undisturbed.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Looking at beauty in the world, is the first step of purifying the mind.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: I believe the world is incomprehensibly beautiful an endless prospect of magic and wonder.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Those who contemplate the beauty of the Earth find reserves of strength that will endure as long as life lasts.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: On earth there is no heaven, but there are pieces of it.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: A lake is the landscape's most beautiful and expressive feature. It is Earth's eye; looking into which the beholder measures the depth of his own nature.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings. Nature's peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees. The winds will blow their own freshness into you and the storms their energy, while cares will drop off like autumn leaves.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The day, water, sun, moon, night - I do not have to purchase these things with money.
quotes.author: Plautis

quotes.quote: To sit in the shade on a fine day and look upon the verdant green hills is the most perfect refreshment.
quotes.author: Jane Austin

quotes.quote: The rich fire of the orange sunset gloriously announces the coming night.
quotes.author: Susan S. Florence

quotes.quote: Reading about nature is fine, but if a person walks in the woods and listens carefully, he can learn more than what is in books, for they speak with the voice of God.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: Earth and sky, woods and fields, lakes and rivers, the mountain and the sea, are excellent schoolmasters, and teach some of us more than we can ever learn from books.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: Forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A morning-glory at my window satisfies me more than the metaphysics of books.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: We do not see nature with our eyes, but with our understandings and our hearts.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Let us learn to appreciate there will be times when the trees will be bare, and look forward to the time when we may pick the fruit.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: Forests, lakes, and rivers, clouds and winds, stars and flowers, stupendous glaciers and crystal snowflakes—every form of animate or inanimate existence, leaves its impress upon the soul of man.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Let the clean air blow the cobwebs from your body. Air is medicine.
quotes.author: Lillian Russell

quotes.quote: Those who contemplate the beauty of the earth find reserves of strength that will endure as long as life lasts. There is something infinitely healing in the repeated refrains of nature — the assurance that dawn comes after night, and spring after winter.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: Nature is beautiful and you are in her bosom. That voice of comfort which speaks in the breezes of the morning, may visit your mind, that the delightful influences which the green leaves, the blue sky, the moonbeams and clouds of the evening diffuse over the universe, may in their powers of soul-healing, visit your day visions, is my desire and hope.
quotes.author: Humphry Davy

quotes.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: If you truly love Nature, you will find beauty everywhere.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Obviously I was challenged by becoming a Naval aviator, by landing aboard aircraft carriers and so on.
quotes.author: Alan Shepard

quotes.quote: The Navy speaks in symbols and you may suit what meaning you choose to the words.
quotes.author: Patrick O'Brian

quotes.quote: A good Navy is not a provocation to war. It is the surest guaranty of peace.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The Navy has a custom-if a ship runs aground, the captain is relieved regardless of who is responsible. That's how Abu Ghraib should be handled.
quotes.author: Rand Beers

quotes.quote: A powerful Navy we have always regarded as our proper and natural means of defense; and it has always been of defense that we have thought, never of aggression or of conquest. But who shall tell us now what sort of Navy to build? We shall take leave to be strong upon the seas, in the future as in the past; and there will be no thought of offense or provocation in that. Our ships are our natural bulwarks.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Being in a ship is being in a jail, with the chance of being drowned.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The Navy is a master plan designed by geniuses for execution by idiots. If you're not an idiot, but find yourself in the Navy, you can only operate well by pretending to be one.
quotes.author: Herman Wouk

quotes.quote: The US Navy has several people on every ship that can navigate by the stars. They don't fool with that.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: No matter what happens, the U.S. Navy is not going to be caught napping.
quotes.author: Frank Knox

quotes.quote: When you start to build a serious wardrobe, the navy blazer is the very first piece you should choose. It can be a building block for an entire work and casual wardrobe.
quotes.author: Derren Brown

quotes.quote: Hearts of oak are our ships, Gallant tars are our men.
quotes.author: David Garrick

quotes.quote: The Navy has both a tradition and a future and we look with pride and confidence in both directions.
quotes.author: Arleigh Burke

quotes.quote: Navy teams have reached the area to launch an operation for the recovery of survivors or of all the bodies.
quotes.author: Mohammed Salman

quotes.quote: The Navy ship returned fire after being fired upon.
quotes.author: Charlie Brown

quotes.quote: The Navy is very old and very wise.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: In the Navy, the path is paved for you. Your job is to be a soldier and fit in. As long as you stick to your place, it's actually really easy.
quotes.author: Kiesza

quotes.quote: The Navy credits me with more kills as a sniper than any other American service member, past or present.
quotes.author: Chris Kyle

quotes.quote: The Navy will need congressional and administration leadership in finding creative solutions for the submarine program, or the current course will continue.
quotes.author: Dan Blumenthal

quotes.quote: I was a mechanic in the Navy. And mechanics in the Navy are like mechanics in airlines. You may have more stripes than I do, but you don't know how to fix the airplane.
quotes.author: Gordon Bethune

quotes.quote: The navy is like a socialist country. Efficiency isn't part of the jargon.
quotes.author: James W. Blinn

quotes.quote: We all know the Navy is never wrong, but in this case it was a little weak on being right.
quotes.author: Wendell Mayes

quotes.quote: The Navy is much more than a job; much more than service to country. It is a way of life. It gets in your blood.
quotes.author: Albert F. Pratt

quotes.quote: The United States Navy is the envy of every other navy in the world. They don't want to be like us--they want to be us.
quotes.author: Leighton Smith

quotes.quote: Nobody wants to see the ship go anywhere. The Navy likes it here, and I believe the city does as well.
quotes.author: Richard Conti

quotes.quote: There's this misconception that the Navy is this cruise ship, and you get to go out and sail around, and every now and then, you have to swab the deck. But, no, it is a very impressive group of young people that live at sea, in this place that's very uncomfortable. They exude a pride that is well-deserved.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.quote: The contention that a standing army and navy is the best security of peace is about as logical as the claim that the most peaceful citizen is he who goes about heavily armed.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: The Navy has changed a great deal. Not that the officers of my day were bad, because I served under a lot of good officers, believe me. But there were a few bad ones, too.
quotes.author: Ernest Borgnine

quotes.quote: The Navy, from early on, knew this was important. They could have dumped it in the ocean. We don't know who decided this, but someone said let's keep it and preserve it.
quotes.author: Daniel Martinez

quotes.quote: Neither the Army nor the Navy is of any protection, or very little protection, against aerial raids.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bel

quotes.quote: The ship was masted according to the proportion of the navy; but on my application the masts were shortened, as I thought them too much for her, considering the nature of the voyage.
quotes.author: William Bligh

quotes.quote: The Navy Seals don't travel with 200 people, they wouldn't be able to execute the kind of tip-of-the-spear missions they do.
quotes.author: Harris Faulkner

quotes.quote: I actually think it's very important that the Navy SEAL community stay out of politics.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: The more successful Navy SEALs there are, the more glory it reflects on the community and the better it is for our country.
quotes.author: Eric Greitens

quotes.quote: To be a Navy SEAL, it's three and a half years training before you're ever put into harm's way the first time.
quotes.author: Ryan Zinke

quotes.quote: When a recruiter first told me about the Navy SEALs, I knew it was the right fit.
quotes.author: Ryan Zinke

quotes.quote: I know from my experience as a Navy SEAL that barriers work.
quotes.author: Dan Crenshaw

quotes.quote: As a Navy SEAL, and sniper, one of the things I learned was that excellence matters.
quotes.author: Brandon Webb

quotes.quote: I'm a warrior at heart; I'm an ex-Navy Seal. I'm too old to wage war anymore, and so now I wage it mentally. And so I find politics very stimulating; it's war without guns.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Like in combat when you're in chaos, a Navy SEAL in chaos, you cannot be afraid of dying for a cause.
quotes.author: Vitor Belfort

quotes.quote: I do this system called TRX. It was developed by a Navy SEAL and is basically a simple cord that you can wrap around something anywhere, anytime, and you use your body weight as resistance. We installed one in our home gym, but you can also attach it to a tree. It's very easy to travel with.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Banks

quotes.quote: As a Navy SEAL, our motto is obviously 'Never Quit,' and our only easy day was yesterday. Send in the Navy SEALS - I think it's time to send the Navy SEALS to Washington!
quotes.author: Ryan Zinke

quotes.quote: Now watch me get deeper than a Navy Seal (Navy Seal?) It got a crazy feel, shit feel like you in a danger field.
quotes.author: Busta Rhymes

quotes.quote: Then say it like you mean it! Tell them who Free from the Navy Seal Team Is! Free
quotes.author: Free

quotes.quote: You know how we comin' Strapped like the Navy Seals Promise you don't want it
quotes.author: 21 Savage

quotes.quote: Holler if you hear me make your move if you ready Dirty Cash, Navy Seals, reppin' through your city, what?
quotes.author: Pras

quotes.quote: You heard what I said, don't be misled Navy Seals what? Running over chicken heads
quotes.author: Pras

quotes.quote: Scuba Diving with the Navy Seals in the Yellow Submarine Headed for, the Philippines, microphone fiend with are regain green
quotes.author: Pras

quotes.quote: The dirt under your feet could be the grave you fill You don't know how dead you feel until you're dead for real Gettin' high after I paid the bill Lower than a Navy SEAL
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: when you see me on the real, forming like Volt Remember I got deep like a Navy Seal
quotes.author: Wu-Tang Clan

quotes.quote: Gotta take a long drive up the hill Gang too wavy, move like Navy Seals
quotes.author: Travis Scott

quotes.quote: When all odds against me, I need a Navy Seal If that you can't do, you don't love me like you say you do
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.quote: They'll come in like Navy Seals That's word to my momma, I promise I ain't doing no block
quotes.author: Meek Mill

quotes.quote: They'll come in like Navy Seals That's word to my momma, I promise I ain't doing no block
quotes.author: Meek Mill

quotes.quote: I'm like a deck of cards, you gotta deal with me Want war? Then Navy Seal with me
quotes.author: Pitbull

quotes.quote: Veggies on the side of course, kush appetizez Let your Mercedes chill, roll wit a navy seal.
quotes.author: Rick Ross

quotes.quote: Passion and teamwork can turn a bunch of ordinary folks into an unbeatable, winning team.	Passion and teamwork can turn a bunch of ordinary folks into an unbeatable, winning team.
quotes.author: Prakah Iyer

quotes.quote: And we be strapping up like the navy seal do Sweet as banana split every time I peel through.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: I need a soldier, someone real, someone to come get me When all odds against me, I need a Navy Seal
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.quote: Diamonds wet like Navy Seal Heard you drink lean, crack the seal Everybody know it ain't real
quotes.author: Lil Uzi Vert

quotes.quote: The heart and soul of a Navy SEAL is somebody who's committed to their country and committed to their teammates.
quotes.author: Howard E. Wasdin

quotes.quote: No matter what industry you're in, there will be naysayers. So you have to be your own champion.
quotes.author: Chad Hurley

quotes.quote: Expect while reaching for the stars, people to whirl by with their dark clouds and storm upon you.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: You either listen to the naysayers and fall into the pit of self-loathing, or you stay on the path and move forward.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.quote: Every pessimist who ever lived has been buried in an unmarked grave. Tomorrow has always been better than today, and it always will be.
quotes.author: Paul Harvey

quotes.quote: An optimist stays up until midnight to see the new year in. A pessimist stays up to make sure the old year leaves.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: A pessimist is one who makes difficulties of his opportunities and an optimist is one who makes opportunities of his difficulties.
quotes.author: Harry Truman

quotes.quote: Pessimism is an excuse for not trying and a guarantee to a personal failure.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: No pessimist ever discovered the secret of the stars, or sailed an uncharted land or opened a new doorway for the human spirit.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Being stubborn means resilience in the face of negativity. You'll begin to see that you have what the naysayers don't. Their criticisms and their judgments, are rooted in their own weakness, not yours. If you're stubborn enough, you will rise above the limitations they would seek to impose upon you.
quotes.author: Patrick Bisher

quotes.quote: Negativity is a very nasty and contagious disease. Remove yourself from all negative people, situations, and things. Choosing to be positive will help you maintain a better attitude, better health, and a better mind set.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Hanson

quotes.quote: Don't let negative and toxic people rent space in your head. Raise the rent and kick them out.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We need a few trusted naysayers in our lives, critics who are willing to puncture our protective bubble of self-justifications and yank us back to reality if we veer too far off. This is especially important for people in positions of power.
quotes.author: Carol Tavris

quotes.quote: New opinions are always suspected, and usually opposed, without any other reason but because they are not already common.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: In every age there are plenty of people around to remind you what you cannot possibly do. Thank goodness, for these naysayers provide a priceless service: They spur...us to achieve great things.
quotes.author: Jerry and Eileen Spinelli
