quotes.quote: Whatever you do you need courage. Whatever course you decide upon, there will always be someone to tell you that you are wrong.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Naysayers are frightened by their own power.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Perseverance: Outlasting the most rash, pessimistic, cowardly naysayers; those first in line to deny us the dreams never tried. Ourselves.
quotes.author: R.S. Guthrie

quotes.quote: Develop a can-do-spirit and be sure you are not suppressed by the naysayers whose daily actions are meant to discourage you from achieving what you believe.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I don't like talking to horses because they are naysayers
quotes.author: Pat Sajak

quotes.quote: One of the keys to success is an unflinching belief that there are no rules. Anyone who's ever succeeded has gone on that premise; not buying established procedures, business or otherwise. The naysayers are inevitably left behind amid shouts of 'it cannot be done' and "should not be done'.
quotes.author: Anton Szandor LaVey

quotes.quote: Each of us must work to become a hardheaded realist, or else we risk wasting our time and energy on pursuing impossible dreams. Yet constant naysayers pursue no less impossible dreams. Their fear and cynicism move nothing forward. They kill progress. How many cynics built empires, great cities, or powerful corporations?
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Congenital naysayers are among the greatest stumbling blocks to thinking free. Rather than imagining how a new idea might possibly work, they instinctively think of all the reasons why it won't. They sincerely believe that they are doing everyone a favor by reducing the amount of time spent on bad or foolish ideas. But what they really do is undermine the creativity that can be harvested from thinking free.
quotes.author: Steven Sample

quotes.quote: Naysayers have little power over us – unless we give it to them.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: Find out who you are and figure out what you believe in. Even if it's different from what your neighbors believe in and different from what your parents believe in. Stay true to yourself. Have your own opinion. Don't worry about what people say about you or think about you. Let the naysayers nay. They will eventually grow tired of naying.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Haters don’t really hate you, they hate themselves; because you’re a reflection of what they wish to be
quotes.author: Yaira N

quotes.quote: There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non believers and there will be you proving them wrong.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When the Naysayers Are Loud, Turn Up the Music.
quotes.author: Reid Hoffman

quotes.quote: A pessimist is one who builds dungeons in the air.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: A pessimist is a person who has had to listen to too many optimists.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: The worst person to be around is someone who complains about everything and appreciates nothing
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We have natural tendencies to achieve neatness and tidiness. However, most times, we are blindsided by chaos.
quotes.author: Emma Lee Bach

quotes.quote: Yet, when I look upon the neat stacks of clothes in any bed and bath outlet, the joy in my heart erupts, spewing out memories and makes me feel like I am in a soft tufted cloud, floating above all my cares.
quotes.author: Glorianna

quotes.quote: A nice, neat stack of fresh folded clothes can usually uplift the most sombre moods.
quotes.author: Emma Lee Bach

quotes.quote: The comfort and luxury of a home is unmatchable and this if kept clean and maintained well accounts for a blissful living.
quotes.author: Anne Leez

quotes.quote: A clean home is enticing and gives a sense of uplift. It also imparts a sense of accomplishment and clearly exhibits the hosts personal style and taste.
quotes.author: Anne Leez

quotes.quote: The act of tidying is a series of simple actions in which objects are moved from one place to another.
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: A clear and clean space radiates positive energies and harmony. People's moods change and they become more receptive.
quotes.author: Heidi Flores

quotes.quote: If your idea of tidying is getting rid of one unnecessary item a day or cleaning up your room a little at a time, then you are right.
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: If you tidy up in one shot, rather than little by little, you can dramatically change your mindset.
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: No game in the world is as tidy and as dramatically neat as baseball, with cause and effect, crime and punishment, motive and result so cleanly defined.
quotes.author: Paul Gallico

quotes.quote: Homekeeping is a lost art— treat it as such and you'll find some unexpected happiness as you clean and organize your home.
quotes.author: Becky Rapinchuk

quotes.quote: Granted, the house wasn't as tidy as it had been in the past, but it only took a little bit of time and effort to whip it into shape.
quotes.author: Becky Rapinchuk

quotes.quote: Being neat, clean, and organized has nothing to do with gender and everything to do with social style.
quotes.author: Kimberly Alyn

quotes.quote: Analyticals are normally very clean and organized people. Drivers also tend to have things neat and ares sometimes even militant about being organized.
quotes.author: Kimberly Alyn

quotes.quote: As men are given responsibility and credit for more of the housework, the idea that men are slobs and women are neat may change.
quotes.author: Kimberly Alyn

quotes.quote: The man and the woman in a household may both work full-time, but women still clean more.
quotes.author: Kimberly Alyn

quotes.quote: Neatness and cleanliness is not a function of how rich or poor you are but that of mentality and principle.
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: The solution of logical problems must be neat for they set the standard of neatness.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: The solution of logical problems must be neat for they set the standard of neatness.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: There's one thing about baldness, it's neat.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: Life doesn't have a neat beginning and a tidy end; life is always going on. You should begin in the middle and end in the middle, and it should be all there.
quotes.author: V.S. Naipaul

quotes.quote: I want players to look neat and responsible. Maybe it's old school, but it's kind of neat when people are always clean.
quotes.author: Joe Girardi

quotes.quote: Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: It's important to look neat and tidy and not be too flashily dressed. If you look untidy, you're considered to have an untidy mind - it's as simple as that!
quotes.author: Lynda Chalker

quotes.quote: Neatness is a crowning grace of womanhood.
quotes.author: Bernard le Bovier de Fontenelle

quotes.quote: As a general thing, an individual who is neat in his person is neat in his morals.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: A big diamond necklace is nouveau riche, really. People who have wealth a long time don't wear such things.
quotes.author: Elsa Peretti

quotes.quote: Some of us walk around with a necklace of hope, an armour of sanity, but at the end of the day, they always come off. We reveal our naked, vulnerable, real selves.
quotes.author: Karen Quan

quotes.quote: A generation of the unteachable is hanging upon us like a necklace of corpses.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: When you lose your face..., it is like dropping your necklace down a well. The only way you can get it back is to fall in after it.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: Words are beads on the strings of sentences. So make a beautiful necklace!
quotes.author: Aneta Cruz

quotes.quote: A string of burglaries is a crime necklace. Everything I have can be stolen except love, because I give it all away.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: The necklace of life is strung with the pearls of everyday memories; treasure them.
quotes.author: Tom Hackett

quotes.quote: Many a necklace becomes a noose.
quotes.author: Paul Eldridge

quotes.quote: You have to remember that goodbyes are temporary because no one ever really leaves and nothing lasts forever. People are always with us, because they are in our hearts and in our memory. The only thing we can depend on is change... Life is just a series of moments -- a string of pearls that make up the necklace of your life and so every once in a while, to complete the circle, you need to end a chapter.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: The mark of a wise person is being able to reach beyond the truth, to admit they can learn more than they already know. A wise person doesn't string together the beads of unrelated events into a necklace simply to have something they wish to see. A wise person sees the truth even if it is something unexpected. That is the most beautiful necklace to wear - the truth.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: When a little pleasure has flashed for a moment against the dark, I have made that jewel mine. I have hundreds of them ... I call it my Necklace of Perfect Joy. When the world goes wrong, I have only to close my eyes and remember all the links in my chain, set with gems, some large and some small, but all beautiful with the beauty which never fades. It is all I can take with me when I go. My material possessions must stay behind, but my Necklace of Perfect Joy will bring me happiness to the end, when I put it on, to be nevermore unclasped.
quotes.author: Myrtle Reed

quotes.quote: You wander from room to room Hunting for the diamond necklace That is already around your neck!
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Let your necklace be love.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A woman needs ropes and ropes of pearls.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: There is just one piece of jewelry that is equally becoming to everybody, lovely with almost every ensemble, appropriate for almost any occasion, and indispensable in every woman's wardrobe... long live the pearl necklace, true or false, from our first date until our last breath!
quotes.author: Genevieve Antoine Dariaux

quotes.quote: Impressions are like pearls; ideas are like the string that turns the pearls into a necklace. The string is invisible, but it is not dispensable and cannot be broken.
quotes.author: Mu Xin

quotes.quote: My husband gave me a necklace. It’s fake. I requested fake. Maybe I’m paranoid, but in this day and age, I don’t want something around my neck that’s worth more than my head.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: A statement necklace glams up any outfit without feeling like too much.
quotes.author: Tracy Reese

quotes.quote: A caveman took a shell, and maybe it had a hole in it, or maybe he put a hole in it, and he put it on a piece of a tail of a donkey or a dinosaur or something and gave it to the cavewoman. She put it around her neck - the first jewel.
quotes.author: Kenneth Jay Lane

quotes.quote: The painful things seemed like knots on a beautiful necklace, necessary for keeping the beads in place.
quotes.author: Anita Diamant

quotes.quote: Think of your pain like a bunch of red roses, a beautiful thorn necklace. Everyone has one.
quotes.author: Francesca Lia Block

quotes.quote: I wear a necklace, cause I wanna know when I’m upside down.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: The necklace is the anchor; it's the classification of jewelry that says what the whole idea is about.
quotes.author: Robert Lee Morris

quotes.quote: Dreams and needs tear down fortress of impossibility.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: We all need somewhere where we feel safe.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: We need to wash the feet of our enemies.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: What you need and what you want aren't the same things.
quotes.author: Cherise Sinclair

quotes.quote: We need to take things personally. We need to stop putting profits above people. We need to stop putting greed above need. We need to stop putting the rule of gold above the golden rule. We need to treat people as people and not as problems.
quotes.author: Sharad Vivek Sagar

quotes.quote: Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's needs, but not every man's greed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You may need to change your dreams.
quotes.author: Jean Kwok

quotes.quote: We need time so to can explain the stuff in easy way.
quotes.author: Deyth Banger

quotes.quote: We need to start preparing ourselves for the changes we are anticipating in our society
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: We need houses as we need clothes, architecture stimulates fashion. It's like hunger and thirst â€“ you need them both.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: Sometimes we need the salt of tears to remind us how to savor the sweetness of life.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: Need nothing and then see what happens.
quotes.author: Gangaji

quotes.quote: Sometimes all you need is a hug from the right person... and all your stress will melt away.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We need to remember not to give the devil a chance and fall away from God's grace.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: What we need now is endless courage.
quotes.author: Katherine Anne Porter

quotes.quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Need is not transitive, one may need without oneself being needed.
quotes.author: Amitav Ghosh

quotes.quote: Women rarely need the things they want.
quotes.author: Alessandra Torre

quotes.quote: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Everyone needs a house to live in, but a supportive family is what builds a home.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Women need real moments of solitude and self reflection to balance out how much of ourselves we give away.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: People need something or someone to fasten themselves to in order to reassure themselves that they are real
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: We need a shift in our message and in our pulpit.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Sometimes, you need to be alone. Not to be lonely, but to enjoy your free time being yourself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We need to rediscover the idea of the common good and work together to build a home.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.quote: We need no fanciful teaching regarding the personality of God. What God desires us to know of Him is revealed in His word and His works. The beautiful things of nature reveal His character and His power as Creator.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.quote: We need to go through all the processes in order to understand what our calling is.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: As the needs of all living things must, we have proved that it is a very safe thing to trust in the Lord our God.
quotes.author: Amy Carmichael

quotes.quote: In times of your need, you will know those who really love you.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Poor is the man whose pleasures depend on the permission of another.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: Extreme poverty anywhere is a threat to human security everywhere.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: He cares about the needy and was always available to help in any capacity.
quotes.author: Don Beck

quotes.quote: Thousand of candles can be lighted from a single candle. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: What does love look like? It has the hands to help others. It has the feet to hasten to the poor and needy. It has eyes to see misery and want. It has the ears to hear the sighs and sorrows of men. That is what love looks like.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Poverty is not dishonorable in itself, but only when it comes from idleness, intemperance, extravagance, and folly.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: To be a poor man is hard, but to be a poor race in a land of dollars is the very bottom of hardships.
quotes.author: W.E.B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: When a person goes into a relationship emotionally needy, they are not going to have discernment in choosing people.
quotes.author: Jennifer O'Neill

quotes.quote: Poverty is a very complicated issue, but feeding a child isn't
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: Poverty urges us to do and suffer anything that we may escape from it, and so leads us away from virtue.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Dare to reach out your hand into the darkness, to pull another hand into the light.
quotes.author: Norman B. Rice

quotes.quote: The poor get bored the same as the rest of us. Their happiness might be as important to them as their health.
quotes.author: Esther Duflo

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Poverty is an anomaly to rich people; it is very difficult to make out why people who want dinner do not ring the
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Even the smallest act of caring for another person is like a drop of water it will make ripples throughout the entire pond.
quotes.author: Jessy and Bryan Matteo

quotes.quote: One ungrateful person does an injury to all needy people.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: A poor but confident man is as hard to find as a rich but shy man.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Poverty is like punishment for a crime you didn't commit.
quotes.author: Eli Khamarov

quotes.quote: As long as poverty, injustice and gross inequality persist in our world, none of us can truly rest.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Poverty is the parent of revolution and crime.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Save your skin from the corrosive acids from the mouths of toxic people. Someone who just helped you to speak evil about another person can later help another person to speak evil about you.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Protect your good image from the eyes of negative viewers, who may look at your good appearance with an ugly fiendish eye, and ruin your positive qualities with their chemical infested tongues.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Don't let people pull you into their storms. Pull them into your peace.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People who project negativity typically have low self-esteem. They feel badly about themselves, and their negativity is simply a reflection of those feelings.
quotes.author: Hendrie Weisinger

quotes.quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Expect while reaching for the stars, people to whirl by with their dark clouds and storm upon you.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: When you are pursuing your dreams, they will call you CRAZY because they are LAZY. They never know you are a HERO who just jumped away from step ZERO. Stay away from negative people; they will only pollute you.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Don't let negative and toxic people rent space in your head. Raise the rent and kick them out.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Avoid negative people, for they are the greatest destroyers of self confidence and self-esteem. Surround yourself with people who bring out the best in you!
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: You cannot expect to live a positive life if you hang with negative people.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Some people grumble that roses have thorns; I am grateful that thorns have roses.
quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

quotes.quote: Stop letting people who do so little for you control so much of your mind, feelings and emotions.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: If they disrespect you to your face imagine what they're doing behind your back.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: People who try to bring you down everyday aren't important in your life, so you better treat their opinions as such.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: It is easier to avoid the effects of others' negativity when we question if an action or attitude is appropriately directed at us. If it isn't, we can choose to sidestep it and let it pass.
quotes.author: Sue Patton Theole

quotes.quote: Sensitive souls draw in the negativity of others because they are so open.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: Never make negative comments or spread rumors about anyone. It depreciates their reputation and yours
quotes.author: Brian Koslow

quotes.quote: Dwelling on the negative simply contributes to its power.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: Negative people need drama like oxygen. Stay positve, it will take their breath away.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed.
quotes.author: Ray Goforth

quotes.quote: You will face your greatest opposition when you are closest to your biggest miracle.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: No matter how good you are, someone is always going to be against you. But never let them be the limit of your success.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: Whatever you do, good or bad, people will always have something negative to say.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: If you attach to the negative behavior of others it brings you down to their level.
quotes.author: Guru Singh

quotes.quote: He who walks with wise men will be wise, but the companion of fools will suffer harm, Let go of the friends who are no longer uplifting you. Spend time with people who inspire you to be better.
quotes.author: Proverbs 13:20

quotes.quote: A negative and toxic person never feels teased with the genuine presence of the pretenders in his network and he always feels pleased with the absence of the genuine leader in his circle.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: The whole world can gossip about you, and if you don't take it personally you are immune.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: You can, you should, and if you're brave enough to start, you will.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: I don't have time to distinguish between the unfortunate and the incompetent.
quotes.author: General Curtis Le May

quotes.quote: It takes but one positive thought when given a chance to survive and thrive to overpower an entire army of negative thoughts.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Negative thoughts stick around because we believe them, not because we want them or choose them.
quotes.author: Andrew J. Bernstein

quotes.quote: When the negative thoughts come - and they will; they come to all of us - it's not enough to just not dwell on it... You've got to replace it with a positive thought. https://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/joel_osteen_579038
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: As negative thoughts produce negative actions, so positive thoughts produce positive actions.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Negative thoughts are the nails that build a prison of failure.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Believing in negative thoughts is the single greatest obstruction to success.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: The best way to dispel negative thoughts is to require that they have a purpose.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: The best way to overcome undesirable or negative thoughts and feelings is to cultivate the positive ones.
quotes.author: William Walker Atkinson

quotes.quote: Do not allow negative thoughts to enter your mind for they are the weeds that strange confidence.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: If you realized how powerful your thoughts are, you would never think a negative thought.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: There are more blessings in the book of your destiny than your negative thoughts and beliefs are suggesting.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: A mind filled with negative thoughts makes you feel miserable and inadequate and will lead to failure after failure no matter how hard you try to succeed.
quotes.author: Steve Backley

quotes.quote: Consider that not only do negative thoughts and emotions destroy our experience of peace, they also undermine our health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Are you a hoarder of more negative thoughts or positive ones? Whichever ones you hoard, grow into trees and then forests.
quotes.author: John Assaraf

quotes.quote: When you have walked through the hell of your negative thoughts and survived, no pain on this earth will ever again worry you.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: When you start comparing yourself to another man's mirror, that's when those negative thoughts start creeping in. My journey isn't anybody else's journey.
quotes.author: Arian Foster

quotes.quote: When you close the door of your mind to negative thoughts, the door of opportunity opens to you.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The only thing that can possibly keep you from going after your dreams is the person standing in your shoes, wearing your clothes, and thinking your negative thoughts.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The ancestor of every destructive action, every destructive decision, is a negative thought.
quotes.author: Eknath Easwaran

quotes.quote: Dwelling on negative thoughts is like fertilizing weeds.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Never waste energy on worries or negative thoughts, all problems are brought into existence -drop them.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Never think negatively, for the negative thinker does a very dangerous thing. He pumps out negative thoughts into the world around him and thus activates the world negatively.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: It was thinking negative thoughts or thinking positive thoughts, leaving the house prepared or leaving the house unprepared that made the difference.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: We can lift ourselves, and others as well, when we refuse to remain in the realm of negative thought and cultivate within our hearts an attitude of gratitude.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Be a force of love as often as you can and turn away negative thoughts whenever you feel them surface.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Be vigilant; guard your mind against negative thoughts
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Learn to forgive others so that you can release yourself from being held captive by the very negative thoughts around you.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Just the simple process of letting go of negative thoughts will allow your natural state of health to emerge within you.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: Seeing the glass as half empty is more positive than seeing it as half full. Through such a lens the only choice is to pour more. That is righteous pessimism.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Negativity is cannibalistic. The more you feed it, the bigger and stronger it grows.
quotes.author: Bobby Darnell

quotes.quote: Nobody can motivate himself in a positive direction by continually using negative words.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: There are some people who always seem angry and continuously look for conflict. Walk away; the battle they are fighting isn't with you, it is with themselves.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A pessimist is a man who thinks everybody is as nasty as himself, and hates them for it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: Don't believe in pessimism. If something doesn't come up the way you want, forge ahead. If you think it's going to rain, it will.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Negative words are powerful boomerangs so be careful what you say about people and yourself.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: Negativity is the enemy of creativity.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: Nothing can doom man but the belief in doom, for this prevents the movement of return.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: Negativity is an addiction to the bleak shadow that lingers around every human form ... you can transfigure negativity by turning it toward the light of your soul.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: All negativity is an illusion created by the limited mind to protect and defend itself.
quotes.author: Ambika Wauters

quotes.quote: Dwelling on the negative simply contributes to its power.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: To expect defeat is nine-tenths of defeat itself.
quotes.author: Francis Crawford

quotes.quote: The greatest griefs are those we cause ourselves.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Forget your sadness, anger, grudges and hatred. Let them pass like smoke caught in a breeze. Do not indulge yourself in such feelings.
quotes.author: Masaaki Hatsumi

quotes.quote: The heaviest thing I can carry is a grudge.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Some people grumble that roses have thorns; I am grateful that thorns have roses.
quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

quotes.quote: Stop letting people who do so little for you control so much of your mind, feelings and emotions.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Worry deprives you of strength and makes everything much worse, than what actually is.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.quote: Fear is that little dark room where negatives are developed.
quotes.author: Michael Pritchard

quotes.quote: He who has never hoped, can never despair.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The world is round and the place which may seem like the end may also be only the beginning.
quotes.author: George Baker

quotes.quote: The mind acts like an enemy for those who do not control it.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Stop allowing other people to dilute or poison your day with their words or opinions.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Criticism does not make you smarter or better than the one you are criticizing. In fact, the stuff you are critical of in others is the same stuff you don't like about yourself.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: The more you dwell on what you don't have, the more you get what you don't want.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Negligence is the rust of the soul, that corrodes through all her best resolves.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: Nearly all our ills are the result of neglect in some way or other. And this truth may be said to apply to the ills of nations as well. Negligence is at the bottom of all decay. And decay always starts by showing little signs-or warnings. Then is the time to show interest and to be alert. There is nothing quite so easy as to neglect, and nothing quite so difficult as to repair that negligence. Negligence always carries a high price. It costs nothing to avoid it!
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.quote: He that thinks he can afford to be negligent is not far from being poor.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The seeds of evil blooms in the fields of negligence.
quotes.author: Mladen Đorđević

quotes.quote: Where men or nations have broken down, it will almost invariably be found that neglect of little things was the rock on which they split.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: The foolish and the ignorant give themselves over to negligence; whereas the wise treasure mindfulness as a precious jewel.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: If you neglect the pot, it boils over and extinguishes the fire.
quotes.author: Nigerian Proverb

quotes.quote: A little neglect may breed great mischief; for want of a nail the shoe was lost; for want of the shoe the horse was lost; for want of the horse the rider was lost--being overtaken and slain by an enemy--all for the want of care about a horse-shoe nail.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The best ground untilled, soonest runs out into rank weeds. A man of knowledge that is negligent or uncorrected, cannot but grow wild and godless.
quotes.author: Joseph Hall

quotes.quote: Neglect will banish love, kill a lie, and silence slander; yet it will feed a malady, nourish hatred, and fill a garden with weeds.
quotes.author: E. P. Day

quotes.quote: Neglect is enough to ruin a man; a man who is in business need not commit forgery or robbery to ruin himself; he has only to neglect his business, and his ruin is certain.
quotes.author: Albert Barnes

quotes.quote: A little neglect may breed great mischief.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: In persons grafted in a serious trust, negligence is a crime.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Success produces confidence; confidence relaxes industry, and negligence ruins the reputation which accuracy had raised.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: There are not the weeds the ones that drown the good seed, but the negligence of the peasant.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: One can get used to ugliness, but never to negligence.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Remember that nothing will supply the want of prudence, and that negligence and irregularity long continued will make knowledge useless, wit ridiculous, and genius contemptible.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Without a little negligence, life would be intolerable.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: No weakness of the human mind has more frequently incurred animadversion, than the negligence with which men overlook their own faults, however flagrant, and the easiness with which they pardon them, however frequently repeated.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Gross negligence cannot possibly have intent because it cancels it out. If you're grossly negligent, intent's not a factor, you are or you aren't.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: Every one should consider himself as intrusted not only with his own conduct, but with that of others; and as accountable, not only for the duties which he neglects, or the crimes that he commits, but for that negligence and irregularity which he may encourage or inculcate. Every man, in whatever station, has, or endeavours to have his followers, admirers, and imitators, and has therefore the influence of his example to watch with care.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Never neglect details. When everyone’s mind is dulled or distracted the leader must be doubly vigilant.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: There have been joys too great to be described in words, and there have been griefs upon which I have not dared to dwell, and with these in mind I say, climb if you will, but remember that courage and strength are naught without prudence, and that a momentary negligence may destroy the happiness of a lifetime. Do nothing in haste, look well to each step, and from the beginning think what may be the end.
quotes.author: Edward Whymper

quotes.quote: Luck is a result of careful preparation, failure is a result of negligence.
quotes.author: Robert Heinlein

quotes.quote: The corn is not choked by the weeds but by the negligence of the farmer.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: There is the same difference between diligence and neglect, that there is between a garden curiously kept and the sluggard's field when it was all overgrown with nettles and thorns; the one is clothed with beauty and the gracious amiableness of content and cheering loveliness; while the other hath nothing but either little smarting pungencies or else such transpiercings as rankle the flesh within.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: They that are on their guard and appear ready to receive their adversaries, are in much less danger of being attacked than the supine, secure and negligent.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Where families suffer from disasters that are preventable, this is a measure of a whole nation's neglect. A society imperils its own future when, out of negligence or contempt, it overlooks the need of children to be reared in a family ... or when, in the midst of plenty, some families cannot give their children adequate food and shelter, safe activity and rest, and an opportunity to grow into full adulthood as people who can care for and cherish other human beings like themselves.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Neglect of pruning does not kill the vine, but causes it to ramify immoderately, and grow wild.
quotes.author: William Warburton

quotes.quote: It cannot be when the root is neglected that what springs from it will be well ordered.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You can only end a negotiation for peace if you begin it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quotes.quote: To win a negotiation you have to show you're willing to walk away. And the best way to show you're willing to walk away is to walk away.
quotes.author: Michael Weston

quotes.quote: The only thing certain about any negotiation is that it will lead to another negotiation.
quotes.author: Leigh Steinberg

quotes.quote: In any negotiation, the one who first gives a number is the loser.
quotes.author: Kenneth Eade

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing in any negotiation, almost, is making sure that you strip it of the emotion and deal with the facts. And there was a considerable challenge to that here and understandably so.
quotes.author: Howard Baker

quotes.quote: Before a negotiation can proceed and be completed, what is outside the scope of negotiation needs to be agreed.
quotes.author: Christine Lagarde

quotes.quote: Either we're going to solve this by realistic negotiation or there will be blood on the border.
quotes.author: Tom Metzger

quotes.quote: During a negotiation, it would be wise not to take anything personally. If you leave personalities out of it, you will be able to see opportunities more objectively.
quotes.author: Brian Koslow

quotes.quote: Relationships are a constant negotiation and balance.
quotes.author: Claire Danes

quotes.quote: The negotiations must address all aspects, both peace and withdrawal.
quotes.author: Yitzhak Rabin

quotes.quote: In all negotiations of difficulty, a man may not look to sow and reap at once; but must prepare business, and so ripen it by degrees.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Everything is negotiable. Whether or not the negotiation is easy is another thing.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: So much of life is a negotiation - so even if you're not in business, you have opportunities to practice all around you.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.quote: No issue can be negotiated unless you first have the clout to compel negotiation.
quotes.author: Saul Alinsky

quotes.quote: Negotiation builds a team as well as a set of requirements.
quotes.author: Barry Boehm

quotes.quote: If you come to a negotiation table saying you have the final truth, that you know nothing but the truth and that is final, you will get nothing.
quotes.author: Harri Holkeri

quotes.quote: A negotiation is a strategic conflict.
quotes.author: D. Mark Kilgour & Keith W. Hipel

quotes.quote: Each negotiation is embedded in a larger context of co-being, which involves empathy and awareness of common goal/condition.
quotes.author: Bilyana Martinovski

quotes.quote: We cannot negotiate with people who say what's mine is mine and what's yours is negotiable.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Negotiation is like an athletic contest; Momentum is paramount!!
quotes.author: Dr. Jim Hennig

quotes.quote: Negotiation talks are the best way to solve anything. We must replace wars and weapons with negotiations and talks.
quotes.author: Akbar Ganji

quotes.quote: Every day's a negotiation and sometimes it's done with guns.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Any negotiation on the basis of land for peace is a fatal mistake.
quotes.author: Avigdor Lieberman

quotes.quote: The trick to negotiation was to hold all the cards going in and, even if you didn't, to try to look as though you did.
quotes.author: Eoin Colfer

quotes.quote: If you are planning on doing business with someone again, don't be too tough in the negotiations. If you're going to skin a cat, don't keep it as a house cat.
quotes.author: Marvin S. Levin

quotes.quote: Negotiation means getting the best of your opponent.
quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

quotes.quote: Negotiations are a euphemism for capitulation if the shadow of power is not cast across the bargaining table.
quotes.author: George P. Shultz

quotes.quote: Negotiation in the classic diplomatic sense assumes parties more anxious to agree than to disagree.
quotes.author: Dean Acheson

quotes.quote: Conflict is good in a negotiation process. it's the clash of two ideas, which then, all being well, produces a third idea.
quotes.author: Luke Roberts

quotes.quote: Negotiating a deal can only take place when there are two parties. If you wait too long, the other party may already have negotiated a deal with someone else.
quotes.author: Robert Irwin

quotes.quote: We make our friends; we make our enemies; but God makes our next door neighbor.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Don't throw stones at your neighbors if your own windows are glass.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Even the devil's eyes can't be as sharp as the neighbors'.
quotes.author: Heinrich Boll

quotes.quote: A bad neighbor is a misfortune, as much as a good one is a great blessing.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: A good neighbor sometimes cuts your morning up to mince-meat of the very smallest talk, then helps to sugar her bohea at night with your reputation.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: All will concede that in order to have good neighbors, we must also be good neighbors. That applies in every field of human endeavor.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: The Bible tells us to love our neighbors, and also to love our enemies; probably because generally they are the same people.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: If you injure your neighbour, better not do it by halves.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: We all have neighbors. Greet them on the sidewalk or in the elevator, but try not to peer through their windows. Windows are to look out from, not into.
quotes.author: Alexandra Stoddard

quotes.quote: They who are all things to their neighbors cease to be anything to themselves.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: How you can have dreams when your neighbors have nightmares.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Someone who loves a neighbor allows him to be as he is, as he was, and as he will be.
quotes.author: Michel Quoist

quotes.quote: All human beings are my neighbors. We share the same planet.
quotes.author: Ana Monnar

quotes.quote: To hear that your neighbor was worse off than yourself was not an altogether unpleasant experience.
quotes.author: Lizette Woodworth Reese

quotes.quote: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbors, and laugh at them in our turn?
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: To do exactly as your neighbors do is the only sensible rule.
quotes.author: Emily Post

quotes.quote: Good fences make good neighbours.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: If you burn your neighbors house down, it doesn't make your house look any better.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Be at war with your vices, at peace with your neighbors, and let every new year find you a better man.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A good neighbor is a fellow who smiles at you over the back fence, but doesn't climb over it.
quotes.author: Arthur Baer

quotes.quote: Few of us could bear to have ourselves for neighbors.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The supreme satisfaction is to be able to despise one's neighbor and this fact goes far to account for religious intolerance. It is evidently consoling to reflect that the people next door are headed for hell.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: You can be a good neighbor only if you have good neighbors.
quotes.author: Howard E. Koch

quotes.quote: We should learn to live and love our neighbors as ourselves for the sake of peace and progress.
quotes.author: David McCallum

quotes.quote: Good neighbors always spy on you to make sure you are doing well.
quotes.author: Pawan Mishra

quotes.quote: If you want to annoy your neighbors, tell the truth about them.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.quote: There are many who dare not kill themselves for fear of what the neighbours will say.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: A man is called selfish not for pursuing his own good, but for neglecting his neighbor's.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: Love thy neighbor, and if it requires that you bend your understanding of the truth, the Truth will understand.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Nothing makes you more tolerant of a neighbor's noisy party than being there.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: A little nepotism never hurt nobody, honey. If you got it, use it. Press on with it. Remind them of it.
quotes.author: Lena Horne

quotes.quote: Nepotism is the bedrock of social existence.
quotes.author: Adam Bellow

quotes.quote: I don't believe in nepotism. I don't much like the idea of parents who interfere.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.quote: I made nepotism an art form, so I get to work with a lot of relatives and they're part of it.
quotes.author: Garry Marshall

quotes.quote: This country has moved away from the politics of caste, nepotism, and appeasement.
quotes.author: Amit Shah

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, nepotism has been there. It's always going to be there. Don't expect it to change.
quotes.author: Amyra Dastur

quotes.quote: I think the debate around nepotism is futile because I am an outsider and I know that there is no compensation of talent.
quotes.author: Badshah

quotes.quote: I've always been, with acting, very hesitant to get myself into situations where I would be accused of nepotism.
quotes.author: Bryce Dallas Howard

quotes.quote: Despotism favors the despot, nepotism favors the despot's genes.
quotes.author: Danielle Tremblay

quotes.quote: I stand by it. I take the criticism for it. I think it's unfair, but yes, there is a thing about nepotism, and we all try to respect it.
quotes.author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

quotes.quote: When in doubt, you bring in relatives. Nepotism is a part of my work.
quotes.author: Garry Marshall

quotes.quote: A doctor's son can become a doctor, and no one screams nepotism. I don't understand why, in this industry, people keep saying 'nepotism, nepotism.'
quotes.author: Soni Razdan

quotes.quote: Nepotism is the lowest and least imaginative form of corruption.
quotes.author: Daniel Alarcón

quotes.quote: Nepotism can get you very far in the world if you’ve got the right connections.
quotes.author: Lauren Kunze

quotes.quote: No one remembers how you got a chance, they only remember what you did with it.
quotes.author: Stewart Stafford

quotes.quote: With a blade at your throat, a well-connected uncle or a wealthy mother could not save you. Only you could save yourself.
quotes.author: Natalia Marx

quotes.quote: Institutional nepotism might be tolerated in prosperous times. Setbacks can become crises, however, when there is incompetence in key positions at crucial moments.
quotes.author: Stewart Stafford

quotes.quote: Ours is the God who only got the job because his brother runs several successful universes.
quotes.author: T.J. Kirk

quotes.quote: Like the good ape he is, man is a social animal, characterized by cronyism, nepotism, corruption and gossip.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quotes.quote: One would be lying if they say nepotism doesn't exist.
quotes.author: Huma Qureshi

quotes.quote: I can tolerate anything but corruption and nepotism.
quotes.author: Naveen Patnaik

quotes.quote: Acting is a fair business. If you are not going to bring in the audience, no nepotism will work.
quotes.author: Soni Razdan

quotes.quote: Nepotism sometimes can be a lose-lose situation.
quotes.author: Vikram Chatwal

quotes.quote: The word nepotism comes, in fact, from nipote, Italian for nephew.
quotes.author: Ross King

quotes.quote: Political donations are a form of nepotism.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Nepotism made it extremely difficult to function as a manager in certain high altitude observatories.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: At the root of every form of ungodliness, injustice, nepotism, selfishness, every rivalry and competitive jealousy, is the monster called greed.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: A nerd's brain is the most sexiest thing on this planet.
quotes.author: Suru

quotes.quote: Nerd life is so much better than regular life.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: So you're a little weird? Work it! A little different? Own it! Better to be a nerd than one of the herd!
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Everyone's a nerd inside. I don't care how cool you are.
quotes.author: Channing Tatum

quotes.quote: A true nerd knows the difference between 2-D and 3-D, and chooses 2-D every frickin' time!
quotes.author: Ryohgo Narita

quotes.quote: I read everything. I've always got a book on the go and I'm really nerdy about it, I get through books and don't remember anything about them afterwards. But I read all sorts, from classic to contemporary.
quotes.author: Rebecca Hall

quotes.quote: If you like nerds, raise your hand. If you don't, raise your standards.
quotes.author: Violet Haberdasher

quotes.quote: That's what I love about geeks, that they can call themselves a geek and be proud of it. I love that.
quotes.author: Doug Jones

quotes.quote: I will take a serious approach to a subject usually treated lightly, which is a nerdy thing to do.
quotes.author: Benjamin Nugent

quotes.quote: I think that nerds, if you want to call them that, have only gotten more hip and assimilated into the culture.
quotes.author: Al Yankovic

quotes.quote: No one messes around with a nerd's computer and escapes unscathed.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Never argue with the data.
quotes.author: Sheen

quotes.quote: All the geniuses and greats are really just nerds with experience.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: That's the wonderful thing with nerds: they're enthusiasts. Not having a life means you get to love things with a passion and nobody bothers you about it.
quotes.author: John Burnside

quotes.quote: The nerds are the ones that make the films and do loads of other really cool stuff in their life.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Sitting by your side, I realised that you are the only proton whom I want to revolve and spend my lifetime, I feel, lets be the hydrogen model for the rest of our lives.
quotes.author: Vishal Kanhaiya

quotes.quote: I get obsessed by little nerdy things in my corner that no one else is interested in.
quotes.author: BjÃ¶rk

quotes.quote: Nerds are far more interesting human in later life.
quotes.author: Alyson Hannigan

quotes.quote: Nerd. One whose unbridled passion for something defines who they are as a person, without fear of other people's judgment.
quotes.author: Zachary Levi

quotes.quote: Wit seduces by signaling intelligence without nerdiness.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: At a nerd wedding, they don't say, "I do." They say, "I accept the terms and condition.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: My best definition of a nerd: someone who asks you to explain an aphorism.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Nerds are just deep, and neurotic, fans. Needy fans. We're all nerds, on one subject or another.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lethem

quotes.quote: Charm is the ability to insult people without offending them; nerdiness the reverse.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Be nice to nerds. Chances are you'll end up working for one.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Geeks are people who love something so much that all the details matter.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.quote: Nerds get caught up in minutiae, because there is a tremendous and fulfilling sesne of control in understanding every single detail of a thing more than any other living creature.
quotes.author: Chris Hardwick

quotes.quote: His nerdiness though repellant to the world, his wisdom grabbed the attention of his special one.
quotes.author: Shruti Bhadani

quotes.quote: In fact, the world needs more nerds.
quotes.author: Ben Bernanke

quotes.quote: The thing I've always been most nerdy about is technology, in general.
quotes.author: Zachary Levi

quotes.quote: What nerds miss is that it takes hard work to make sales look easy.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.quote: All the geniuses and greats are really just nerds with experience.
quotes.author: A. D. Posey

quotes.quote: Everyone's a nerd inside. I don't care how cool you are.
quotes.author: Channing Tatum

quotes.quote: People that were a little nerdy in high school would look up to me and know it gets better.
quotes.author: Al Yankovic

quotes.quote: Weird: of strange or extraordinary character.
quotes.author: Merriam Webster

quotes.quote: When life gives you questions, google has answers.
quotes.author: AJ Carpio

quotes.quote: The nerds are the ones that make the films and do loads of other really cool stuff in their life.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.quote: My best definition of a nerd: someone who asks you to explain an aphorism.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: The imagination of the genius vastly surpasses his intellect; the intellect of the academic vastly surpasses his imagination.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: To a great mind. Nothing is little.
quotes.author: Sherlock Holmes

quotes.quote: I hang out with the nerdy people, they have a different sense of humor than most kids.
quotes.author: Liam Aiken

quotes.quote: I will take a serious approach to a subject usually treated lightly, which is a nerdy thing to do.
quotes.author: Benjamin Nugent

quotes.quote: The fool generalizes the particular; the nerd particularizes the general; some do both; and the wise does neither.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: That's the wonderful thing with nerds: they're enthusiasts. Not having a life means you get to love things with a passion and nobody bothers you about it.
quotes.author: John Burnside

quotes.quote: Being a geek means never having to play it cool about how much you like something
quotes.author: Simon Pegg

quotes.quote: Be nice to nerds. Chances are you'll end up working for one.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: If you like nerds, raise your hand. If you don't, raise your standards.
quotes.author: Violet Haberdasher

quotes.quote: Nerd life is so much better than regular life.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Nerd. One whose unbridled passion for something defines who they are as a person, without fear of other people's judgement.
quotes.author: Zachary Levi

quotes.quote: Nerds are just deep, and neurotic, fans. Needy fans. We're all nerds, on one subject or another.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lethem

quotes.quote: A lot of times nerds are really artists listening to the beat of another drummer.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: A true nerd knows the difference between 2-D and 3-D, and chooses 2-D every frickin' time!
quotes.author: Ryohgo Narita

quotes.quote: Traditionally nerd-based culture is now a big sector of pop culture.
quotes.author: Chris Hardwick

quotes.quote: The call and response rituals of geeks were a thing of beauty, and allowed said geeks to identify each other across time and space.
quotes.author: Atom Yang

quotes.quote: Being a nerd is not about what you love, it's about how you love it.
quotes.author: Wil Wheaten

quotes.quote: Be nice to nerds. You may end up working for them. We all could.
quotes.author: Charles J. Sykes

quotes.quote: So you're a little weird? Work it! Different? Own it! Better to be a nerd than one of the herd!
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: A nerd is someone who uses a telephone to talk to other people about telephones.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: I get obsessed by little nerdy things in my corner that no one else is interested in.
quotes.author: Bjork

quotes.quote: He that struggles with us strengthens our nerves, and sharpens our skill. Our antagonist is our helper.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: I have a high respect for your nerves. They are my old friends.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Laugh at yourself, but don't ever aim your doubt at yourself. Be bold. When you embark for strange places, don't leave any of yourself safely on shore. Have the nerve to go into unexplored territory.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: It destroys one's nerves to be amiable every day to the same human being.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: In every man's heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibrations of beauty.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: I think the whole nerves thing comes into play when we worry about what other people and society will think.
quotes.author: Dana Plato

quotes.quote: A game of chess is not an examination of knowledge; it is a battle of nerves.
quotes.author: David Bronstein

quotes.quote: If you trust your nerve as well as your skill, you're capable of a lot more than you can imagine.
quotes.author: Debi Thomas

quotes.quote: Losing a position is aggravating, whereas losing your nerve is devastating.
quotes.author: Ed Seykota

quotes.quote: If your Nerve, deny you - Go above your Nerve
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: You need a certain amount of nerve to be a writer.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Nerves provide me with energy... It's when I don't have them, when I feel at ease, that's when I get worried.
quotes.author: Mike Nichols

quotes.quote: Unnerved, the nerve, you're nervous, nervous that I'm right.
quotes.author: Sara Quin

quotes.quote: Nerves and butterflies are fine - they're a physical sign that you're mentally ready and eager. You have to get the butterflies to fly in formation, that's the trick.
quotes.author: Steve Bull

quotes.quote: Set up another case bartender! The best thing for a case of nerves is a case of Scotch.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: It's a funny thing, the less people have to live for, the less nerve they have to risk losing nothing.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Acting touches nerves you have absolutely no control over.
quotes.author: Alan Rickman

quotes.quote: I have no nerves, no emotion, no pressure.
quotes.author: Eileen Collins

quotes.quote: When a doctor does go wrong he is the first of criminals. He has nerve and he has knowledge.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Competition can be the most nerve-racking experience. Some people just thrive on it.
quotes.author: Itzhak Perlman

quotes.quote: Often it feels like I am breathing today only because a few years back I had no idea which nerve to cut.
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: Being nervous isn't bad. It just means something important is happening.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Every time you go out there, you want to be a little nervous, have a little bit of butterflies in your stomach and get the juices flowing.
quotes.author: Taryne Mowatt

quotes.quote: Being nervous when talking in front of a lot of people. Sweaty hands, shakey voice, forgetting what your about to say.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nervousness always provokes mistakes, and mistakes lead to easy convictions.
quotes.author: S.R. Ford

quotes.quote: I'm a very anxious, nervy kind of loser in many ways, and I get very stressed and a little tense.
quotes.author: Ed Weeks

quotes.quote: That nervous feeling when you think about that certain someone and how you're about to see them soon.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nervous people tend to overreact.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: When you feel nervous, recall your pride.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: If you're not nervous then you're not paying attention.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: One of the symptoms of an approaching nervous breakdown is the belief that one's work is terribly important.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: To show his nervousness was not shameful; only to admit it.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: A well adjusted person is one who makes the same mistake twice without getting nervous.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: Most beginners are too anxious for results. Real progress takes place over a long period of time.
quotes.author: Mary Beth McKenzie

quotes.quote: Being nervous actually kept me very tense.
quotes.author: Kate Bush

quotes.quote: The way to secure success is to be more anxious about obtaining than about deserving it.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The sad truth is that excellence makes people nervous.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: Time flies when you are anxious!
quotes.author: Maria Bamford

quotes.quote: Butterflies in your stomach. More like killer bees.
quotes.author: Kami Garcia

quotes.quote: Don't try to be what you're not. If you're nervous, be nervous. If you're shy, be shy. It's cute.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.quote: The mind that is anxious about the future is miserable.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: To talk to someone who does not listen is enough to tense the devil.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: If you're not nervous, it means you don't care.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.quote: Being nervous is not something you should be ashamed of. Nervous means you care, you really want to do well.
quotes.author: Paula Creamer

quotes.quote: A nervous silence loosens tongues.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.quote: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Nervousness made her feel nauseous, almost like she had two hearts frantically beating in her chest, instead of one.
quotes.author: Caroline Hanson

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you're just thrown into something, you are more ready for it than when you have time to think it over and get nervous about it.
quotes.author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quotes.quote: When you feel afraid or nervous to do a thing then do it because the real harm which you may thus receive is less poignant than its expectation and fear.
quotes.author: Ali bin Abu-Talib

quotes.quote: A bad liver is to a Frenchman what a nervous breakdown is to an American. Everyone has had one and everyone wants to talk about it.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: A bird in a nest is secure, but that is not why God gave it wings.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: But they fly. It is what fledged birds must do, and she's always known that. The nest can't always be full.
quotes.author: Susan Fletcher

quotes.quote: The human bird shall take his first flight, filling the world with amazement, all writings with his fame, and bringing eternal glory to the nest whence he sprang.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Great men are like eagles, and build their nest on some lofty solitude.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: He who is not a bird should not build his nest over abysses.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A weaver bird's nest is an appropriate metaphor for my dreams; for both know the art of resistance.
quotes.author: MadhusmitaBeura

quotes.quote: Deep inside her heart, I was feeling my home like a hay made nest.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: When the nest becomes too small a bird is ready to spread its wings and fly.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Success is full of promise till one gets it, and then it seems like a nest from which the bird has flown.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The art of the bird is to conceal its nest both as to position and as to material, but now and then it is betrayed into weaving into its structure showy and bizarre bits of this or that, which give its secret away and which seem to violate all the traditions of its kind.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: You'll have a lot more respect for a bird after you try making a nest.
quotes.author: Cynthia Lewis

quotes.quote: No insect hangs its nest on threads as frail as those which will sustain the weight of human vanity.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: The owl goes not into the nest of the lark.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: By going and coming, a bird weaves its nest.
quotes.author: Ashanti

quotes.quote: God gives every bird its food, but He does not throw it into its nest.
quotes.author: J. G. Holland

quotes.quote: Well I know the secret places, And the nests in hedge and tree; At what doors are friendly faces, In what hearts are thoughts of me.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: And alone and without his nest shall the Eagle fly across the sun.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Heavenly bodies are nests of invisible birds.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: That the birds of worry and care fly over your head, this you cannot change, but that they build nests in your hair, this you can prevent.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: And then; the bird of her dreams couldn't find shelter in his nest. She flew away to build her own!
quotes.author: Sonali Gupta

quotes.quote: Skies tempt them to fly. Nests have them back.
quotes.author: Sonali Gupta

quotes.quote: If a bird's nest chance to be before thee in the way in any tree, or on the ground, whether they be young ones, or eggs, and the dam sitting upon the young, or upon the eggs, thou shalt not take the dam with the young: But thou shalt in any wise let the dam go, and take the young to thee; that it may be well with thee, and that thou mayest prolong thy days.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are no birds in last year's nest.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: As a bird that wandereth from her nest, so is a man that wandereth from his place.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Fixed mindset worries in the nest and the growth mindset dances on the edge.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: The 'Bird's Nest' National Stadium, which I helped to conceive, is designed to embody the Olympic spirit of 'fair competition.' It tells people that freedom is possible but needs fairness, courage and strength
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.quote: The richest people in the world look for and build networks, everyone else looks for work.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: It's all about people. It's about networking and being nice to people and not burning any bridges.
quotes.author: Mike Davidson

quotes.quote: The currency of real networking is not greed but generosity.
quotes.author: Keith Ferrazzi

quotes.quote: It isn't just what you know, and it isn't just who you know. It's actually who you know, who knows you, and what you do for a living.
quotes.author: Bob Burg

quotes.quote: The successful networkers I know, the ones receiving tons of referrals and feeling truly happy about themselves, continually put the other person's needs ahead of their own.
quotes.author: Bob Burg

quotes.quote: Network marketing gives people the opportunity, with very low risk and very low financial commitment, to build their own income-generating asset and acquire great wealth.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Network marketing is the fastest growing business model in the world today.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Network marketing is based purely on relationship selling, which is the state of the art in selling today. Small and large companies throughout the country and the world are realizing that individuals selling to their friends and associates is the future of sales, because the critical element in buying is trust.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Nothing happens until somebody sells something!
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: If you want 1 year of prosperity, grow grain. If you want 10 years of prosperity, grow trees. If you want 100 years of prosperity, grow people.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: If you are a person with big dreams and would love to support others in achieving their big dreams, then the network marketing business is definitely a business for you. You can start your business part-time at first and then as your business grows, you can help other people start their part-time business. This is a value worth having â€“ a business and people who help others make their dreams come true.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Network marketing is the big wave of the future. It's taking the place of franchising, which now requires too much capital for the average person.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Network Marketing is an equal opportunity opportunity.
quotes.author: Michael S. Clouse

quotes.quote: You only win when you help others win.
quotes.author: Paul Zane Pilzer

quotes.quote: In Network Marketing, duplication is what success looks like!
quotes.author: Michael S. Clouse

quotes.quote: It's not about finding great people, it's about becoming a great person.
quotes.author: Mark Yarnell

quotes.quote: In Network marketing, the people who attract, train and motivate the most sales people earn the most money.
quotes.author: Richard Brooke

quotes.quote: If you are doing the business right, you never have to look for strangers.
quotes.author: Don Failla

quotes.quote: You can get everything in life you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Network marketing is not a social club, it is a business. Yes, the social aspects of the business are awesome, and you will make a lot of new, interesting friends.
quotes.author: Dale Calvert

quotes.quote: There is a day you get into network marketing, but nothing happens until the day network marketing gets into you.
quotes.author: Jan Ruhe

quotes.quote: What you sow, you reap. It's a law of nature. Network Marketing is perfectly aligned with that. You get truly, exactly what you're worth! No nepotism, no favoritism. That's rare today.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: People don't trust conglomerates; they trust individuals. Network marketing brings trust and the quality of the relationship to the center of the business. And it enables you to expand indefinitely, simply by expanding the number of relationships.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: In Network Marketing, the NETWORKING always comes before the MARKETING.
quotes.author: Silke Stahl

quotes.quote: Network marketing is really the greatest source of grass-roots capitalism, because it teaches people how to take a small bit of capital, that is your time, and build the American dream.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Too many people quit just before payday in this industry. Â You gotta have a dream and you must not let anyone steal it from you. Â You can't ride two horses at the same time. Â Get in, give it all you've got for 2-3 years and you will succeed!
quotes.author: Dale Maloney

quotes.quote: Success in this industry is not in finding the right person, but in becoming the right person.
quotes.author: Dr. Forrest Shaklee

quotes.quote: Everyone is business minded until it's time to be open minded about business.
quotes.author: Hash Mfukuli

quotes.quote: Networking isn't how many people you know, it's how many people know you.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Networking is an investment in your business. It takes time and when done correctly can yield great results for years to come.
quotes.author: Diane Helbig

quotes.quote: All the time and effort put into networking can be all for naught if there is no follow-through. The same goes for sales. And leadership. And well, everything.
quotes.author: Beth Ramsay

quotes.quote: It's great to spend time at a networking event with someone you know and like. But that's not what you're there for. Your goal is to expand your network by meeting new people.
quotes.author: Beth Ramsay

quotes.quote: Networking is not about just connecting people. It's about connecting people with people, people with ideas, and people with opportunities.
quotes.author: Michele Jennae

quotes.quote: Networking means the act of exchanging information with people who can help you professionally.
quotes.author: Michele Jennae

quotes.quote: The way of the world is meeting people through other people.
quotes.author: Robert Kerrigan

quotes.quote: If you want 1 year of prosperity, grow grain. If you want 10 years of prosperity, grow trees. If you want 100 years of prosperity, grow people.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: It's all about people. It's about networking and being nice to people and not burning any bridges.
quotes.author: Mike Davidson

quotes.quote: The successful networkers I know, the ones receiving tons of referrals and feeling truly happy about themselves, continually put the other person's needs ahead of their own.
quotes.author: Bob Burg

quotes.quote: The currency of real networking is not greed but generosity.
quotes.author: Keith Ferrazzi

quotes.quote: Networking with integrity creates a greater willingness of all parties to be part of a human conduit to serve as energy and resource to one another. Sometimes you will give more than you receive and sometimes you will get back more than you give. It's not about keeping score.
quotes.author: Chris London

quotes.quote: Network selectively ' You never know when someone might say yes' is marketing for dummies. Take the time to build a profile of your ideal customers, and target your networking activities to reach them. Speak to those who are already predisposed to want what you offer. Almost any profile is better than anyone with a pulse'.
quotes.author: Steve Pavlina

quotes.quote: Networking is an essential part of building wealth.
quotes.author: Armstrong Williams

quotes.quote: My Golden Rule of Networking is simple: Don't keep score.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Networking is rubbish; have friends instead.
quotes.author: Steve Winwood

quotes.quote: It's not about finding great people, it's about becoming a great person.
quotes.author: Mark Yarnell

quotes.quote: Networking is more about farming than it is about hunting.
quotes.author: Ivan Misner

quotes.quote: Networking is an enrichment program, not an entitlement program.
quotes.author: Susan RoAne

quotes.quote: Networking is the No. 1 unwritten rule of success in business.
quotes.author: Sallie Krawcheck

quotes.quote: Networking that matters is helping people achieve their goals.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Networking is simply the cultivating of mutually beneficial, give and take, win-win relationships. It works best, however, when emphasizing the "give" part.
quotes.author: Bob Burg

quotes.quote: Networking is marketing. Marketing yourself, marketing your uniqueness, marketing what you stand for.
quotes.author: Christine Comaford-Lynch

quotes.quote: Instead of better glasses, your network gives you better eyes.
quotes.author: Ronald Burt

quotes.quote: The richest people in the world look for and build networks, everyone else looks for work.
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: What makes networking work is that it sets up win-win situations in which all parties involved get to take something home. Networking is a sharing process. Until you understand that, you won't have much of a network.
quotes.author: Earl G. Graves, Sr.

quotes.quote: The true value of networking doesn't come from how many people we can meet but rather how many people we can introduce to others.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: I would rather earn 1% off a 100 people's efforts than 100% of my own efforts.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: If people like you they'll listen to you, but if they trust you they'll do business with you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A really important part of networking is actually about what you bring to the table-not just what you want to get out of it. Contribution is a big part of networking success.
quotes.author: Gina Romero

quotes.quote: Pulling a good network together takes effort, sincerity and time.
quotes.author: Alan Collins

quotes.quote: Maybe the human brain is an object beyond the reach of metaphor, for the simple reason that it is the only object capable of creating metaphors to describe itself. There really is nothing else like it. The human brain creates the human mind, and then the human mind tries to underhand the human brain, however long it takes and whatever the cost.
quotes.author: Luke Dittrich
