quotes.quote: Neuro-linguistic programming is to Neuroscience what Astrology is to Astronomy.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Neuroscience can be seen as offering metaphors that point in a general direction, but don't exactly match anyone's individual experience.
quotes.author: Bonnie Badenoch

quotes.quote: There's an old rule in neuroscience that does not alter with age: use it or lose it. It is a very hopeful principle when applied to critical thought in the reading brain because it implies choice.
quotes.author: Maryanne Wolf

quotes.quote: The thing you realize when you get into studying neuroscience, even a little bit, is that everything is connected to everything else. So it's as if the brain is trying to use everything at its disposal - what it is seeing, what it is hearing, what is the temperature, past experience.
quotes.author: Paul Allen

quotes.quote: Neuroscience over the next 50 years is going to introduce things that are mind-blowing.
quotes.author: David Eagleman

quotes.quote: I think it's a natural human tendency, when you read something, you tend to read a lot of your prejudices into it. And neuroscience is like a lot of disciplines - it has fashions; things change.
quotes.author: Sam Kean

quotes.quote: My philosophy is really based on humility. I don't think we know enough to fix either diagnostics or therapeutics. The future of psychiatry is clinical neuroscience, based on a much deeper understanding of the brain.
quotes.author: Thomas R. Insel

quotes.quote: Within psychology and neuroscience, some new and rigorous experimental paradigms for studying consciousness have helped it begin to overcome the stigma that has been attached to the topic for most of this century.
quotes.author: David Chalmers

quotes.quote: There is no scientific study more vital to man than the study of his own brain. Our entire view of the universe depends on it.
quotes.author: Francis Crick

quotes.quote: The brain is the organ of destiny. It holds within its humming mechanism secrets that will determine the future of the human race.
quotes.author: Wilder Penfield

quotes.quote: When it comes to exploring the mind in the framework of cognitive neuroscience, the maximal yield of data comes from integrating what a person experiences - the first person - with what the measurements show - the third person.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: Brain: an apparatus with which we think we think.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Although many philosophers used to dismiss the relevance of neuroscience on grounds that what mattered was “the software, not the hardware”, increasingly philosophers have come to recognize that understanding how the brain works is essential to understanding the mind.
quotes.author: Patricia Churchland

quotes.quote: The elegant study... is consistent with the themes of modern cognitive neuroscience . Every aspect of thought and emotion is rooted in brain structure and function, including many psychological disorders and, presumably, genius. The study confirms that the brain is a modular system comprising multiple intelligences, mostly nonverbal.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: Neuroscience has contributed so much in just a few decades to how we think about human nature and how we know ourselves.
quotes.author: Jonah Lehrer

quotes.quote: Neuroscience is the field of study that endeavors to make sense of such diverse questions; at the same time, it points the way toward the effective treatment of dysfunctions. The exchange of information among a half-dozen branches of science and the clinical practice of mental health have shaped a new scientific approach to the study of the brain .
quotes.author: Sandra Ackerman

quotes.quote: Fright comes off me when I walk in the street / Embark on my feat of neuroscience's discoveries / Acid on your brain makes the holes seem lovely / And you thought I couldn't rock this way?
quotes.author: Swollen Members

quotes.quote: Neuroscience is currently one of the most rapidly growing areas of science.
quotes.author: Academic Press

quotes.quote: At the behavioral level of neuroscience research, emphasis is on the interactions between individuals and their collective environment.
quotes.author: Academic Press

quotes.quote: One of the great mysteries of neuroscience is how systems elaborating pleasure and pain are organized at the level of specific neural systems.
quotes.author: Academic Press

quotes.quote: It has become evident for me on closed-loop approaches in neuroscience are ripe to be used for a better understanding of the brain.
quotes.author: Ahmed El Hady

quotes.quote: A primary goal in systems neuroscience is to characterize the statistical relationship between environmental stimuli and neural response.
quotes.author: Ahmed El Hady

quotes.quote: Understanding how information is presented and processed in the brain is one of the most important questions in neuroscience.
quotes.author: Ahmed El Hady

quotes.quote: Neuroscience and neurology are experiencing rapid development of new tools and technology for modifying neural activity.
quotes.author: Ahmed El Hady

quotes.quote: The next generation of neuroscience questions are likely to center on how such dynamics--and not simply activation/deactivation--are related to function and behavior.
quotes.author: Ahmed El Hady

quotes.quote: Neuroscience refers to the scientific investigation of the nervous system in all its aspect.
quotes.author: Churchill Livingstone Elsevier

quotes.quote: As soon as people hear the term 'neuroscience' they think 'Okay... this is going to difficult.'
quotes.author: Churchill Livingstone Elsevier

quotes.quote: One important learning point that arose various times in the history of neuroscience is the necessity of observation and experimentation - without these, science becomes dogma and discoveries and progress are stifled.
quotes.author: Churchill Livingstone Elsevier

quotes.quote: We are at a unique point in the history of neuroscience--in the next several years, we have an opportunity to amplify our previous achievements.
quotes.author: Willian T Newsome

quotes.quote: You must never forget that greatness does not guarantee happiness but goodness always does.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Never forget that only dead fish swim with the stream.
quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.quote: Never forget the power of silence, that massively disconcerting pause which goes on and on and may at last induce an opponent to babble and backtrack nervously.
quotes.author: Lance Morrow

quotes.quote: We forget all too soon the things we thought we could never forget.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Never forget posterity when devising a policy. Never think of posterity when making a speech.
quotes.author: Robert Menzies

quotes.quote: Never forget what a person says to you when they are angry.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Never forget that the key to the situation lies in the will and not in the imagination.
quotes.author: Evelyn Underhill

quotes.quote: We never forget those who make us blush.
quotes.author: Jean-Francois de La Harpe

quotes.quote: Never forget: We are alive within mysteries.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Never forget that all you have is all you need.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: People will never forget how you made them feel.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Never forget to see the beauty, even in ugliness.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: One never forgets faces one wholeheartedly detests.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: Never forget that justice is what love looks like in public
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: Never forget the importance of living with unbridled exhilaration.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Never forget what you learned in the light when you are in the dark.
quotes.author: Bryan Davis

quotes.quote: Let us never forget that what we are is more important than what we do.
quotes.author: Hudson Taylor

quotes.quote: Never forget that if you leave your law to judges and your religion to bishops, you will presently find yourself without either law or religion.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Never forget that when we are silent, we are one. And when we speak we are two.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: Never forget the morals instilled in you and what really matters in Life. Never let other voices of other people drown out your inner voice.
quotes.author: Trey Songz

quotes.quote: Never forget that God tests his real friends more severely than the lukewarm ones.
quotes.author: Kathryn Hulme

quotes.quote: Never forget: the secret of creating riches for oneself is to create them for others.
quotes.author: John Templeton

quotes.quote: Never forget that the most important thing in life is the quality of life we lead.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.quote: I'll never forget where I'm from. It's essential to remain humble and evolving.
quotes.author: Freida Pinto

quotes.quote: Never forget that what becomes timeless was once truly new.
quotes.author: Nicolas Ghesquiere

quotes.quote: Never forget that the most political thing you can ever do is follow your heart.
quotes.author: RuPaul

quotes.quote: Never forget that the most powerful force on earth is love.
quotes.author: Nelson Rockefeller

quotes.quote: One must never forget that life is unfair. But sometimes, with a bit of luck, this works in your favour.
quotes.author: Peter Mayle

quotes.quote: Never forget that no military leader has ever become great without audacity.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: Never settle for anything less than you want.
quotes.author: PJ Harvey

quotes.quote: Never settle for being a character in someone else'Â’s story when you are meant to be the author of your own.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you haven't found it yet, keep looking.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: When you accept the fact that your true identity includes being an overcomer, you will never settle for less than a miracle.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: Don't ever settle for less than you deserve, because once you start to settle you always will.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Know your worth. Know the difference between what you're getting and what you deserve.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never settle with words what you can accomplish with a flame-thrower.
quotes.author: Bruce Feirstein

quotes.quote: Never settle for anything less than your best.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Don't rush and never settle. If it's meant to be, it will be.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One key to success is demanding more than adequacy, never settling for good enough and always doing a little bit more.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Never settle for less than your dreams, somewhere, sometime, someday, somehow, you'll find them.
quotes.author: Danielle Steel

quotes.quote: When you refuse to settle for less than the best...the best tends to track you down.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: The minute you settle for less than you deserve, you get even less than you settled for.
quotes.author: Maureen Dowd

quotes.quote: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Never settle. There is no need to rush.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: Be awesome. Live life to the fullest. Shoot for the stars and never settle.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: If you're gonna settle for anything; settle for greatness.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never settle for anything less than extraordinary.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't settle for what life gives you; make life better and build something.
quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

quotes.quote: Never settle for the crumbs of life.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Never settle on a life you don't want when God is trying to give you a better life.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Life is too short to settle for something less than spectacular.
quotes.author: Paul Hudson

quotes.quote: Never settle for average.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Never settle for that which is easy and comfortable or the necessity of seeking that which is difficult and uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Never settle for less than you deserve. Demand the best, accept nothing less.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never settle for the path of least resistance.
quotes.author: Lee Ann Womack

quotes.quote: If you settle for what you've got, you deserve what you get.
quotes.author: Kathie Lee Gifford

quotes.quote: If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Ten years from now, make sure you can say that you CHOSE your life, you didn't SETTLE for it.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Don't settle, as with all matters of the heart you'll know when you find it
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Never surrender your dream to your challenges, struggles and obstacles. No matter how hard you fall, always get back up and keep trying like all the great influential people did.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Never surrender opportunity for security.
quotes.author: Branch Rickey

quotes.quote: Nothing in the world is as fearsome as a bloody, battered opponent who will never surrender.
quotes.author: Gerry Spence

quotes.quote: If we are to be who we are; if we are to accomplish great things; then we must learn the heart's most essential rule: NEVER SURRENDER DREAMS
quotes.author: J. Michael Straczynski

quotes.quote: If you fall behind, run faster. Never give up, never surrender, and rise up against the odds.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Never surrender, it's all about the faith you got: don't ever stop, just push it 'till you hit the top and if you drop, at least you know you gave your all to be true to you, that way you can never fall.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: We'll never surrender, we'll win or die you've got to fight the next generation and the next ..... and I'll live more than my hanger
quotes.author: Omar Mukhtar

quotes.quote: An honest man can never surrender an honest doubt.
quotes.author: Walter Malone

quotes.quote: Here's a summary for the time or attention challenged: Never surrender freedom for laws that can't affect criminals; they disobey laws for a living.
quotes.author: Wayne LaPierre

quotes.quote: We shall defend our island, whatever the cost may be, we shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight on the landing grounds, we shall fight in the fields and in the streets, we shall fight in the hills; we shall never surrender.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Do not yield. Do not flinch. Stand up. Stand up with our President and fight. We're Americans. We're Americans, and we'll never surrender. They will.
quotes.author: John McCain

quotes.quote: For to save mankind's future freedom, we must face up to any risk that is necessary. We will always seek peace
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: We never surrendered. We always kept in our hearts the most noble, beautiful feeling that sets human beings apart: hope.
quotes.author: Manel Loureiro

quotes.quote: Never surrender to cynicism, even if you suspect it would get the critics on your side.
quotes.author: Roselyn Bosch

quotes.quote: Never surrender to you're passions. Dream and live to excess.
quotes.author: Truth Devour

quotes.quote: Letting go of someone we love is the hardest thing we will ever do. Some people never surrender to love for the fear of being hurt. But to not have loved, to not have felt the immense joy it brings, would have been a far worse kind of death.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: Israel will never surrender to hatred.
quotes.author: Benny Gantz

quotes.quote: Lovers never surrender to each other, lovers simply surrender to love.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: There is nothing like a newborn baby to renew your spirit and to buttress your resolve to make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Virginia Kelley

quotes.quote: A baby is born with a need to be loved – and never outgrows it.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: For having a baby's sweet face so close to your own, for so long a time as it takes to nurse 'em, is a great tonic for a sad soul.
quotes.author: Erica Eisdorfer

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like falling in love again, both with your husband and your child.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.quote: Babies are living dolls with dancing smiles that come from the stars to still our hearts.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: A new baby is like the beginning of all things wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
quotes.author: Eda J. Le Shan

quotes.quote: Those eyes so ecstatic with the gleam of new life, the wide laugh that no doubt uses up so much of the breath contained in those tiny lungs.
quotes.author: Saim Cheeda

quotes.quote: There are words in the soul of a newborn baby, wanting and waiting to be written.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Making the decision to have a child is momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: Every child born into the world is a new thought of God, an ever-fresh and radiant possibility.
quotes.author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

quotes.quote: Babies are the buds of imagination that are ready to bloom with lights of love and affection.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Loving a baby is a circular business, a kind of feedback loop. The more you give the more you get and the more you get the more you feel like giving.
quotes.author: Penelope Leach

quotes.quote: I think that I see something deeper, more infinite, more eternal than the ocean in the expression of the eyes of a little baby when it wakes in the morning and coos or laughs because it sees the sun shining on its cradle.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: With every newborn baby a little sun rises.
quotes.author: Irmgard Erath

quotes.quote: Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
quotes.author: Taylor Hanson

quotes.quote: Having a child is surely the most beautifully irrational act that two people in love can commit.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Each time a new baby is born there is a possibility of reprieve. Each child is a new being, a potential prophet, a new spiritual prince, a new spark of light precipitated into the outer darkness.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: A babe in the house is a well-spring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: If your baby is 'beautiful and perfect, never cries or fusses, sleeps on schedule and burps on demand, an angel all the time,' you're the grandma.
quotes.author: Theresa Bloomingdale

quotes.quote: Just like a plant needs light and space to grow, a child needs love and freedom to unfold.
quotes.author: Sigrid Leo

quotes.quote: A baby is a blank check made payable to the human race.
quotes.author: Barbara Christine Seifert

quotes.quote: Babies are bits of stardust, blown from the hand of God.
quotes.author: Barretto

quotes.quote: When babies look beyond you and giggle maybe they're seeing Angels.
quotes.author: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.quote: Babies are like little suns that, in a magical way, bring warmth, happiness and light into our lives.
quotes.author: Kartini Diapari-Oengider

quotes.quote: Ah, babies! They're more than just adorable little creatures on whom you can blame your farts.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: Life doesn't get more real than having a newborn at home.
quotes.author: Eric Church

quotes.quote: Words can not express the joy of new life.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: A father is always making his baby into a little woman. And when she is a woman he turns her back again.
quotes.author: Enid Bagnol

quotes.quote: Every baby born into the world is a finer one than the last.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Let go of yesterday. Let today be a new beginning and be the best that you can, and you'll get to where God wants you to be.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: No river can return to its source, yet all rivers must have a beginning.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Dissatisfaction is a great starting point, for it is right there that we have the most power, strength, and energy to push change through.
quotes.author: David DeNotaris

quotes.quote: For last year's words belong to last year's language. And next year's words await another voice. And to make an end is to make a beginning.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.author: Carl Bard

quotes.quote: Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Whatever you do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius and power and magic in it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Every day is a new beginning. Treat it that way. Stay away from what might have been, and look at what can be.
quotes.author: Marsha Petrie Sue

quotes.quote: You can learn new things at any time in your life if you're willing to be a beginner. If you actually learn to like being a beginner, the whole world opens up to you.
quotes.author: Barabra Sher

quotes.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.author: St. Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: One can begin so many things with a new person! - even begin to be a better man.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Morning will come, it has no choice.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Starting over is an acceptance of a past we can't change, an unrelenting conviction that the future can be different, and the stubborn wisdom to use the past to make the future what the past was not.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Every sunset is an opportunity to reset.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: Every man should be born again on the first day of January. Start with a fresh page.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Begin today. Declare out loud to the universe that you are willing to let go of struggle and eager to learn through joy.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: The secret to living the life of your dreams is to start living the life of your dreams today, in every little way you possibly can.
quotes.author: Mike Dooley

quotes.quote: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestly

quotes.quote: You don't need endless time and perfect conditions. Do it now. Do it today. Do it for twenty minutes and watch your heart start beating.
quotes.author: Barbara Sher

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand leagues begins with a single step. So we must never neglect any work of peace within our reach, however small.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Joe Sabah

quotes.quote: What the caterpillar calls the end the rest of the world calls a butterfly.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Dreams are renewable. No matter what our age or condition, there are still untapped possibilities within us and new beauty waiting to be born.
quotes.author: Dale Turner

quotes.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless hehas the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: A time comes when you need to stop waiting for the man you want to become and start being the man you want to be.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: If you're trying to create a company, it's like baking a cake. You have to have all the ingredients in the right proportion.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: What do you need to start a business? Three simple things: know your product better than anyone, know your customer, and have a burning desire to succeed.
quotes.author: Dave Thomas

quotes.quote: A good idea for a new business tends not to occur in isolation, and often the window of opportunity is very small. So speed is of the essence.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: When you are starting a new business you don't want to go after giant markets. You want to go after small markets and take over those markets quickly.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.quote: What we are trying to do is to create a new business paradigm, simply showing that business can have a human face and a social conscience.
quotes.author: Anita Roddick

quotes.quote: When starting a new business, people get blinders on. They have an idea, they stick to the idea, but they don't test it or check with their potential audience to see if this is a good idea. It happens all the time. Talk to your customers, see what they like and what you can change or not change.
quotes.author: JJ Ramberg

quotes.quote: To every trend there is a counter-trend. There are a number of pendulums operating and each creates new business opportunities
quotes.author: Patrick Dixon

quotes.quote: There's a tremendous move toward green sustainability. There are going to be tremendous new business opportunities.
quotes.author: James Canton

quotes.quote: The time to go into a new business is when it's badly run by others.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Winning new business is the way that we create and sustain jobs going forward.
quotes.author: Charles Bickers

quotes.quote: Retaining existing business is just as important as recruiting new business.
quotes.author: Mark Swanger

quotes.quote: Digital technology is changing the face of entertainment, which is helping to transform peoples' lifestyles and create exciting new business opportunities.
quotes.author: Paul Otellini

quotes.quote: Almost everything worthwhile carries with it some sort of risk, whether it's starting a new business, whether it's leaving home, whether it's getting married, or whether it's flying in space.
quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

quotes.quote: Since there is nothing so well worth having as friends, never lose a chance to make them.
quotes.author: Francesco Guicciardini

quotes.quote: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm & constant.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Blessed are they who have the gift of making friends, for it is one of God's best gifts. It involves many things, but above all, the power of going out of one's self, and appreciating whatever is noble and loving in another.
quotes.author: Thomas Hughes

quotes.quote: A man practices the art of adventure when he breaks the chain of routine and renews his life through reading new books, traveling to new places, making new friends, taking up new hobbies and adopting new viewpoints
quotes.author: Wilfred Peterson

quotes.quote: The happiest business in all the world is that of making friends, And no investment on the street pays larger dividends, For life is more than stocks and bonds, and love than rate percent, And he who gives in friendship's name shall reap what he has
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every person is a new door to a different world.
quotes.author: Six Degrees of Seperation

quotes.quote: There's not a word yet for old friends who've just met.
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.quote: Friendship can weather most things and thrive in thin soil - but it needs a little mulch of letters and phone calls and small silly presents every so often - just to save it from drying out completely.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: [It] is the juvenal period of life when friendships are formed, and habits established, that will stick by one.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Be gracious to all men, but choose the best to be your friends.
quotes.author: Isocrates

quotes.quote: Friends are like the stars; they are always there, but you only see their true brightness at the darkest times.
quotes.author: Jeremy Arnold

quotes.quote: The glory of friendship is not the outstretched hand, nor the kindly smile, nor the joy of companionship; it is the spiritual inspiration that comes to one when he discovers that someone else believes in him and is willing to trust him with his friendship.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Your friend is your needs answered. He is your field which you sow with love and reap with thanksgiving. And he is your board and your fireside. For you come to him with your hunger, and you seek him for peace.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.quote: Nothing makes the earth so spacious as to have friends at a distance.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: True friends are the people who brighten your smile everytime your with them
quotes.author: Julia VeRost

quotes.quote: The language of friendship is not words , but rather meanings . It is an intelligence above language.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I might give my life for my friend, but he had better not ask me to do up a parcel.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: To the world you may be just one person, but to one person you may be the world.
quotes.author: Brandi Snyder

quotes.quote: What is uttered from the heart alone, Will win the hearts of others to your own.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: True friendship comes when silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: Dave Tyson Gentry

quotes.quote: Friendship involves many things but, above all the power of going outside oneself and appreciating what is noble and loving in another.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another: What! You too I thought I was the only one.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Value friendship for what there is in it, not for what can be gotten out of it.
quotes.author: H. Clay Trumbull

quotes.quote: A friend is, as it were, a second self.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Two are better than one; because they have a good reward for their labour. For if they fall, the one will lift up his fellow: but woe to him that is alone when he falleth; for he hath not another to help him up.
quotes.author: Ecclesiastes

quotes.quote: If bitterness wants to get into the act, I offer it a cookie or a gumdrop.
quotes.author: James Broughton

quotes.quote: Destiny is no matter of chance. It is a matter of choice. It is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.
quotes.author: Valerie Bertinelli

quotes.quote: We're always going to argue about abortion. It's a hard choice and it's controversial, and that's why I'm pro-choice, because I want people to make their own choices.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Often people ask how I manage to be happy despite having no arms and no legs. The quick answer is that I have a choice. I can be angry about not having limbs, or I can be thankful that I have a purpose. I chose gratitude.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: Every man builds his world in his own image. He has the power to choose, but no power to escape the necessity of choice.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: I'm single because I was born that way.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Never open the door to a lesser evil, for other and greater ones invariably slink in after it.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: You can have peace. Or you can have freedom. Don't ever count on having both at once.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: There are no safe choices. Only other choices.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: I have seen the best of you, and the worst of you, and I choose both.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: Life presents many choices, the choices we make determine our future.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: In every single thing you do, you are choosing a direction. Your life is a product of choices.
quotes.author: Dr. Kathleen Hall

quotes.quote: Each person has a choice; the choice to do as one may wish and as one wants remains with the individual. If a person sees no benefit to change, they will not change.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Life is a choice - as is how you handle the pitfalls along its bumpy road.
quotes.author: Julie Donner Andersen

quotes.quote: We are partners by fate. We become friends by choice.
quotes.author: Jacquie McTaggart

quotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities
quotes.author: Joanne Kathleen Rowling

quotes.quote: Choose a job you love and you will never have to work a day in your life
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: A man is happy so long as he chooses to be happy and nothing can stop him.
quotes.author: Alexander Solzenitsyn

quotes.quote: Life is a sum of all your choices.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Choice means saying no to one thing so you can say yes to another.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: What we call the secret of happiness is no more a secret than our willingness to choose life.
quotes.author: Leo F. Buscaglia

quotes.quote: A man is happy so long as he choose to be happy.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: For what is the best choice, for each individual is the highest it is possible for him to achieve.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Every person, all the events of your life are drawn there because you have them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Choice is nothing in itself; everything depends on what one is able to choose.
quotes.author: Harold O. J. Brown

quotes.quote: The difficulty in life is the choice.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: Choice is free, and it is opposed to force and constraint, and a man is said to choose those things which he likes, which he loves, which his soul inclines to, when he is carried to them, not by the compulsion of an external principle, but by his own propension and inclination.
quotes.author: Thomas Manton

quotes.quote: When you make a choice, you change the future.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: To find joy in work is to discover the fountain of youth.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Find a job you enjoy doing, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
quotes.author: William Patten

quotes.quote: Desire! That's the one secret of every man's career. Not education. Not being born with hidden talents. Desire.
quotes.author: Bobby Unser

quotes.quote: On every job you do, you've got to raise your game. My ambition is to just get better and better every job you do — you should never stop trying to get better. You have to teach yourself new things — I don't think you necessarily learn them from other people because you have your own style of doing things, but hopefully you get better.
quotes.author: Ray Winstone

quotes.quote: Find a job you like and you add five days to every week.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Don't set compensation as a goal. Find work you like, and the compensation will follow.
quotes.author: Harding Lawrence

quotes.quote: Starting a new job is always scary, or at least for me it's always scary. It's like the first day of school.
quotes.author: Sean Maher

quotes.quote: A new job is like a blank book and you are the author.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Only undertake what you can do in an excellent fashion. There are no prizes for average performance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.author: Carl Bard

quotes.quote: A new job is not a new beginning. It is a path to create a new ending.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: By doing, you become employable. It doesn't matter what the job is; by working, you learn new things, meet new people and are exposed to new ideas.
quotes.author: Kate Reardon

quotes.quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every single job is a challenge. You are walking into a new set, a new character, creating a world and trying to get comfortable to do your best work.
quotes.author: Felicia Day

quotes.quote: Be open to the amazing changes which are occurring in the field that interests you.
quotes.author: Leigh Steinberg

quotes.quote: Nothing worthwhile comes easily. Work, continuous work and hard work, is the only way to accomplish results that last.
quotes.author: Hamilton Holt

quotes.quote: I still get the jitters every time I start a new job! I love it — makes you feel alive.
quotes.author: Camille Guaty

quotes.quote: Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of people, those who do the work and those who take the credit. Try to be in the first group; there is less competition there.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams!
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Find out what you like doing best, and get someone to pay you for it.
quotes.author: Katherine Whitehorn

quotes.quote: Go where you are celebrated — not tolerated. If they can't see the real value of you, it's time for a new start.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to start over. It's a brand new opportunity to rebuild what you truly want.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The best time for new beginnings, is now.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Treat your new job as a mission. Avoid procrastination, increase contribution, and exceed expectations.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I feel like I have a new life and I'm going to take full advantage of it.
quotes.author: William Green

quotes.quote: Everyone thinks that a new place or a new identity will jumpstart a new life.
quotes.author: Caroline Leavitt

quotes.quote: The responsibility of carrying and bringing a new life into this world is one that cannot be taken lightly.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.quote: Everybody deserves a second chance in this world. That's basically all I ask.
quotes.author: Shannen Doherty

quotes.quote: Joining a new church and starting a new life is never easy and often frightening.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Rather than turning the page, it's much easier to just throw the book away.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: If you want a new life, first give praise for having the old one!
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The beginning of compunction is the beginning of a new life.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: I've got a new life now, a new future, there's a lot more to Lennox Lewis than just being a boxer.
quotes.author: Lennox Lewis

quotes.quote: You never begin a new life. It's a mistake to think that you end one part of your life and start another as if there's no continuity.
quotes.author: Rudy Giuliani

quotes.quote: The question is what I wanted to do with the new life God has given me. This is the mission I want to take on.
quotes.author: Billy Tauzin

quotes.quote: They'll never forget, never forgive, no matter who the enemy is, son. Better just to start a new life. Be someone else.
quotes.author: Jeff Vandermeer

quotes.quote: When everything is lost, and all seems darkness, then comes the new life and all that is needed.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Don't hold together what must fall apart. The familiar life crumbles so the new life can begin.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Perhaps there are just some things you leave behind when you choose a new life.
quotes.author: Andrew Davidson

quotes.quote: A lasting solution, the possibility to begin a new life, is the only dignified solution for the refugee himself.
quotes.author: Poul Hartling

quotes.quote: Knowing when it is over is the beginning of a new life and the end of an old one!
quotes.author: Michael Penn

quotes.quote: No one can begin a new life, unless he repent of the old.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: What's old collapses, times change, and new life blossoms in the ruins.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: We're given second chances every day of our life. We don't usually take them, but they're there for the taking.
quotes.author: Andrew M. Greeley

quotes.quote: A new life? There's not such thing.It was only in the magazine headlines that people got a new life. Stopped drinking or taking drugs, found a new love. But the same life.
quotes.author: John Ajvide Lindqvist

quotes.quote: Today I begin a new life for I am the master of my abilities and today is going to be a great and beautiful day!
quotes.author: Tyrese Gibson

quotes.quote: I used to believe that people are only born once, but now I feel I have been reborn, like I was given a new life. I see myself as a child, full of energy and hope.
quotes.author: Bahman Ghobadi

quotes.quote: You make a new life by making new choices.
quotes.author: Sean Stephenson

quotes.quote: We are continuously living a new life, and when the old and the new do not fit nicely together, the old - no longer able to contain the new - should be discarded.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: What else remains for me? Youth, hope and love; To build a new life on a ruined life.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: These, by obtruding the beginning of a change for the entire work of new life, will fall under the former guilt.
quotes.author: Henry Hammond

quotes.quote: Your life changes the moment you make a new, congruent, and committed decision.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest healer to be found.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Sometimes new love comes between old friends. Sometimes the best love was the one that was always there.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love doesn't just sit there like a stone; it has to be made,like bread, remade all the time, made new.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Suddenly life has new meaning to me, there's beauty up above and things we never take notice of, you wake up suddenly you're in love.
quotes.author: Billy Ocean

quotes.quote: New love can heal lost loves, but it cannot make you forget.
quotes.author: Jennifer Megan Varnadore

quotes.quote: But new love only lasts so long, and then you crash back into the real people you are, and from as high as we were, it's a very long fall, and we hit the ground with a thud.
quotes.author: Marya Hornbacher

quotes.quote: Meeting you was fate, becoming your friend was a choice, falling in love with you was beyond my control!
quotes.author: Gwen

quotes.quote: And think not you can direct the course of love, For love, If it finds you worthy, Directs your course.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Love unlocks doors and opens windows that weren't even there before.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Don't ignore the love you do have in your life by focusing on the love you don't.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Love may be harder to find in some people, but when they do love you know it must be something marvelous.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.quote: The greatest lovers are like twin blooms, each reflecting the passion and the glory of the other.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: One's first love is always perfect until one meets one's second love.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Aston

quotes.quote: Sow a seed and the earth will yield you a flower. Dream your dream to the sky and it will bring you your beloved.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Hope for love, pray for love, wish for love, dream for love but don't put your life on hold waiting for love
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: I think perhaps love comes from finding someone you feel utterly comfortable with, someone who makes you comfortable with yourself. It's like...finding yourself, or maybe it's like finding the other part of yourself.
quotes.author: Candice Proctor

quotes.quote: Love can only be found through the act of loving.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Love is never wasted. To love is the greatest gift.
quotes.author: Alison Stormwolf

quotes.quote: The best way to love is to love like you have never been hurt.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is a risk to love. What if it doesn't work out? Ah, but what if it does.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: There are all kinds of love in this world but never the same love twice.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Love isn't finding a perfect person. It's seeing an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Love does not care to define and is never in a hurry to do so.
quotes.author: Charles du Bos

quotes.quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: It is the things in common that make relationships enjoyable, but it is the little differences that make them interesting.
quotes.author: Todd Ruthman

quotes.quote: Before we can have a successful relationship with anyone, we first need a perfect personal relationship.
quotes.author: Russ Von Hoelscher

quotes.quote: You are what you choose to be today. Not what you've chosen to be before.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Never too old, never too bad, never too late, never too sick to start from scratch once again.
quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

quotes.quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Although no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.author: Carl Bard

quotes.quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Great minds have purposes others have wishes.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: If you truly want to become a better you, it is imperative that you learn to feel good about yourself.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Let the dead Past bury its dead!
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Today will never happen again. Don't waste it with a false start or no start at all.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Forget everything you've done. Start over.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Maybe the new me will be different.
quotes.author: Beatrice Sparks

quotes.quote: Today is a new day. Even if you were wrong yesterday, you can get it right today.
quotes.author: Dwight Howard

quotes.quote: I wake up every morning and I surprise myself. I wake up to a new me.
quotes.author: Gina Carano

quotes.quote: And there's always a way to begin with.
quotes.author: Autumn Doughton

quotes.quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Today is the start of a new adventure. New challenges to face, new memories to make, and new obstacles to overcome.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Renew, release, let go. Yesterdays gone. Theres nothing you can do to bring it back. You cant shouldve done something. You can only do something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment. Today is a new day!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to to start over because it's a new chance to rebuild what you want.
quotes.author: Mario Tomasello

quotes.quote: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.author: Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: A baby is something you carry inside you for nine months, in your arms for three years and in your heart till the day you die.
quotes.author: Mary Mason

quotes.quote: To be pregnant is to be vitally alive, thoroughly woman, and distressingly inhabited. Soul and spirit are stretched – along with body – making pregnancy a time of transition, growth, and profound beginnings.
quotes.author: Anne Christian Buchanan

quotes.quote: Birth is the epicenter of women's power.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: That first pregnancy is a long sea journey to a country where you don't know the language, where land is in sight for such a long time that after a while it's just the horizon – and then one day birds wheel over that dark shape and it's suddenly close, and all you can do is hope like hell that you've had the right shots.
quotes.author: Emily Perkins

quotes.quote: Making the decision to have a child is momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: When you are a mother, you are never really alone in your thoughts. A mother always has to think twice, once for herself and once for her child.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: A mother does not become pregnant in order to provide employment to medical people. Giving birth is an ecstatic jubilant adventure not available to males. It is a woman's crowning creative experience of a lifetime.
quotes.author: John Stevenson

quotes.quote: I begin to love this little creature, and to anticipate his birth as a fresh twist to a know which I do not wish to unite.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: A mother is always the beginning. She is how things begin.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: Of all the rights of women, the greatest is to be a mother.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Giving birth and being born brings us into the essence of creation, where the human spirit is courageous and bold and the body, a miracle of wisdom.
quotes.author: HARRIETTE HARTIGAN

quotes.quote: We have a secret in our culture, and it's not that birth is painful. It's that women are strong.
quotes.author: Laura Stavoe Harm

quotes.quote: There is such a special sweetness in being able to participate in creation.
quotes.author: Pamela S. Nadav

quotes.quote: Birthing is the most profound initiation to spirituality a woman can have.
quotes.author: Robin Lim

quotes.quote: Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Whether your pregnancy was meticulously planned, medically coaxed, or happened by surprise, one thing is certain – your life will never be the same.
quotes.author: Catherine Jones

quotes.quote: It was the tiniest thing I ever decided to put my whole life into.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: There is no way out of the experience except through it, because it is not really your experience at all but the baby's. Your body is the child's instrument of birth.
quotes.author: Penelope Leach

quotes.quote: You never understand life until it grows inside of you.
quotes.author: Sandra C. Kassis

quotes.quote: Mothers always find ways to fit in the work – but then when you're working, you feel that you should be spending time with your children and then when you're with your children, you're thinking about working.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: I'm never as happy as when I'm pregnant. I literally would have 10 babies if I could!
quotes.author: Tori Spelling

quotes.quote: I am sure that if the mothers of various nations could meet, there would be no more wars.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: Birth is a mystery. Words are not enough.
quotes.author: Marie O'Connor

quotes.quote: Motherhood is the greatest thing and the hardest thing.
quotes.author: Ricki Lake

quotes.quote: Parents need to fill a child's bucket of self-esteem so high that the rest of the world can't poke enough holes to make it dry.
quotes.author: Alvin Price

quotes.quote: The best thing about being a new mom is the lower tolerance from not drinking for nine months.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I see myself as a mom first. I'm so lucky to have that role in life. The world can like me, hate me, or fall apart around me and at least I wake up with my kids and I'm happy.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: No language can express the power and beauty and heroism of a mother's love.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: New Orleans food is as delicious as the less criminal forms of sin.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Even the sidewalks in â€ªâ€ŽNew Orleansâ€¬ had personality.
quotes.author: Hunter Murphy

quotes.quote: If there was no New Orleans, America would just be a bunch of free people dying of boredom.
quotes.author: Chris Rose

quotes.quote: I'm not sure, but I'm almost positive, that all music came from New Orleans.
quotes.author: Ernie K Doe

quotes.quote: New Orleans is a unique environment.
quotes.author: Steve Earle

quotes.quote: How did you fall in love with New Orleans? At once, madly. Looking back, sometimes I think it was predestined.
quotes.author: Andrei Codrescu

quotes.quote: New Orleans is awake all night, and every night is a party.
quotes.author: Kodi Smit-McPhee

quotes.quote: America has only three cities: New York, San Francisco, and New Orleans. Everywhere else is Cleveland.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: What happens in Vegas may stay in Vegas, but what happens in New Orleans, goes home with you.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: People don't live in New Orleans because it is easy. They live here because they are incapable of living anywhere else in the just same way.
quotes.author: Ian McNulty

quotes.quote: People from New Orleans are extremely prideful.
quotes.author: Solange Knowles

quotes.quote: There is no other place on earth even remotely like New Orleans. Don't even try to compare it to anywhere else.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: I think New Orleans is the best city in the United States.
quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

quotes.quote: New Orleans is just a doggone fun place to be.
quotes.author: Archie Manning

quotes.quote: You knows dat in New Orleans is not morning 'til dee sun come up.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Creole is New Orleans city food. Communities were created by the people who wanted to stay and not go back to Spain or France.
quotes.author: Paul Prudhomme

quotes.quote: There is a house in New Orleans. / They call the Rising Sun. / It’s been the ruin of many poor girls. / And me, O Lord, for one.
quotes.author: American Folk Song

quotes.quote: Go tell my baby sister, / Never do like I have done, / Tell her shun that house in New Orleans, / They call the Rising Sun.
quotes.author: American Folk Song

quotes.quote: Oh I marched to the battle of New Orleans / At the end of the early British war / The young land started growing / The young blood started flowing / But I ain’t marchin’ anymore.
quotes.author: Phil Ochs

quotes.quote: We picked up one excellent word—a word worth travelling to New Orleans to get; a nice limber, expressive handy word—'Lagniappe.' They pronounce it lanny-yap. . . . It is the equivalent of the thirteenth roll in a 'baker's dozen.' It is something thrown in, gratis, for good measure.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In New Orleans, they don't have a bad deli. There's no mediocrity accepted.
quotes.author: Mario Batali

quotes.quote: New Orleans has enough characters in your immediate proximity to fill several books. And if you have the presence of mind—or the kind of mind—to remember things people tell you at parties, you’ll never run out of stuff.
quotes.author: Andrei Codrescu

quotes.quote: People—not just writers—are attracted to New Orleans because it’s full of stories and listeners who love nothing better than to listen to them.
quotes.author: Andrei Codrescu

quotes.quote: Everybody in New Orleans loves the food, the music, and our sense of time (slow time) that’s peculiar to us and to us only. There is a velvety sensuality here at the mouth of the Mississippi that you won’t find anywhere else. Tell me what the air feels like 3 a.m. on a Thursday night in late August in Shaker Heights and I bet that you won’t be able to say because nobody stays up that late. But in New Orleans, I tell you, it’s ink and honey passed through silver moonlight.
quotes.author: Andrei Codrescu

quotes.quote: When the rich, the famous, the bored, the strange and just plain fugitives fantasize about disappearing, they inevitably think of New Orleans.
quotes.author: Andrei Codrescu

quotes.quote: New Orleans is an essence, something that if bottled would be so pungent you’d think that a perfumed boil on the Devil’s forehead had burst open.
quotes.author: Andrei Codrescu

quotes.quote: It has been said that a Scotchman has not seen the world until he has seen Edinburgh; and I think that I may say that an American has not seen the United States until he has seen Mardi Gras in New Orleans.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If New Orleans is allowed to die, a crucial part of the world's music heritage will disappear.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: If I had grown up in any place but New Orleans, I don t think my career would have taken off. I wouldn't have heard the music that was around this town. There was so much going on when I was a kid.
quotes.author: Pete Fountain

quotes.quote: To get to New Orleans, you don't pass through anywhere else. That geographical location, being aloof, lets it hold onto the ritual of its own pace more than other places that have to keep up with the progress.
quotes.author: Allen Toussaint

quotes.quote: You need new roads to discover new places!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Create a compelling vision, one that takes people to a new place, and then translate that vision into a reality.
quotes.author: Warren G. Bennis

quotes.quote: There's nothing more thrilling than arriving in a new place on your own and feeling the sense of possibility and excitement that brings with it.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: Transitions are almost always signs of growth, but they can bring feelings of loss. To get somewhere new, we may have to leave somewhere else behind.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar, you present a new place for new ideas and progress.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: Change is always good. It brings you to a new place.
quotes.author: Lee Ranaldo

quotes.quote: New places always help us look at life differently.
quotes.author: Joan Bauer

quotes.quote: Keep travelling. You will discover new paths and new places.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The quickest way to learn about a new place is to know what it dreams of.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The true voyage of discovery is not a journey to a new place; it is learning to see with new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: If you want to be a new man you have to stay in new places, and do new things, with people who never knew you before. If you go back to the same old ways, what else can you be but the same old person?
quotes.author: Joe Ambercrombie

quotes.quote: To wake for the first time in a new place can be like another birth.
quotes.author: Rumer Godden

quotes.quote: Don't mistake a new place for a new you.
quotes.author: Sara Zarr

quotes.quote: To start at a new place is always to feel incompetent and unwanted.
quotes.author: Philip Larkin

quotes.quote: Arrival at a new destination only occurs from leaving your current location.
quotes.author: Chris Hogan

quotes.quote: If you don't know where you are going, you might wind up someplace else.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Everyone thinks that a new place or a new identity will jumpstart a new life.
quotes.author: Caroline Leavitt

quotes.quote: Get some money, buy a red coffeepot, move out. Find a new place to plug it in.
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: Escape and breathe the air of new places.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: New love may soar and plummet as it ebbs and flows, but what remains are the things we've discovered about each other. I'd do it all again because it led us to this love we share today.
quotes.author: Robin Raven

quotes.quote: You have to walk carefully in the beginning of love; the running across fields into your lover's arms can only come later when you're sure they won't laugh if you trip.
quotes.author: Jonathan Carroll

quotes.quote: I have learned not to worry about love; But to honor its coming with all my heart.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Love at first sight has nothing on how special love at first talk is. I've cherished all our getting-to-know-you moments we've shared. May they go on and on!
quotes.author: Robin Raven

quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: When you grow older, you love again, and the new love feels so different that the love before feels like make-believe. The way you love changes throughout your life. Even the way you love the same person changes.
quotes.author: Heather Davis

quotes.quote: Getting into a new relationship is like pouring Miracle-Gro on your character defects.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The best part about getting to know you is anticipating that each day brings new surprises that are all about you.
quotes.author: Robin Raven

quotes.quote: For every new relationship, there's at least another new broken heart.
quotes.author: Ryan Barber

quotes.quote: I present myself to you in a form suitable to the relationship I wish to achieve with you.
quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

quotes.quote: When a man loves a woman, periodically he needs to pull away before he can get closer.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: I knew you were special from the moment we met. How I'm looking forward to all of our tomorrows.
quotes.author: Robin Raven

quotes.quote: One genuine new relationship is worth a fistful of business cards.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: New love is grand. Savor all the crazy, muddled might of it.
quotes.author: Eli Easton

quotes.quote: It does not need that a poem should be long. Every word was once a poem. Every new relationship is a new word.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't ever punish your present relationship for what your past relationship did.
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: Do not sabotage your new relationship with your last relationship's poison.
quotes.author: Steve Marabol

quotes.quote: New love can heal lost loves, but it cannot make you forget.
quotes.author: Jennifer Megan Varnadore

quotes.quote: Don't let your past relationships ruin your future relationships because everyone is not the same and true love might not always be what you want, so accept who God blesses you with.
quotes.author: Dionta Long

quotes.quote: Since I met you, I started to understand why all my past relationships ended: so that we could start.
quotes.author: Robin Raven

quotes.quote: If a relationship is founded on love it doesn't end.
quotes.author: Rosanne Cash

quotes.quote: When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: When men and women are able to respect and accept their differences then love has a chance to blossom.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: New month, new intentions, new goals, new love, new light, and new beginnings.
quotes.author: April Mae Monterrosa

quotes.quote: To create is not to deform or invent persons and things. It is to tie new relationships between persons and things which are, and as they are.
quotes.author: Robert Bresson

quotes.quote: We have to bring children into a new relationship to food that connects them to culture and agriculture.
quotes.author: Alice Waters

quotes.quote: Love must be learned, and learned again and again; there is no end to it.
quotes.author: Katherine Anne Porter

quotes.quote: For a new year to bring you something new, make a move, like a butterfly tearing its cocoon! Make a move!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Approach the New Year with resolve to find the opportunities hidden in each new day.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: What the New Year brings to you will depend a great deal on what you bring to the New Year.
quotes.author: Vern McLellan

quotes.quote: The object of a new year is not that we should have a new year. It is that we should have a new soul.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Drop the last year into the silent limbo of the past. Let it go, for it was imperfect, and thank God that it can go.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: For last year's words belong to last year's language and next year's words await another voice.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: May all your troubles last as long as your New Year's resolutions!
quotes.author: Joey Adams

quotes.quote: This is a new year. A new beginning. And things will change.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Tomorrow, is the first blank page of a 365 page book. Write a good one.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: Each age has deemed the new-born year the fittest time for festal cheer.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: From New Year's on the outlook brightens; good humor lost in a mood of failure returns. I resolve to stop complaining.
quotes.author: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.quote: It wouldn't be New Year's if I didn't have regrets.
quotes.author: William Thomas

quotes.quote: Year's end is neither an end nor a beginning but a going on, with all the wisdom that experience can instill in us.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: Ring out the old, ring in the new, Ring, happy bells, across the snow: The year is going, let him go; Ring out the false, ring in the true.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: May the New Year bring you courage to break your resolutions early! My own plan is to swear off every kind of virtue, so that I triumph even when I fall!
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: An optimist stays up until midnight to see the new year in. A pessimist stays up to make sure the old year leaves.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Many years ago I resolved never to bother with New Year's resolutions, and I've stuck with it ever since.
quotes.author: Dave Beard

quotes.quote:
This bright new year is given me
To live each day with zest
To daily grow and try to be
My highest and my best!
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Good resolutions are simply checks that men draw on a bank where they have no account.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The new year stands before us, like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written. We can help write that story by setting goals.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: Although I've been thoroughly conditioned by pain to see it otherwise, an ending is nothing more than the backside of a beginning.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: We will open the book. Its pages are blank. We are going to put words on them ourselves. The book is called Opportunity and its first chapter is New Year's Day.
quotes.author: Edith Lovejoy Pierce

quotes.quote: There are greater things to be achieved in every New Year, and each and everyone must prepare themselves to be great, not by words of the mouth, but by a lot of sacrifices.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The only way to spend New Year's Eve is either quietly with friends or in a brothel. Otherwise when the evening ends and people pair off, someone is bound to be left in tears.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Happiness is too many things these days for anyone to wish it on anyone lightly. So let's just wish each other a bileless New Year and leave it at that.
quotes.author: Judith Crist

quotes.quote:
Another fresh new year is here . . .
Another year to live!
To banish worry, doubt, and fear,
To love and laugh and give!
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: New Year's Eve, where auld acquaintance be forgot. Unless, of course, those tests come back positive.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: It isn't only a new year, it is a new chance for everyone to restart.
quotes.author: Mohammed Sekouty

quotes.quote: Those who gave thee a body, furnished it with weakness; but He who gave thee Soul, armed thee with resolution. Employ it, and thou art wise; be wise and thou art happy.
quotes.author: Akhenaton

quotes.quote: New York is an ugly city, a dirty city. Its climate is a scandal, its politics are used to frighten children, its traffic is madness, its competition is murderous. But there is one thing about it - once you have lived in New York and it has become your h
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: New York was a city where you could be frozen to death in the midst of a busy street and nobody would notice.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: New York is the only city in the world where you can get run down on the sidewalk by a pedestrian.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.quote: New York, the nation's thyroid gland.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: New York - that unnatural city where every one is an exile, none more so than the American.
quotes.author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quotes.quote: New York now leads the world's great cities in the number of people around whom you shouldn't make a sudden move.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: New York is appalling, fantastically charmless and elaborately dire.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: New York is the biggest collection of villages in the world.
quotes.author: Alistair Cooke

quotes.quote: New York is a different country. Maybe it ought to have a separate government. Everybody thinks differently, they just don't know what the hell the rest of the United States is.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: New York is the meeting place of the peoples, the only city where you can hardly find a typical American.
quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

quotes.quote: When you leave New York, you are astonished at how clean the rest of the world is. Clean is not enough.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: In New York you've got to have all the luck.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: As for New York City, it is a place apart. There is not its match in any other country in the world.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: New York is the only real city-city.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: New York City is a great apartment hotel in which everyone lives and no one is at home.
quotes.author: Glenway Wescott

quotes.quote: The present in New York is so powerful that the past is lost.
quotes.author: John Chapman

quotes.quote: There is more sophistication and less sense in New York than anywhere else on the globe.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: There is something in the New York air that makes sleep useless.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: New York is the capital, the national headquarters of homelessness.... No one feels he belongs here.
quotes.author: Gerald Stanley Lee

quotes.quote: New York is not even a city, it's a congerie of rotten villages.
quotes.author: James M. Cain

quotes.quote: A car is useless in New York, essential everywhere else. The same with good manners.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: New York is an exciting town where something is happening all the time, most of it unsolved.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: New York is the dirtiest, largest, ugliest, broken-down city in the world-but it's the only one.
quotes.author: Isaac Stern

quotes.quote: The faces in New York remind me of people who played a gameand lost.
quotes.author: Murray Kempton

quotes.quote: It is a miracle that New York works at all. The whole thing is implausible.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: New Yorkers like to boast that if you can survive in New York, you can survive anywhere. But if you can survive anywhere, why live in New York?
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: New York is like a disco, but without the music.
quotes.author: Elaine Sritch

quotes.quote: New York is a great city to live in if you can afford to get out of it.
quotes.author: William Cole

quotes.quote: New York is a place where the rich walk, the poor drive Cadillacs, and beggars die of malnutrition with thousands of dollars hidden in their mattresses.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: New York was an inexhaustible space, a labyrinth of endless steps, and no matter how far he walked, no matter how well he came to know its neighborhoods and streets, it always left him with the feeling of being lost.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: New Zealand looks like the future to me.
quotes.author: Paula Scher

quotes.quote: New Zealand is not a small country but a large village.
quotes.author: Peter Jackson

quotes.quote: New Zealand is a country of thirty thousand million sheep, three million of whom think they are human.
quotes.author: Barry Humphries

quotes.quote: New Zealand was one of the most beautiful countries to drive through for the scenery and the vast scale of the place.
quotes.author: Louise Nurding

quotes.quote: Everywhere you turn in New Zealand, there's something exciting to do. It's the gem of the world. It's so far away from the madness, and so you get that element. It was just stunning.
quotes.author: Wes Bentley

quotes.quote: There's a real purity in New Zealand that doesn't exist in the states. It's actually not an easy thing to find in our world anymore. It's a unique place because it is so far away from the rest of the world. There is a sense of isolation and also being protected.
quotes.author: Elijah Wood

quotes.quote: The New Zealand sense of humor is tough and realistic. Jokes are not surreal; they are about life and death and tough decisions.
quotes.author: Anthony McCarten
