quotes.quote: In New Zealand I think we often take ourselves too seriously, and being able to laugh at yourself is necessary in life without being too precious.
quotes.author: Murray Mexted

quotes.quote: One of the best things about growing up in New Zealand is that if you are prepared to work hard and have faith in yourself, truly anything is possible.
quotes.author: Peter Jackson

quotes.quote: New Zealand needs to balance its environmental responsibilities with its economic opportunities, because the risk is that if you don't do that - and you want to lead the world - then you might end up getting unintended consequences.
quotes.author: John Key

quotes.quote: New Zealand is a place where you can get well.
quotes.author: James Nesbitt

quotes.quote: New Zealand has incredible global recognition for grass-fed livestock.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.quote: New Zealand was colonised initially by those Australians who had the initiative to escape.
quotes.author: Robert Muldoon

quotes.quote: New Zealand as a whole needs to save more, spend less and reduce our reliance on foreign debt.
quotes.author: John Key

quotes.quote: Living in New Zealand, it's like a different world - it is a different world. It's very, very cool.
quotes.author: Luke Evans

quotes.quote: New Zealand is such a down-to-earth place.
quotes.author: Emilia Wickstead

quotes.quote: An interesting thing about New Zealand, you know, literature is that it really didn't begin in any real sense until the 20th century.
quotes.author: Eleanor Catton

quotes.quote: New Zealand - it's very tight-knit, and everyone knows each other.
quotes.author: Julian Dennison

quotes.quote: People in New Zealand go out of their way to not be impressed by things.
quotes.author: Melanie Lynskey

quotes.quote: I have heard that in the New Zealand native tradition, the soul, when it dies, becomes a star.
quotes.author: Eleanor Catton

quotes.quote: A great marriage is not when the perfect couple comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.
quotes.author: Dave Meurer

quotes.quote: Your marriage is a glorious bond but don't take it as an easy task. It is meant to be worked upon similar to all of your other relationships.
quotes.author: Raymond Eido

quotes.quote: Always strive to give your spouse the very best of yourself; not what's leftover after you have given your best to everyone else.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: Congratulations for embarking on life's journey called marriage which is either a two way street between compromise and sacrifice or a one way street to diivorce.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: All married couples should learn the art of battle as they should learn the art of making love. Good battle is objective and honest never vicious or cruel. Good battle is healthy and constructive, and brings to a marriage the principles of equal partnership.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Happy marriages begin when we marry the ones we love and they blossom when we love the ones we marry.
quotes.author: Tom Mullen

quotes.quote: We may argue and have our ups and downs, but any poor soul who ever tries to get between us will find out that our love is stronger than ever.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: To the newlyweds: May for better or worse be far better than worse.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: As you become husband and wife, prepare to welcome a lot of strife. Each others faults you will point out, you will fight and argue without a doubt. Don't even bother trying to find a solution, this is marriage life's toughest institution.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Putting love first, even above the laws of marriage, will allow you to see past the small, insignificant details and focus on the relationship you truly desire.
quotes.author: E'yen A.Gardner

quotes.quote: Marriage is a form of discipline involving two people committing to a certain lifestyle and set of boundaries.
quotes.author: David Khalil

quotes.quote: Have a good and godly marriage that shows the world Christ's love through how you sacrificially love and serve one another.
quotes.author: John Stange

quotes.quote: Simply put, a marriage is not a marriage without the existence of two individuals who promised to love each other.
quotes.author: Jessica Gardner

quotes.quote: From the first, the Bible makes clear that marriage is a calling from God to care for, bless, and serve another.
quotes.author: Adam Hamilton

quotes.quote: Marriages are like fingerprints; each one is different and each one is beautiful.
quotes.author: Maggie Reyes

quotes.quote: When two people become one by way of marriage, it is not only their hearts that are united, but their minds and souls as well.
quotes.author: Julie Donner Andersen

quotes.quote: A young woman, newly wed, may find herself in the delightful position of wanting to do nothing without the company of her darling husband. She may indeed discover that she spends all her waking hours with her fellow to the exclusion of every other friend or family member. This is understandable, but wholly unacceptable, to society.
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: The best time to love with your whole heart is always now, in this moment, because no breath beyond the current is promised.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: Newlyweds, they have this ideal, this picture of what marriage is like, something similar of their favorite memories growing up. If only it were that simple.
quotes.author: William Taylor

quotes.quote: When you make the sacrifice in marriage, you're sacrificing not to each other but to unity in a relationship.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Marriage is the highest state of friendship. If happy, it lessens our cares by dividing them, at the same time that it doubles our pleasures by mutual participation.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Both people need to care deeply about the other person, to put the other's needs before their own, and to make a daily commitment to that person to stick it out.
quotes.author: Alessandra Torre

quotes.quote: Marriage is the golden ring in a chain whose beginning is a glance and whose ending is eternity.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: We were married for better or worse. I couldn’t have done better, and she couldn’t have done worse.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Dear newlywed wife, somebody out there is determined to shape your view of intimacy and marriage. You get to choose who will shape your opinion; the Author of marriage or exasperated humans?
quotes.author: Ngina Otiende

quotes.quote: Compromise, communicate, and never go to bed angry - the three pieces of advice gifted and regifted to all newlyweds.
quotes.author: Gillian Flynn

quotes.quote: The lonely evenings in the life of a newly married girl may be really agonizing.
quotes.author: Girdhar Joshi

quotes.quote: I hope you smile, laugh, and maybe even learn something that will help you along the way to happily-ever-after.
quotes.author: T.N. Carpenter

quotes.quote: Marriage: Love is the reason. Lifelong friendship is the gift. Kindness is the cause. Til’ death do us part is the length.
quotes.author: Fawn Weaver

quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Bad news travels fast. Good news takes the scenic route.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: News travels fast in places where nothing much ever happens.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: News is how the government delivers propaganda to the masses and it is an essential requirement of the television broadcasting job to be emotionless to this.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: News, if unreported, has no impact. It might as well have not happened at all.
quotes.author: Gay Talese

quotes.quote: The bad news is that only the bad people reach the news because they are noisier.
quotes.author: Javier Bardem

quotes.quote: News is what someone wants suppressed. Everything else is advertising.
quotes.author: Katharine Graham

quotes.quote: News used to come too late; now it comes too early.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The news and the truth are not the same thing.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: News is what somebody somewhere wants to suppress; all the rest is advertising.
quotes.author: Lord Northcliffe

quotes.quote: News reporters are certainly liberal and left of center.
quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

quotes.quote: News is not a game show. You don't win a car if you happen to be right.
quotes.author: John Oliver

quotes.quote: News is only the first rough draft of history.
quotes.author: Alan Barth

quotes.quote: All the papers that matter live off their advertisements, and the advertisers exercise an indirect censorship over news.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: News events are like Texas weather. If you don't like it, wait a minute.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.quote: Bad news isn't wine. It doesn't improve with age.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Fake news is a big thing in the field of Social Media Journalism. Fake news can be as simple has spreading misinformation.or as dangerous as smearing hateful propaganda.
quotes.author: Fabrizio Moreira

quotes.quote: News events cannot be controlled, nor can newscasts be mapped out like entertainment shows.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.quote: We cannot make good news out of bad practice.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: Bad news travels at the speed of light; good news travels like molasses.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.quote: News Coverage!! As news expose rather than cover events.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Today's news, which may be yesterday's anyway, will be eclipsed tomorrow.
quotes.author: Graham Swift

quotes.quote: News isn't designed to talk about daily life in its nuances, but poetry is.
quotes.author: Eliza Griswold

quotes.quote: News represents another form of advertising, not liberal propaganda.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: News is something somebody doesn't want printed; all else is advertising.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The news did not trouble her particularly; all news was bad, like wage demands, strikes, or war, and the wise person paid no attention to it.
quotes.author: Neil Shute

quotes.quote: The news isn't there to tell you what happened. It's there to tell you what it wants you to hear or what it thinks you want to hear.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: There is no better news, than the fact that Jesus can actually turn a life upside down and save it.
quotes.author: Cliff Richard

quotes.quote: News, news, news - that is what we want. You cannot beat news in a newspaper.
quotes.author: Arthur Christiansen

quotes.quote: But news right now is like a flock of speeded-up sheep running off the side of a cliff.
quotes.author: Ali Smith

quotes.quote: News is history shot on the wing.
quotes.author: Gene Fowler

quotes.quote: The art of newspaper paragraphing is to stroke a platitude until it purrs like an epigram.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Newspapers always excite curiosity. No one ever lays one down without a feeling of disappointment.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Newspapers are tutors as well as informers.
quotes.author: Neil Kinnock

quotes.quote: Newspapers have degenerated. They may now be absolutely relied upon.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A daily newspaper should report the news, not play at geopolitics.
quotes.author: Rafael Correa

quotes.quote: A newspaper is a mirror reflecting the public, a mirror more or less defective, but still a mirror.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: A good newspaper is never quite good enough but a lousy newspaper is a joy forever.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: The newspapers are the cemeteries of ideas.
quotes.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

quotes.quote: A newspaper is an oversized book with adverts and an expiry date.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: For fear of the newspapers politicians are dull, and at last they are too dull even for the newspapers.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Newspapers have roughly the same relationship to life as fortune-tellers to metaphysics.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Newspapers are horror happening to other people.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.quote: A newspaper should be the maximum of information, and the minimum of comment.
quotes.author: Richard Cobden

quotes.quote: Newspaper : A device unable to distinguish between a bicycle accident and the collapse of civilisation.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Newspaper readership is declining like crazy. In fact, there's a good chance that nobody is reading my column.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Newspapers should be read for the study of facts. They should not be allowed to kill the habit of independent thinking.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Newspapers are a centre of public culture. We can't give in to extortion.
quotes.author: Alexander Lebedev

quotes.quote: A newspaper is the lowest thing there is.
quotes.author: Richard J. Daley

quotes.quote: A newspaper is always a weapon in somebody's hands.
quotes.author: Claud Cockburn

quotes.quote: Accuracy to a newspaper is what virtue is to a lady; but a newspaper can always print a retraction.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

quotes.quote: Some newspapers are fit only to line the bottom of bird cages.
quotes.author: Spiro T. Agnew

quotes.quote: Owning a newspaper does not confer immunity.
quotes.author: Alexander Lebedev

quotes.quote: Newspapers have become more important to the average man than the scriptures.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The newspapers are full of what we would like to happen to us and what we hope will never happen to us.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: A newspaper is a circulating library with high blood pressure.
quotes.author: Arthur Baer

quotes.quote: Newspapers are so boring. How can you read a newspaper that starts with a 51-word lead sentence?
quotes.author: Jimmy Breslin

quotes.quote: The newspaper is a greater treasure to the people than uncounted millions of gold.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The newspapers turn a blind eye to how they get their material as long as they have great photographs.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.quote: Newspapers don't write enough about serious religious issues.
quotes.author: Sally Quinn

quotes.quote: If newspapers are useful in overthrowing tyrants, it is only to establish a tyranny of their own.
quotes.author: James Fenimore Cooper

quotes.quote: Be grateful for the tests, difficulties and challenges you are going through, because it's preparing you for the next level and your breakthrough.
quotes.author: Jeanette Coron

quotes.quote: To get to that next level, you gotta learn to get comfortable being uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: The road to the next level is always uphill, and if a team isn't intentionally fighting to move up, then it inevitably slides down.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Everything that you go through prepares you for the next level.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: There is no true loss in authentic growth, only the natural process of letting go, outgrowing, pruning. The call of the next level requires it. Those who resist the connective opportunities that life brings to grow to their next level, never reach the mental maturity height to acquire it.
quotes.author: Tracey Bond

quotes.quote: God prepares you for your next level before He finally takes you there. It is not the other way around.
quotes.author: Benjamin Suulola

quotes.quote: Just jump, make that call, take the next step and say no, I'm done, that's it! As long as you entertain fearful thoughts, you’ll continue to feel the pain. So, just take some kind of action now. Even if you feel that fear while you’re taking action, have faith and just keep going.
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: A lot of people desire to go to their next level but only a few are determined to grow to their next level.
quotes.author: Saji Ijiyemi

quotes.quote: Once you get that addiction of realizing what you can do, you want to take that to the next level.
quotes.author: Gina Carano

quotes.quote: The next level, by definition, is something you can't see and you can't understand.
quotes.author: Eben Pagan

quotes.quote: If you're going to go to the next level, your values are going to have to change!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: Get comfortable being uncomfortable, that's how you break the plateau and reach the next level.
quotes.author: Chalene Johnson

quotes.quote: When you're excited about what you do, and nobody gotta give you a dime, that's next level.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: You can't step up to the next level as long as you keep one foot on the lower level.
quotes.author: Larry Winget

quotes.quote: Creating the next level of results requires the next level of thinking.
quotes.author: Rory Vaden

quotes.quote: Take everything to the next level and have fun doing it. No limits, no rules!
quotes.author: Christina Milian

quotes.quote: Start taking yourself to the next level so you can take your success to the next level. It only happens in that order.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: You were created to excel. There's no limit to how high you can go in life. Keep stretching to the next level.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Separation before elevation. You have to let some people and things go so you can go to the next level.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: You must think of failure and defeat as the spring boards to new achievements, and to the next level of accomplishment.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Every success won is a motivation to the next level of success.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The decisions that you make each day can actually catapult you to that next level of achievement.
quotes.author: Robert G. Allen

quotes.quote: Faith in God will elevate you to next level blessings.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Stop the continual thinking of anticipated challenges and start thinking of solutions. Solutions take you to the next level whilst thinking of challenges with no solutions makes you stay at the same level or at worse takes you a step backwards.
quotes.author: Oscar Bimpong

quotes.quote: The mindset you have, determines the next step you take.
quotes.author: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.quote: Be fearless in trying new things, whether they are physical, mental, or emotional, since being afraid can challenge you to go to the next level.
quotes.author: Rita Wilson

quotes.quote: Don't allow your past or present condition to control you. It's just a process that you're going through to get you to the next level.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: Everybody got a taste of success and everybody wants to keep elevating that to the next level.
quotes.author: Kevin Harvick

quotes.quote: You have to get to the next level, or you're gonna get stuck where you are for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Corey Taylor

quotes.quote: Growth requires facing where you're at so you can go to the next level.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: The real power of a man is in the size of the smile of the woman sitting next to him.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Just because you are a nice guy, doesn't mean you are a good man.
quotes.author: Zyanya Torres

quotes.quote: Nice guys may appear to finish last, but usually they are running a different race.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: You have to have a bunch of dimensions of yourself. You have to be able to adapt in this world. You can't be a nice guy living in a world of savages.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: A man does what he must in spite of personal consequences, in spite of obstacles and dangers and pressures and that is the basis of all human morality.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Men are like steel. When they lose their temper, they lose their worth.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.quote: You can do nice things for people all of the time and it's never noticed but as soon as you make one mistake it's never forgotten.
quotes.author: Tyga

quotes.quote: The first step to be a good man is this. You must deeply feel the burden of the stones some else is carrying
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: No man stands so tall as when he stoops to help a child.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Being a nice guy, doesn't mean you are a push over. It also doesn't mean you are easy to manipulate or take advantage of. No, being a nice guy simply means you care, have no time to get mad at the small stuff, and you think of the world in larger terms than self. And despite living in the shadow of the bad guys and paying for mistakes you didn't make, you hold on sometimes more than you should, but when you can no longer, you move on because it's the right thing to do.
quotes.author: Eugene Nathaniel Butler

quotes.quote: A good man will want you to shine. He wants you to be your amazing self. A good man loves to show off his happy, intelligent, amazing, powerful woman.
quotes.author: Anastasia Netri

quotes.quote: The mark of a great man is one who knows when to set aside the important things in order to accomplish the vital ones.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: A good man would prefer to be defeated than to defeat injustice by evil means.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Everybody has an inside scoop, so just be a nice guy. Be a nice person.
quotes.author: Justin Hartley

quotes.quote: A gentleman will open doors, pull out chairs, and carry things. Not because she's helpless or unable, but because he wants to show her that she is valuable and worthy of respect.
quotes.author: Charles J. Orlando

quotes.quote: Real men stay faithful. They don't have time to look for another woman because they're too busy looking for new ways to love their own.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: At home I am a nice guy, but I don't want the world to know. Humble people, I've found, don't get very far.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: It is not true that nice guys finish last. Nice guys are winners before the game even starts.
quotes.author: Mort Walker

quotes.quote: I never did say that you can't be a nice guy and win. I said that if I was playing third base and my mother rounded third with the winning run, I'd trip her up.
quotes.author: Leo Durocher

quotes.quote: Nice guys finish last, but we get to sleep in.
quotes.author: Evan Davis

quotes.quote: With my feelings, I hold a lot in, because I didn't always have boundaries and people would take advantage of situations because I'm a nice guy.
quotes.author: Kellan Lutz

quotes.quote: There's too much money and too many nice guys around.
quotes.author: John McEnroe

quotes.quote: Friendship is provisional, you have to keep earning it, back and forth, give the gift that's only each other's to give.
quotes.author: Howard Norman

quotes.quote: Most of us, I suspect, prefer our spiritual teachers to be one of the Nice Guy variety.
quotes.author: Ken Wilber

quotes.quote: Virtue is not photogenic. What is it to be a nice guy? To be nothing, that's what. A big fat zero with a smile for everybody.
quotes.author: Kirk Douglas

quotes.quote: He's a nice guy, but he played too much football with his helmet off.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: The moment my niece came into the world, I realized that logic can't make sense of someone who's so brand new to you.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: I am greatly pleased with your account of Fanny; I found her in the summer just as you describe, almost another sister, I could not have supposed that a niece would ever have been so much to me. She is quite after one's own heart.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: My niece, my little princess you totally rule my heart. In the story of my life you are the best part. Your sweet smile and magical ways bring happiness in my life and joy that stays forever.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: She's a different kind of BFF. One who is a little younger, and finds you so cool just because you care and have grown-up clothes in your closet. As she gets older, you might become her shoulder to cry on, but right now, you have so many smiles and snacks you need to share.
quotes.author: Marisa Casciano

quotes.quote: An aunt and a niece, there is a special bond that grows with time.
quotes.author: Kate Summers

quotes.quote: Nieces bring happiness and joy. They are so different than a boy. They are full of love and surprises too. They make life special, not blue.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifier

quotes.quote: If nephews and nieces were jewels, I would have the most beautiful gems ever...
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Aunts and nieces, there's something you must know. As time flies and years pass by, their love tends to grow. In the grueling journey of life, when everything else withers away, an aunt and a niece's bond, is something that will always stay
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A niece is very special! She's the child of someone dear. She's the person I can spoil whether far or near. As years pass by I hope you know how much you mean to me, and as you make your way in life, with you I will always be.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You are my niece, which gives you the official right to ask me for treats without feeling guilty. I am your aunt, which gives me the official right to spoil you without taking responsibility. How perfect.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To my niece, you are a joy to my heart and a delight to my eyes. You are a precious gift to our entire family and a wonderful addition to our lives.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you were a little girl I already knew that someday, Niece a beautiful woman you would grow into with beauty and such kindness and all your loving ways that is the kind of wonderful that you are today
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My beautiful niece, you shine like the stars brightening lives wherever you go spreading love and light, wherever you are. You are loved so much more than you know
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When your mom placed you in my arms after your birth, little did I know that she was placing you directly in my heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All nieces are brilliant and beautiful...and obviously take after their aunt.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A niece is a gift whose worth cannot be measured except by the heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A niece is a friend given by Nature.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A niece is someone special to remember with warmth, think of with pride, and cherish with love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To be on television and have my nieces and nephews see me, and seeing them wear my shirt to the games and be proud, it's so sweet. Sometimes it feels like it's just a dream.
quotes.author: Sue Wicks

quotes.quote: Everything is nicer when shared with a niece!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A niece grows more precious as time goes by.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A niece is a little bit of childhood that can never be lost.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Here together or miles apart, a niece like you stays in my heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To have a niece as wonderful as you, makes me one of the lucky few.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Whenever your dad grounds you, whenever your mom scolds you, whenever your teachers punish you, whenever your friends tease you-always remember that you have an aunt who is waiting to hug you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I believe in angels the kind that heaven sends. They're identified as nieces who are also special friends.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The sisters, cousins, aunts, and niece,And widowed ma of Captain Reece, Attended there as they were bid;It was their duty, and they did.
quotes.author: John Osborne

quotes.quote: Brought together by blood, kept together by love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Little girls made of sugar and spice grow up to be darling young women that we call our niece.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My dearest niece. You may be your mom's daughter, but you are my best friend.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I like the night. Without the dark, we'd never see the stars.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: I have loved the stars too fondly to be fearful of the night.
quotes.author: Sarah Williams

quotes.quote: The darker the night, the brighter the stars, the deeper the grief, the closer is God!
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: It was the possibility of darkness that made the day seem so bright.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Night is a time of rigor, but also of mercy. There are truths which one can see only when it's dark
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
quotes.author: Bernard Williams

quotes.quote: Night time is really the best time to work. All the ideas are there to be yours because everyone else is asleep.
quotes.author: Catherine O'Hara

quotes.quote: I often think that the night is more alive and more richly colored than the day.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Night is a world lit by itself.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: Twilight drops her curtain down, and pins it with a star.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: Night is the blotting paper for many sorrows.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Night hath a thousand eyes.
quotes.author: JohnLyly

quotes.quote: Night is the other half of life, and the better half.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: The day is for honest men, the night for thieves.
quotes.author: Euripedes

quotes.quote: Night is the mother of thoughts.
quotes.author: JohnFlorio

quotes.quote: You can't stand up to the night until you understand what's hiding in its shadows.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: The night is a skin pulled over the head of day that the day may be in torment.
quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

quotes.quote: Shadow owes its birth to light.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: Night's deepest gloom is but a calm; that soothes the weary mind: The labored days restoring balm; the comfort of mankind.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: Night brings our troubles to the light, rather than banishes them.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Shadows fall on even the brightest hours.
quotes.author: Bryan Waller Proctor

quotes.quote: Night is a stealthy, evil Raven, Wrapt to the eyes in his black wings.
quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.quote: The man who has seen the rising moon break out of the clouds at midnight has been present like an archangel at the creation of light and of the world
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: After winter comes the summer. After night comes the dawn. After every storm, there comes clear, open skies.
quotes.author: Samuel Rutherford

quotes.quote: In thoughts from the visions of the night, when deep sleep falleth on men.
quotes.author: BibleQuotes

quotes.quote: Night's black Mantle covers all alike.
quotes.author: Guillaume De Salluste Du Bartas

quotes.quote: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Night has brought to those who sleep, only dreams they can not keep.
quotes.author: Enya

quotes.quote: Night hovers all day in the boughs of the fir tree.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: No sight is more provocative of awe than is the night sky.
quotes.author: Llewelyn Powys

quotes.quote: Of all the things you choose in life, you don't get to choose what your nightmares are. You don't pick them; they pick you.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: It's been like a bad dream I never woke from.
quotes.author: Alex Chilton

quotes.quote: I want to keep my dreams, even bad ones, because without them, I might have nothing all night long.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.quote: Bad dreams are ghosts of our fears and worries, haunting us while we sleep. I doubt Valek is in trouble.
quotes.author: Maria V. Snyder

quotes.quote: There are bad dreams for those who sleep unwisely.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: It's weird when you wake of from a bad dream and everything is still bad.
quotes.author: Todd Strasser

quotes.quote: There is an excitement about having nightmares.
quotes.author: Betsey Johnson

quotes.quote: Nightmares are releases.
quotes.author: Sylvia Browne

quotes.quote: It's real simple - we all have nightmares, and the idea you can be in real jeopardy in them is a great gimmick. It's universal.
quotes.author: Robert Englund

quotes.quote: I drag myself out of nightmares each morning and find there's no relief in waking.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: I have had dreams and I have had nightmares, but I have conquered my nightmares because of my dreams.
quotes.author: Jonas Salk

quotes.quote: I told my therapist I was having nightmares about nuclear explosions. He said don't worry it's not the end of the world.
quotes.author: Jay London

quotes.quote: I still have nightmares about taking tests.
quotes.author: Bruce Jenner

quotes.quote: I used to have nightmares about the Antichrist - what would happen, where it would come from, and who it would be.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: I've had a quite a few nightmares about being chased by walkers.
quotes.author: Laurie Holden

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, the balance of nature decrees that a super-abundance of dreams is paid for by a growing potential for nightmares.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Most of my nightmares involve me forgetting my lines in a stage play.
quotes.author: Robert Englund

quotes.quote: I don't know if I'm dreaming when I sleep or sleeping while I'm awake, but I have reoccurring dreams my mind cannot take
quotes.author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quotes.quote: I very often have night terrors. Just think of the worst possible situation, and it's a regular thing for me. I've died in my sleep twenty-three different ways.
quotes.author: Julian Casablancas

quotes.quote: "For the night is dark and full of terrors.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: It is a good viewpoint to see the world as a dream. When you have something like a nightmare, you will wake up and tell yourself that it was only a dream. It is said that the world we live in is not a bit different from this.
quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quotes.quote: My uncle's house burned down when I was 6 years old. We got out safely. But ever since, I've had a nightmare of dying in a fire.
quotes.author: David Copperfield

quotes.quote: In fact I have nightmares about having children. I want to carry a baby and feel the life within me and in my dream, I do. But every time after it's born, there's this incredible fear, this pounding pulse of fear. It's a real bad nightmare.
quotes.author: Sharon Gless

quotes.quote: Dear God, let this be just a bad nightmare.
quotes.author: Roy Horn

quotes.quote: Put the nightmare together. If you do not wake up screaming, you have not put it together well.
quotes.author: R. A. Lafferty

quotes.quote: Nothing like being in a dream, then waking up to a nightmare.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Waking among the dead, one wondered if one was still alive. And yet real despair only seized us later. Afterwards. As we emerged from the nightmare and began to search for meaning.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Have you ever noticed there is never any third act to a nightmare? They bring you to a climax of terror and then leave you there.
quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

quotes.quote: The worst nightmare I ever had about Vietnam was that I had to go back. I woke up in a sweat, in total terror.
quotes.author: Oliver Stone

quotes.quote: Where hopes are unrealistic, fears often become exaggerated; where dreams alone are blueprints, nightmares result.
quotes.author: Anthony Daniels

quotes.quote: Moral nihilism comes with a price we can now see.
quotes.author: Torbjorn Tannsjo

quotes.quote: Those who believe in nothing are very, very jealous and angry at those who believe in something.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: Nihilism is but the other side of conventionalism; its creed consists of negations of the current so-called positive values, to which it remains bound.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Nothing exists; even if something exists, nothing can be known about it; and even if something can be known about it, knowledge about it can't be communicated to others.
quotes.author: Gorgias

quotes.quote: Nihilism has no substance. There is no such thing as nothingness, and zero does not exist. Everything is something. Nothing is nothing.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Lack of originality, everywhere, all over the world, from time immemorial, has always been considered the foremost quality and the recommendation of the active, efficient and practical man.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: In his heart he was highly delighted with his friend's suggestion, but he thought it a duty to conceal his feeling. He was not a nihilist for nothing!
quotes.author: Ivan Turgenev

quotes.quote: the problem is not suffering itself or oblivion itself but the depraved meaninglessness of these things, the absolutely inhuman nihilism of suffering.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: I think you can get to a point where nihilism, if that's the right word, is overwhelming, and the basic laws that society has set up - either religious or social laws - become meaningless.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Life's but a walking shadow, a poor player, that struts and frets his hour upon the stage, and then is heard no more; it is a tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying nothing.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The atheism and nihilism of my earlier years now seems shallow, and even a bit cocky.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: Nihilism is not an existential quandary but a speculative opportunity.
quotes.author: Ray Brassier

quotes.quote: The skeptic may deny your doctrine or attack your church but he cannot honestly ignore the fact that your life has been changed.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Everything is nothing, including the consciousness of nothing.
quotes.author: E. M. Cioran

quotes.quote: The skeptic has no illusions about life, nor a vain belief in the promise of immortality. Since this life here and now is all we can know, our most reasonable option is to live it fully.
quotes.author: Paul Kurtz

quotes.quote: It is complete nihilism to propose laying down arms in a world where atom bombs are around. It is very simple: there is no way of achieving peace other than with weapons.
quotes.author: Karl Popper

quotes.quote: Nihilism is not only despair and negation, but above all the desire to despair and to negate.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Everything in the world displeases me: but, above all, my displeasure in everything displeases me.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Nihilists embrace life's existence by the acceptance of nothingness.
quotes.author: Martijn Budel

quotes.quote: You don't realize all the things you have in this world, much more than you need, and you do much less than you can.
quotes.author: Roberto Canessa

quotes.quote: There must be somebody there, because somebody must have said Nobody.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: Tragedy is a vision of nihilism, a heroic or ennobling vision of nihilism.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: I think there is an element of nihilism about, but I don't think most artists feel their work is meaningless.
quotes.author: Leonard Baskin

quotes.quote: Meaning is malleable: take it out, you get nihilism and despair. Put it in, you get sacredness and something most special.
quotes.author: Dean Ornish

quotes.quote: A nihilist is not one who believes in nothing , but one who does not believe in what exists.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Certainty is not to be had. But as we learn this we become not more moral but more resigned. We become nihilists.
quotes.author: Ryan Gosling

quotes.quote: If all men lead mechanical, unpoetical lives, this is the real nihilism, the real undoing of the world.
quotes.author: Reginald Horace Blyth

quotes.quote: That is the most extreme form of nihilism: nothingness (the "meaningless") eternally!
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Nihilism, there's really nothing to it.
quotes.author: Dean Cavanagh

quotes.quote: Skeptical scrutiny is the means, in both science and religion, by which deep thoughts can be winnowed from deep nonsense.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The secret of life is to have no fear; It's the only way to function.
quotes.author: Stokely Carmichael

quotes.quote: The free man is he who does not fear to go to the end of his thought.
quotes.author: Leon Blum

quotes.quote: Have no fear of moving into the unknown. Simply step out fearlessly… Do this in complete faith and confidence.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: He that knows no guilt can know no fear.
quotes.author: Philip Massinger

quotes.quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: A drop in the ocean has no fear of a hurricane.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: If you have no fear, no one has power over you.
quotes.author: John Maeda

quotes.quote: The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: There is no fear. There are only two things. Trained and untrained.
quotes.author: Alistair Overeem

quotes.quote: Fear attracts the darkness. When you have no fear, the darkness fears you.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Brave is not saying I have no fear. It's being terrified and still moving forward.
quotes.author: Elisa Jimenez

quotes.quote: Being brave doesn't mean we have no fear - it means we refuse to be overcome by it.
quotes.author: Steven Furtick

quotes.quote: No fear. No distractions. The ability to let that which does not matter truly slide.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The brave man is not the one who has no fears, he is the one who triumphs over his fears.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Being fearless doesn't mean you have no fears. it means you're strong enough to face them.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: No fear. We are never sure of anything. Fear never prevents [bad things] from happening.
quotes.author: Vanessa Paradis

quotes.quote: If we lived in a world with no fear, then you would never discover the courage you have within.
quotes.author: Jennifer O'Neill

quotes.quote: Usually we think that brave people have no fear. The truth is that they are intimate with fear.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.quote: The eagle has no fear of adversity. We need to be like the eagle and have a fearless spirit of a conqueror!
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Life and death are the same thing. When we realize this fact, we have no fear of death anymore, nor actual difficulty in our life.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: There is no fear. Absolutely no fear. When one lives without fear, one cannot be broken. When one lives with fear one is broken before one begins to live.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: If you are not concerned about the outcome of a circumstance, you will experience no fear. Whatever the outcome will be, will be, whether you fear it or not.
quotes.author: Ching Ning Chu

quotes.quote: When you see that you are not the body, that the body comprises only a small fraction of the aggregate of your awareness, then death is no fear, life is no fear, there is no fear.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Have no fear in the devil and acknowledge the insecurities, mistakes of the past, and disappointments that you have long failed to accept as new beginnings and see the child within you begin to heal.
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: Play with no fear of failure.
quotes.author: Max Seibald

quotes.quote: There's no fear when you're having fun.
quotes.author: Will Thomas

quotes.quote: In the blackest of your moments, wait with no fear.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: When you focus on serving, there is no fear in you.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: A man who says he feels no fear is either a fool or a liar.
quotes.author: Fred Dibnah

quotes.quote: If all girls started wearing no makeup and comfortable clothes, guys would have no choice but to fall for girl because of natural beauty.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, whoever you meet, just remember that there is this person who loves you best when you have no makeup on.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Makeup can only make you look pretty on the outside, but it doesn't help if you're ugly on the inside. Unless you eat the makeup.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: She's not wearing makeup so her face just looks like skin.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: It's very often true that some women look better without makeup, but that's only during the day.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: If you retain nothing else, always remember the most important rule of beauty which is, who cares?
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: My main beauty tip is don't say that negative thing when you look in the mirror. It just isn't healthyâ€¦That lack of beating up on ourselves â€” that's my new mantra. Happiness is the best makeup; a smile is better than any lipstick you'll put on.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: I love not wearing maekup because I can just rub my eyes and nothing happens.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I believe that all women are pretty without makeup- but with the right makeup can be pretty powerful.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: True beauty is wearing no makeup and being 100% okay with it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every girl wants a guy who she can run up to with her hair a mess, no makeup, and the first thing he says is "you're beautiful"
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I've worked hard to feel beautiful in my natural skin. Personally, I don't ever want to depend on makeup to feel beautiful.
quotes.author: Lupita Nyong'o

quotes.quote: If you show up without makeup or looking sloppy, no matter how impressive your ideas are, no one is going to pay attention to you. People take you more seriously if you look polished.
quotes.author: Sylvia Ann Hewlett

quotes.quote: I don't believe makeup and the right hairstyle alone can make a woman beautiful. The most radiant woman in the room is the one full of life and experience.
quotes.author: Sharon Stone

quotes.quote: A man without makeup is like a cake without icing.
quotes.author: Klaus Nomi

quotes.quote: The beauty of a woman is not in her facial makeup but in the kindness of her soul.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: A smile is the best makeup that any girl can wear.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Whether I'm wearing lots of makeup or no makeup, I'm always the same person inside.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: I feel most beautiful at night, when I take my makeup off and it's just me.
quotes.author: Ashley Greene

quotes.quote: The sweetest thing a guy said is that I look pretty with or without makeup.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.quote: There's no better makeup than self-confidence.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: I always thought you were prettiest like this: No makeup, messy hair... Little sweaty.
quotes.author: Brad Falchuk

quotes.quote: Wake up and I'm feeling so hood / No make up and I still look good / Wake up and I feel so hood
quotes.author: Taheem Ransom

quotes.quote: I'm legit / With no makeup / Don't have to curl my hair up
quotes.author: Ciara Pirncess Harris

quotes.quote: Well I've seen you in jeans with no make-up on / And I've stood there in awe as your date for the prom / I'm blessed as a man to have seen you in white / But I've never seen anything quite like you tonight
quotes.author: Daniel John O'Donoghue

quotes.quote: She has the qualities of a queen, she's a queen / Ooo ooo what a natural beauty / No need no make-up to be a cutie / She's a queen, she's a queen
quotes.author: Freddrie Hubbard

quotes.quote: I like you in sweatpants, no makeup / even like your messed up hair / You're just perfect right when you wake up / You're so pretty when you don't care
quotes.author: James Kevin Dotson

quotes.quote: You told me I look pretty with no makeup / You stay on my mind before I wake up
quotes.author: Stephanie Victoria Allen

quotes.quote: And when you wake up with no make-up / That's true beauty in my eyes / No matter how I try / I lose it when you smile
quotes.author: Jaramye Daniels

quotes.quote: You don't wake up with that makeup on / I think you're better no makeup on / You got a problem? Just say what's wrong / Don't cover up
quotes.author: A\villain

quotes.quote: No one cares until someone cares; be that one!
quotes.author: Ken Poirot

quotes.quote: Nobody cares how much you know, until they know how much you care.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If no one cares for you at all, do you even really exist?
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: No one cares. Apathy is a disease and some days I long for it.
quotes.author: Zoe Trope

quotes.quote: It is the nature of creation, no one cares how much you are good or bad, just get famous, they all will walk after you.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: No one is asking what happened to all the homeless. No one cares, because it's easier to get on the subway and not be accosted.
quotes.author: Richard Linklater

quotes.quote: At times some may think that no one cares--but someone always cares! Your Heavenly Father will not leave you to struggle alone, but stands ever ready to help.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: You are in obscurity when you are still needed but no one cares a lot what you say or think, or even where you are working from. You have no voice or presence that makes you relevant. Grow your voice.
quotes.author: Archibald Marwizi

quotes.quote: There is nothing worse than the feeling that no one cares whether we exists or not, that no one is interested in what we have to say about life, and that the world can continue turning without our awkward presence.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Be happy. Decide to be happy. If you want to be happy, be happy! No one cares if you're happy or not, so why wait for permission? And did it really matter if you had been deeply unhappy in your past? Who but you remembered that?
quotes.author: Amity Gaige

quotes.quote: The mind is so tricky. It will say, "No one cares. Is it true? Well, someone does. Let's see: So-and-so doesn't care. Well, maybe they do. Well, there is someone who doesn't care." It just shifts and shifts and shifts, so it can keep all of its concepts intact.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: You have to make people realize your worth, else no one cares!
quotes.author: Anamika Mishra

quotes.quote: Nobody cares about worthiness. People care about what is real inside of you.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Nobody cares how tough your upbringing was. Nobody cares if you suffered some discrimination.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Everywhere there is apathy. Nobody cares whether that which is preached is true or false. A sermon is a sermon whatever the subject; only, the shorter it is, the better.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: It isn’t a perfect place. There are no perfect places. But nobody cares about perfection when there are sand castles to build and kites to chase, children that are being born, old hearts that are giving in.
quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

quotes.quote: Nobody cares if you're an idiot, as long as you're a useful one.
quotes.author: Mira Grant

quotes.quote: No one cares of you, you should care of yourself.
quotes.author: Lilly Ghalichi

quotes.quote: You dont want to play a perfect person; no one cares about that.
quotes.author: Matthew Morrison

quotes.quote: No one cares about it more than you. Give it the attention it needs.
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: No one cares about you. No one cares. You will die and be forgotten.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: One unrepaired broken window is a signal that no one cares, and so breaking more windows costs nothing.
quotes.author: James Q. Wilson

quotes.quote: There is something very freeing about being anonymous because nothing is expected of you; nothing is getting back to anyone, and no one cares.
quotes.author: Dolly Wells

quotes.quote: No one cares who is better who is worse who has more who has less. Content in our connectedness we are brothers and sisters after all.
quotes.author: Adele Faber

quotes.quote: Money is not the thing that drives me. I like to develop assets to create value. No one cares how rich you are or what your ranking is in Forbes magazine.
quotes.author: Mikhail Prokhorov

quotes.quote: It seems unfortunate that strong people are usually so disagreeable and overbearing that no one cares for them. In fact, to be different from your fellow creatures is always a misfortune.
quotes.author: L. Frank Baum

quotes.quote: If nobody cares, then it doesn't matter what happens to flowers.
quotes.author: Daniel Dennett

quotes.quote: It is not necessary to bury the truth. It is sufficient merely to delay it until nobody cares.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Embarrassment has a lot to do with thinking too much. Let it go. Nobody cares as much as you think they do.
quotes.author: Ryan Robbins

quotes.quote: I have no regrets. I wouldn't have lived my life the way I did if I was going to worry about what people were going to say.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: There are no regrets in life, just lessons.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.author: Victoria Holt

quotes.quote: I have no regrets because I know I did my best -- all I could do.
quotes.author: Midori Ito

quotes.quote: I've no regrets. You take responsibility for your actions.
quotes.author: Ron Moody

quotes.quote: Work hard, do your best, live the truth, trust yourself, have some fun...and you'll have no regrets.
quotes.author: Byrd Bagget

quotes.quote: I have no regrets. Regrets are meaningless. You can't change yesterday or tomorrow. You can change only this present moment.
quotes.author: Richey Edwards

quotes.quote: There's no point in regretting things. If you can't do the time, don't do the crime. Life's too short to worry about things I've said.
quotes.author: Robbie Williams

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Make it a rule of life never to regret and never to look back. regret is an appalling waste of energy; you can't build on it; it's only good for wallowing in.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: No regrets. No looking back. Just hold onto life and move forward. We have no way of knowing what lies ahead...and that is what makes the journey even more exciting.
quotes.author: Susan Gale

quotes.quote: I have no regrets. I will never regret loving someone because the feeling of love for five minutes is greater than an eternity of hurt.
quotes.author: Kurt Langner

quotes.quote: Never regret. IF IT'S GOOD, It's wonderful. IF IT'S BAD, IT'S experience.
quotes.author: Victoria Holt

quotes.quote: At the end of the day let their be no regrets, only a desire to do more tomorrow than you did today.
quotes.author: Noel Dejesus

quotes.quote: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.author: Rita Mero

quotes.quote: Never look back and regret, look back and smile at what you have learned.
quotes.author: Michelle C. Ustaszeski

quotes.quote: I don't dwell in the past; I don't wallow in old events and emotions. I don't waste time on regret. No use going over and over the details of what already happened.
quotes.author: Yanni

quotes.quote: I don't have time for regrets, only fun.
quotes.author: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.quote: I have no regrets. I don't believe in looking back. What I am proudest of? Working really hard... and achieving as much as I could.
quotes.author: Elena Kagan

quotes.quote: I already gave my best.I have no regrets at all.
quotes.author: William Hung

quotes.quote: Accept everything about yourself - I mean everything, You are you and that is the beginning and the end - no apologies, no regrets.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.quote: I never regret anything. Because every little detail of your life is what made you into who you are in the end.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Live with no excuses and love with no regrets.
quotes.author: Montel

quotes.quote: We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: We should have no regrets. ... The past is finished. There is nothing to be gained by going over it. Whatever it gave us in the experiences it brought us was something we had to know.
quotes.author: Rebecca Beard

quotes.quote: Forget regret, or life is yours to miss.
quotes.author: Jonathan Larson

quotes.quote: Regret for time wasted can become a power for good in the time that remains, if we will only stop the waste and the idle, useless regretting.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: In looking back, I see nothing to regret and little to correct.
quotes.author: John C. Calhoun

quotes.quote: Regrets and recriminations only hurt your soul.
quotes.author: Armand Hammer

quotes.quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
quotes.author: George Halas

quotes.quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow men. True nobility lies in being superior to your former self.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Real nobility is based on scorn, courage, and profound indifference.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Sweet mercy is nobility's true badge.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Nobility of spirit has more to do with simplicity than ostentation, wisdom rather than wealth, commitment rather than ambition.
quotes.author: Riccardo Muti

quotes.quote: The nobility of a human being is strictly independent of that of his convictions.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: Put more trust in nobility of character than in an oath.
quotes.author: Solon

quotes.quote: It matters not from what stock we are descended so long as we have virtue; for that alone is true Nobility.
quotes.author: Wellins Calcott

quotes.quote: Noble persons have the best capacities; for whether they give themselves to goodness or ungraciousness, they do in either excel, as none of the common sort of people can come anything nigh them.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Nobility is kept alive and strong when it is attached to wealth, and without money it is like a dead thing, for those who are in need have often to turn their hands to vile things.
quotes.author: Martin De Viciana

quotes.quote: Nobility without virtue is a fine setting without a gem.
quotes.author: Jane Porter

quotes.quote: Nobility is a river that sets with a constant and undeviating current, directly into the great Pacific Ocean of Time; but, unlike all other rivers, it is more grand at its source, than at its termination.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: A degenerate nobleman, or one that is proud of his birth, is like a turnip: there is nothing good of him but that which is underground.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: If a man be endowed with a generous mind, this is the best kind of nobility.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Nobility of birth does not always insure a corresponding unity of mind; if it did, it would always act as a stimulus to noble actions; but it sometimes acts as a clog rather than a spur.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: The essence of true nobility is neglect of self.
quotes.author: James A. Froude

quotes.quote: Noble blood is an accident of fortune; noble actions characterize the great.
quotes.author: Carlo Goldoni

quotes.quote: New nobility is but the act of power, but ancient nobility is the act of time.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: To do good is noble. To tell others to do good is even nobler and much less trouble.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The warrior's nobility is like a prostitute's smile, the truth of which is self-interest.
quotes.author: Georges Bataille

quotes.quote: Even in adversity, nobility shines through, when a man endures repeated and severe misfortune with patience, not owing to insensibility but from generosity and greatness of soul.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Nobility is expensive, nonproductive, and parasitic, siphoning away too much of society’s energy to satisfy its frivolous cravings.
quotes.author: Alan Weisman

quotes.quote: True nobility is exempt from fear.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Base men being in love have then a nobility in their natures more than is native to them.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: My nobility begins in me, but yours ends in you.
quotes.author: Iphicrates

quotes.quote: Idleness is an appendix to nobility.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: What is madness but nobility of soul. At odds with circumstance?
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: I believe that love is better than hate. And that there is more nobility in building a chicken coop than in destroying a cathedral.
quotes.author: Betty Greene

quotes.quote: If ancient descent could confer nobility, the lower forms of life would possess it in a greater degree than man.
quotes.author: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.quote: To men and women there falls the task of exploring truth with their reason, and in this their nobility consists.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: As one lamp lights another, nor grows less, So nobleness enkindleth nobleness.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: The noble soul reveres itself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A noble truth is a sacred creed.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: The noble man is only God's image.
quotes.author: Ludwig Tieck

quotes.quote: No noble man ever hated good wine.
quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

quotes.quote: Often a noble face hides filthy ways.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A noble spirit embiggens the smallest man.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The noble soul occupies itself with wisdom and friendship.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: A noble spirit finds a cure for injustice in forgetting it.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Noble deeds and hot baths are the best cures for depression.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: Noble friends and companions are the whole of the holy life.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: It is noble to teach oneself; it is still nobler to teach others.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A noble soul and real poetic talent are almost always inseparable.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Noble spirits are heterodox.
quotes.author: Kedar Joshi

quotes.quote: Noble fathers have noble children.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: A noble deed is a step toward God.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.quote: A noble deed is a step towards heaven.
quotes.author: J. G. Holland

quotes.quote: The noble must make humility his root.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: The noble lord is the Rupert of debate.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Noble discontent is the path to heaven.
quotes.author: Thomas Wentworth Higginson

quotes.quote: Every noble work is at first impossible.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: No noble thing can be done without risks.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: A noble man is led by woman's gentle words.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Every noble activity makes room for itself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Do noble things, not dream them all day long.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: A noble cause doth ease much a grievous case.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: A noble heart will always capitulate to reason.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: A noble heart is a window to find an open mind.
quotes.author: Anuj

quotes.quote: Some noble spirits mistake despair for content.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Parker Willis

quotes.quote: Noble deeds that are concealed are most esteemed.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Only the noble of heart are called to difficulty.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Nobody can give you freedom. Nobody can give you equality or justice or anything. If you're a man, you take it.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Nobody lives without making mistakes.
quotes.author: Michael Cimino

quotes.quote: Nobody gets through life without experiencing some form of rejection, which is why everybody knows how awful it feels.
quotes.author: Adena Friedman

quotes.quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself. Nothing can bring you peace but the triumph of principles.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Nobody should pin their hopes on a miracle.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: Nobody got anywhere in the world by simply being content.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: Nobody speaks the truth when there is something they must have.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
quotes.author: George Halas

quotes.quote: Nobody's perfect. Even the most successful people make serious mistakes.
quotes.author: Travis Bradberry

quotes.quote: If nobody recognizes you, if nobody cares, it's easier to avoid getting carried away. That's way harder if you're a famous artist.
quotes.author: Max Martin

quotes.quote: Nobody owes anybody a living, but everybody is entitled to a chance.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.quote: Nobody ever did, or ever will, escape the consequences of his choices.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: Nobody gets lucky all the time. Nobody can win all the time. Nobody's a robot. Nobody's perfect.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.quote: Nobody minds having what is too good for them.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Nobody is bored when he is trying to make something that is beautiful, or to discover something that is true.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: Nobody understands another's sorrow, and nobody another's joy.
quotes.author: Franz Schubert

quotes.quote: Nobody's life is ever all balanced. It's a conscious decision to choose your priorities every day.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Hasselbeck

quotes.quote: Nobody is perfect, but life is about choices.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.quote: Nobody is a villain in their own story. We're all the heroes of our own stories.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Nobody can dare me to do anything that I don't come up with on my own.
quotes.author: Corey Taylor

quotes.quote: Nobody can defeat you when you all are working together.
quotes.author: Jason Pierre-Paul

quotes.quote: Nobody is as powerful as we make them out to be.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Nobody deserves your tears, but whoever deserves them will not make you cry.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: Nobody really knows everything, and they can only assume.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: No one got anywhere by being too scared to open their mouth in case nobody laughed.
quotes.author: Catherine Tate

quotes.quote: Nobody cares how much you know, until they know how much you care.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Nobody can ever pin you down when you speculate.
quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, nobody cares how much you tried, what the deal was, or if you were a good guy or a bad guy.
quotes.author: David Lichtenstein

quotes.quote: If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Never hold up your entire group of friends in real life trying to capture a perfect Instagram pose. Nobody cares.
quotes.author: Mary H.K. Choi

quotes.quote: It's a disease. Nobody thinks or feels or cares any more; nobody gets excited or believes in anything except their own comfortable little God damn mediocrity.
quotes.author: Richard Yates

quotes.quote: You have to do something different, or you are just the guy who goes out there and has a great match, but nobody cares. You have to have different layers to your character.
quotes.author: Dolph Ziggler

quotes.quote: Nobody cares how much you know, until they know how much you care.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A man can spend his whole existence never learning the simple lesson that he has only one life and that if he fails to do what he wants with it, nobody else really cares.
quotes.author: Louis Auchincloss

quotes.quote: There is nothing worse than the feeling that no one cares whether we exists or not, that no one is interested in what we have to say about life, and that the world can continue turning without our awkward presence
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: No one cares / who is better / who is worse / who has more / who has less. / Content in our connectedness / we are brothers and sisters / after all.
quotes.author: Adele Faber

quotes.quote: No one cares of you , you should care of yourself.
quotes.author: Lilly Ghalichi

quotes.quote: If no one cares for you at all, do you even really exist?
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Nobody cares if you can't dance well. Just get up and dance.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Don’t sacrifice yourself too much, because if you sacrifice too much there’s nothing else you can give and nobody will care for you.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfield

quotes.quote: Nobody cares much whether you write or not. You just have to do it
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: Nobody cares about the bronze or silver medals.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: Nobody cares. You shouldn't either.
quotes.author: Alexander Gordon Smith

quotes.quote: it is the ordinary lot of people to have no friends if they themselves care for nobody.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: If you study something that nobody cares about, does that mean everyone will leave you alone?
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell

quotes.quote: It is amazing how much can be accomplished if no one cares who gets the credit.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: No one cares to speak to an unwilling listener. An arrow never lodges in a stone: often it recoils upon the shooter of it.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: At the very least, noir offers an alternate reality - moments of real passion, a bleak code of honor, and a need for freedom amid corruption. At its best, noir offers a map of subversion.
quotes.author: Margo Jefferson

quotes.quote: Noir is a court of human relations, and some crimes are beyond legal restitution.
quotes.author: Margo Jefferson

quotes.quote: Noir has always shown that greed and chaos are as close as the company we work for or the politicians we vote for.
quotes.author: Margo Jefferson

quotes.quote: Crime fiction, especially noir and hardboiled, is the literature of the proletariat.
quotes.author: Adrian McKinty

quotes.quote: As long as life disappoints, men and women betray each other, and what we need gets us killed, there'll always be film noir.
quotes.author: Charles Pappas

quotes.quote: The noir hero is a knight in blood caked armor. He's dirty and he does his best to deny the fact that he's a hero the whole time.
quotes.author: Frank Miller

quotes.quote: That’s what noir feels like to me. It feels like some kind of recurring dream, with very strong archetypes operating. You know, the guilty girl being pursued, falling, all kinds of stuff that we see in our dreams all the time.
quotes.author: Brian De Palma

quotes.quote: The noir universe hates do-gooders so it tries to pound them and punish them.
quotes.author: Duane Swierczynski

quotes.quote: In Greek tragedy, they fall from great heights. In noir, they fall from the curb.
quotes.author: Dennis Lehane

quotes.quote: Noir is where the clarity of moral divisions break down, the black and whites turn into grays.
quotes.author: Elliott Colla

quotes.quote: Film noir has a mood that everyone can feel. It’s people in trouble, at night, with a little bit of wind and the right kind of music. It’s a beautiful thing.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: Flawed characters... a ticking clock... morally questionable acts on all sides... moody, evocative art... oh yeah, this the stuff crime noir fans love!
quotes.author: Christos Gage

quotes.quote: Is there something in druggy subjects that encourages directors to make imitation film noir? Film noir itself becomes an addiction.
quotes.author: Pauline Kael

quotes.quote: There is something missing in a lot of digital filmmaking, something I call “poetic reality.” That’s something you see played out in film noir, where the technique establishes the mood.
quotes.author: Vilmos Zsigmond

quotes.quote: There are specific times where film noir is a natural concomitant of the mood. When there’s insecurity, collapse of financial systems – that’s where film noir always hits fertile ground.
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.quote: Film noir is not a genre. It is not defined, as are the western and gangster genres, by conventions of setting and conflict, but rather by the more subtle qualities of tone and mood. It is a film 'noir', as opposed to the possible variants of film gray or film off-white.
quotes.author: Paul Schrader

quotes.quote: If film noir males are destroyed or nearly destroyed by fate, the noir woman is fate's emissary, a siren leading the man to ruination.
quotes.author: Jack Nachbar

quotes.quote: I wouldn't presume to define noir - if we could define it, we wouldn't need to use a French word for it - but it seems to me it's more a way of looking at the world than what one sees.
quotes.author: Lawrence Block

quotes.quote: This is what noir is, what it can be when it stops playing nice--blunt force drama stripped down to the bone, then made to dance across the page.
quotes.author: Stephen Graham Jones

quotes.quote: Noir is about losers. The characters in these existential, nihilistic tales are doomed. They may not die, but they probably should, as the life that awaits them is certain to be so ugly, so lost and lonely, that they'd be better off just curling up and getting it over with. And, let's face it, they deserve it. Pretty much everyone in a noir story (or film) is driven by greed, lust, jealousy or alienation, a path that inevitably sucks them into a downward spiral from which they cannot escape. They couldn't find the exit from their personal highway to hell if flashing neon lights pointed to a town named Hope. It is their own lack of morality that blindly drives them to ruin.
quotes.author: Otto Penzler

quotes.quote: You need cops, venetian blinds, lots of smoking, hats, sweat, dead-end streets, guys who know all the angles except for the one that ends up sticking out of their backs. Sirens of the automotive and female kind.
quotes.author: James Lileks

quotes.quote: With a genre like film noir, everyone has these assumptions and expectations. And once all of those things are in place, that's when you can really start to twist it about and mess around with it.
quotes.author: Lana Wachowski

quotes.quote: One difference between film noir and more straightforward crime pictures is that noir is more open to human flaws and likes to embed them in twisty plot lines.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: It's a noir world. Unfair things happen.
quotes.author: Rob Thomas

quotes.quote: For me, true noir is about people who know they are doing the wrong thing, and they do it anyway.
quotes.author: Eddie Muller

quotes.quote: Going back to the noir fiction of the 30s, 40s and 50s. It's very contemporary.
quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

quotes.quote: I think a film noir demands a beginning and an end.
quotes.author: Claire Denis

quotes.quote: I think the great unspoken theme in noir fiction is male self-pity. It pervades noir movies.
quotes.author: James Ellroy

quotes.quote: You can't be distracted by the noise of misinformation.
quotes.author: James Daly

quotes.quote: The sweetest noise on earth, a woman's tongue; A string which hath no discord.
quotes.author: Bryan Procter

quotes.quote: The difference between noise and music is in what the musician does with the sounds.
quotes.author: Jean-Michel Jarre

quotes.quote: The noise resembles the roar of heavy, distant surf. Standing on the stirring ice one can imagine it is disturbed by the breathing and tossing of a mighty giant below.
quotes.author: Ernest Shackleton

quotes.quote: Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Noise is the most impertinent of all forms of interruption. It is not only an interruption, but also a disruption of thought.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Noise proves nothing. Often a hen who has merely laid an egg cackles as if she laid an asteroid.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Noise is an imposition on sanity, and we live in very noisy times.
quotes.author: Joan Baez
