quotes.quote: NOISE, n. A stench in the ear. Undomesticated music. The chief product and authenticating sign of civilization.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The loudest noise in the world is silence.
quotes.author: Thelonious Monk

quotes.quote: Noise tri­umphs and reigns supreme over the sen­si­bil­ity of men.
quotes.author: Luigi Russolo

quotes.quote: The noise from good toast should reverberate in the head like the thunder of July.
quotes.author: E. V. Lucas

quotes.quote: If by noise you mean uncomfortable sound, then pop music is noise to me.
quotes.author: Merzbow

quotes.quote: Nonsense and noise will oft prevail, When honor and affection fail.
quotes.author: Robert Lloyd

quotes.quote: There is always a certain noise in applause: even in the applause we give ourselves.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Noise and crowds have a way of siphoning our energy and distracting our attention, making prayer an added chore rather than a comforting relief
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: So great was the noise during the day that I used to lie awake at night listening to silence.
quotes.author: Muriel Spark

quotes.quote: What is noise to the old order is harmony to the new.
quotes.author: Jacques Attali

quotes.quote: Of all noises, I think music is the least disagreeable.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: We are too connected. There's noise in our heads all the time.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Noise and activity are the refuges of the bereaved and the guilty.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: And it's amazing how much noise people ignoring each other can make.
quotes.author: Eoin Colfer

quotes.quote: The signal is the truth. The noise is what distracts us from the truth.
quotes.author: Nate Silver

quotes.quote: Do not confound noise with fame. The man who is remembered, is not always honored.
quotes.author: Frances Wright

quotes.quote: That's another thing about Noise. Everything that's ever happened to you just keeps right on talking, for ever and ever.
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.quote: We must never let the noise of the world overpower and overwhelm that still small voice.
quotes.author: L. Tom Perry

quotes.quote: Noises are like arrows pierced to a gentle soul when the mind is on a journey of thought.
quotes.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quotes.quote: There's a lot of noise in the world, and the Internet magnifies that energy.
quotes.author: Ben Affleck

quotes.quote: You don't make a statement unless you make noise.
quotes.author: Adam Cole

quotes.quote: Noise is a parasite. Anything noisy is poorly designed.
quotes.author: Raymond Loewy

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: By experience we find out a short way by a long wandering.
quotes.author: Roger Ascham

quotes.quote: I have been a wanderer among distant fields. I have sailed down mighty rivers.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we will find it not.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There are three wants which can never be satisfied: that of the rich, who want something more; that of the sick, who want something different; and that of the traveler, who says, Anywhere but here.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The earnestness of your desire will indicate the distance you are likely to travel.
quotes.author: Clark C. Stockford

quotes.quote: We are all travelers in the desert of life and the best we can find in our journey is an honest friend.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: The road recedes as the traveler advances, leaving a continuous present.
quotes.author: Richard Le Gallienne

quotes.quote: A fugitive and a vagabond shalt thou be in the earth.
quotes.author: Bible (Gen. 4:12)

quotes.quote: Tell me, muse, of the of many resources who wandered far and wide after he sacked the holy citadel of Troy, and he saw the cities and learned the thoughts of many men, and on the sea he suffered in his heart many woes.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: I traveled among unknown men, / In lands beyond the sea; / Nor, England! did I know till then / What love I bore to thee.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The lyricism of marginality may find inspiration in the image of the 'outlaw,' the great social nomad, who prowls on the confines of a docile, frightened order.
quotes.author: Michel Foucault

quotes.quote: Little soul, wandering, gentle guest and companion of the body, into what places will you now go, pale, stiff, and naked, no longer sporting as you did?
quotes.author: Hadrian

quotes.quote: Even such is time, that it takes in trust / Our youth, our joys, our all we have, / And pays us but with age and dust; / Who in the dark and silent grave, / When we have wandered all our ways, / Shuts up the story of our days.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Raleigh

quotes.quote: On a journey, ill, / And over fields all withered, dreams / Go wandering still.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Farewell to the Highlands, farewell to the North, / The birthplace of valor, the country of worth! / Wherever I wander, wherever I rove, / The hills of the Highlands for ever I love.
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: Breathes there the nun. with soul so dead, / Who never to himself hath said, / This is my own, my native land! / Whose heart hath ne'er within him burn’d / As home his footsteps he hath turn'd / From wandering on a foreign strand!
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Helen, thy beauty is to me / Like those Nicean barks of yore, / That gently, o'er a perfumed sea, / The weary, wayworn wanderer bore / To his own native shore.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Oh rest ye, brother mariners, we will not wander more.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Judaism, Christianity, and Islam all took root among nomads who had settled, and all three characterize nomadic traits — the shepherd, the pilgrim, the wanderer in the wilderness — as godly, and the life in the city as degenerate.
quotes.author: George Monbiot

quotes.quote: Shyly in the mountain-cleft / Was the Troglodyte concealed; / And the roving Nomad left, / Desert lying, each broad field.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: A nomad I will remain for life, in love with distant and uncharted places.
quotes.author: Isabelle Eberhardt

quotes.quote: AÂ nomadic society cannot experience enclosed space.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Every hundred feet the world changes.
quotes.author: Roberto Bolaño

quotes.quote: A good traveller has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: A man in a cave or in a camp, aÂ nomad, will die with no more estate than the wolf or the horse leaves.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't settle down and sit in one place. Move around, be nomadic, make each day a new horizon.
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.quote: Be the calm eye of the storm where nothing phases you, focus on your centre to remain balanced, let your life flow like a stream of wind.
quotes.author: Jay Woodman

quotes.quote: There's calm in each and every day, we just need to practice reaching out for it.
quotes.author: Ron Baratono

quotes.quote: They became nonchalant because this was more or less an everyday occurrence out there.
quotes.author: Bob Petersen

quotes.quote: The ability to remain calm and focused in stressful situations is central to making positive decisions.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: To be calm is the highest achievement of the best of what you have.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: Be the light in the dark, be the calm in the storm and be at peace while at war.
quotes.author: Michael Dolan

quotes.quote: Remaining calm in times of desperation makes way for opportunity.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Nonchalance is the ability to remain down to earth when everything else is up in the air.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Relax and calm your mind. Forget about yourself and follow your opponent's movement.
quotes.author: Yip Man

quotes.quote: There's calm in the mind of the humble. An unmistakable peace of not having to prove anything to anyone.
quotes.author: Ron Baratono

quotes.quote: A person is wise if he listens to millions of advice and doesn't implement any of it.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Nonchalant putts count the same as chalant putts.
quotes.author: Henry Beard

quotes.quote: Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Remain calm, serene, always in command of yourself. You will then find out how easy it is to get along.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Let your soul stand cool and composed before a million universes.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Be calm in arguing; for fierceness makes error a fault, and truth discourtesy.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Nothing is so bitter that a calm mind cannot find comfort in it.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Good acting is about being as natural and calm as possible. These days producers have such definite ideas that you have to be prepared to do whatever they ask.
quotes.author: Bryn Terfel

quotes.quote: Be calm like a calm lake, then you will look beautiful like a beautiful calm lake!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: A calm mind helps our human intelligence to assess the situation realistically.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Calm self-confidence is as far from conceit as the desire to earn a decent living is remote from greed.
quotes.author: Channing Pollock

quotes.quote: If you are calm about your ambitions, you become confident of achieving what you set out to do.
quotes.author: Shiv Nadar

quotes.quote: Be calm in the face of all common disgraces.
quotes.author: Gordon Lightfoot

quotes.quote: Calm sailing doesn't come from calm waters, it comes from having a good navigator; a good crew and a good vessel.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Sometimes playing stupid opens your eyes to the truth.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Practice in everything a certain nonchalance that shall conceal design and show that what is done and said is done without effort and almost without thought.
quotes.author: Baldassare Castiglione

quotes.quote: Jazz music is an intensified feeling of nonchalance.
quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

quotes.quote: I'm definitely not nonchalant. I have to leave nonchalant at home when I'm working on something, otherwise, I just don't feel like I'm committed, and I've gotta be fully committed.
quotes.author: Guy Pearce

quotes.quote: The nonchalance and dolce-far-niente air of nature and society hint at infinite periods in the progress of mankind.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Cool and nonchalant, like none of this mattered anyway. Is that what guys really wanted? Or was it just what the girls thought the guys wanted
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: The hope of a secure and livable world lies with disciplined nonconformists who are dedicated to justice, peace and brotherhood.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Nonconformity is an empty goal, and rebellion against prevailing opinion merely because it is prevailing should no more be praised than acquiescence to it. Indeed, it is often a mask for cowardice, and few are more pathetic than those who flaunt outer differences to expiate their inner surrender.
quotes.author: William H. Whyte

quotes.quote: If a minority culture doesn't accept you as much as majority culture, think about following a path of non-conformity
quotes.author: Paul Isaacs

quotes.quote: Nonconformists travel as a rule in bunches. You rarely find a nonconformist who goes it alone. And woe to him inside a nonconformist clique who does not conform with nonconformity.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The fragrances are really a dream about the possibilities of a life. Nonconformity, no judgement.
quotes.author: Jared Leto

quotes.quote: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: You were born an original work of art. Stay original always. Originals cost more than imitations.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Once in a while it really hits people that they don't have to experience the world in the way they have been told to.
quotes.author: Alan Keightley

quotes.quote: They will say you are on the wrong road, if it is your own.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: People would rather be wrong than be different.
quotes.author: Henry Jacobsen

quotes.quote: We must not confuse dissent with disloyalty.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: We are half ruined by conformity; but we should be wholly ruined without it.
quotes.author: Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: Never do anything against conscience even if the state demands it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A free society cherishes nonconformity. It knows from the non-conformist, from the eccentric, have come many of the great ideas.
quotes.author: Henry Steele Commager

quotes.quote: Non-conformity is the only real passion worth being ruled by.
quotes.author: Julian Assange

quotes.quote: Any fool can do something cool and look cool, but it takes skill to make something uncool cool again.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you don't give yourself permission to create a new world, chances are nobody else will.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: Read, every day, something no one else is reading. Think, every day, something no one else is thinking. Do, every day, something no one else would be silly enough to do. It is bad for the mind to continually be part of unanimity.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Every great historic change has been based on nonconformity, has been bought either with the blood or with the reputation of nonconformists.
quotes.author: Ben Shahn

quotes.quote: For nonconformity the world will whip you with its displeasure.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Most people believe most of the things they believe only because they believe that most people believe them.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: We come from the mentality, that rarely sees the horror in symmetry or the beauty in non-conformity.
quotes.author: Shane Koyczan

quotes.quote: In this age, the mere example of nonconformity, the mere refusal to bend the knee to custom, is itself a service.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Rob Siltanen

quotes.quote: Nonconformity is the highest evolutionary attainment of social animals.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go, instead, where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: High-fiving people who share your beliefs is easy. What's hard is allowing others to have a different opinion without attempting to silence them.
quotes.author: Duane Alan Hahn

quotes.quote: If there is anything the nonconformist hates worse than a conformist, it's another nonconformist who doesn't conform to the prevailing standard of nonconformity.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Talking nonsense is man's only privilege that distinguishes him from all other organisms.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Nonsense is that which does not fit into the prearranged patterns which we have superimposed on reality. Nonsense is nonsense only when we have not yet found that point of view from which it makes sense.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: We were all delighted, we all realized we were leaving confusion and nonsense behind and performing our one and noble function of the time, move.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Skeptical scrutiny is the means, in both science and religion, by which deep thoughts can be winnowed from deep nonsense.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Be wise enough to walk away from the nonsense around you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One man's nonsense is another man's sense.
quotes.author: Peter Cameron

quotes.quote: Nonsense and beauty have close connections.
quotes.author: E M Forster

quotes.quote: Nonsense wakes up the brain cells. And it helps develop a sense of humor, which is awfully important in this day and age.
quotes.author: Seuss

quotes.quote: The tree of nonsense is watered with error, and from its branches swing the pumpkins of disaster.
quotes.author: Nick Harkaway

quotes.quote: By deafness one gains in one respect more than one loses; one misses more nonsense than sense.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: Perhaps there is more sense in our nonsense and more nonsense in our 'sense' than we would care to believe.
quotes.author: David Bohm

quotes.quote: Nonsense is so good only because common sense is so limited.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: A man speaking sense to himself is no madder than a man speaking nonsense not to himself.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Nonsense is an assertion of man's spiritual freedom in spite of all the oppressions of circumstance.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: A little nonsense now and then is relished by the wisest men.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: To appreciate nonsense requires a serious interest in life.
quotes.author: Gelett Burgess

quotes.quote: Nonsense remains nonsense, even when spoken by famous scientists.
quotes.author: John Lennox

quotes.quote: We never choose which words to use, for as long as they mean what they mean to mean, we don't care if they make sense or nonsense.
quotes.author: Norton Juster

quotes.quote: The evolution of sense is, in a sense, the evolution of nonsense.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: There is no nonsense so arrant that it cannot be made the creed of the vast majority by adequate governmental action.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: If you want sense, you'll have to make it yourself.
quotes.author: Norton Juster

quotes.quote: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and to have her nonsense respected.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Nonsense, seems to sum up everything.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There's plenty of sense in nonsense sometimes, if you wish to look for it.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: It is a nonsense, it is a waste of resources and it is a silly way for any person to make their point, political or otherwise.
quotes.author: Shane Connelly

quotes.quote: It's better to walk away than to tolerate nonsense.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nonsense is to sense, as shade to light; it heightens effect.
quotes.author: Arthur Frederick Saunders

quotes.quote: There is no nonsense so gross that society will not, at some time, make a doctrine of it and defend it with every weapon of communal stupidity.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: Though we speak nonsense, God will pick out the meaning of it.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Perfect nonsense goes on in the world. Sometimes there is no plausibility at all.
quotes.author: Nikolai Gogol

quotes.quote: My religion is based on truth and non-violence. Truth is my God. Non-violence is the means of realising Him.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is the answer for the questions of our time. Love will conquer evil every time.
quotes.author: James F. Twyman

quotes.quote: Nonviolence does not admit of running away from danger... . Between violence and cowardly flight I can only prefer violence to cowardice.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nonviolence becomes meaningless if violence is permitted for self-defence.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is one of those immutable principles that we cannot and must not deviate from.
quotes.author: John Lewis

quotes.quote: Non-violence is not a garment to be put on and off at will. Its seat is in the heart, and it must be an inseparable part of our being.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A nonviolent life is an act of self-examination and self-purification, whether by an individual, group or nation.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nonviolence against humans cannot take firm hold in society as long as brutality and violence are practiced toward other animals.
quotes.author: Robert Thurman

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is the virtue of the manly. The coward is innocent of it.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is absolute commitment to the way of love. Love is not emotional bash; it is not empty sentimentalism. It is the active outpouring of one's whole being into the being of another.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The ultimate way to solve human problems is with nonviolence.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is an unchangeable creed. It has to be pursued even in face of violence raging around you.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is a powerful and just weapon. which cuts without wounding and ennobles the man who wields it. It is a sword that heals.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The power of nonviolent resistance can only come from honest working of the constructive programme.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is an active force of the highest order. It is soul force or the power of the godhead within us.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The bravery of the nonviolent is vastly superior to that of the violent.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Non-violence leads to the highest ethics, which is the goal of all evolution. Until we stop harming all other living beings, we are still savages.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is not a cloistered virtue, confined only to the rishi and the cave-dweller.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: In nonviolence you must go full steam ahead, if you want the good to come speedily you must go about it with vigor.
quotes.author: Vinoba Bhave

quotes.quote: Non-violence can truly flourish when the world is free of poverty, hunger, discrimination, exclusion, intolerance and hatred - when women and men can realize their highest potential and live a secure and fulfilling life. Until then, each and every one of us would have to contribute - collectively and individually - to build peace through non-violence.
quotes.author: Anwarul Karim Chowdhury

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is the first article of my faith. It is also the last article of my creed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nonviolence in the sense of mere non-killing does not appear to me, therefore, to be of any improvement on the technique of violence.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is not just abstention from war, fighting, or animal flesh. It is abstention from negative thoughts and negative speech.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Altman

quotes.quote: A nonviolent action accompanied by nonviolence in thought and word should never produce enduring violent reaction upon the opponent.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nonviolence means avoiding not only external physical violence but also internal violence of spirit. You not only refuse to shoot a man, but you refuse to hate him.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is the answer to the crucial political moral questions of our time.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is not sterile passivity, but a powerful moral force which makes for social transformation.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Nonviolence is essentially based on recognizing the humanity in every one one of us.
quotes.author: Grace Lee Boggs

quotes.quote: I'm convinced nonviolence can be successful in working for positive change in our relations with other countries right now.
quotes.author: Dorothy Cotton

quotes.quote: Our home villages with the hills, mountains and forests, the lakes and ponds, rivers and streams, waterfall and fjords. The smell of new hay in summer, of birches in spring, of the sea, and the big forest, and even the biting winter cold. Everything . . . Norwegian songs and music and so much, much more. That’s our Fatherland and that’s what we have to struggle to get back.
quotes.author: Neal Bascomb

quotes.quote: The Norwegian is a sober person. His relationship to God is somewhat like his relationship to the King. He believes that God (and the King) is quite all right - on the condition that He behaves like a proper Norwegian and doesn't believe he is anything special.
quotes.author: Odd Børretzen

quotes.quote: The prison system in Norway is fairly civilized, by world standards, and so are the prisoners and the guards.
quotes.author: Varg Vikernes

quotes.quote: Norway has a great history of women's football, but it's harder now. We've stopped talking about development, and other countries have overtaken us.
quotes.author: Ada Hegerberg

quotes.quote: Norway, for some reason, I find Norway really fascinating, you really feel nature in that country.
quotes.author: Katie Melua

quotes.quote: Norway is a small country, about half the size of Sweden, but it has a very good film climate because they have municipal cinemas, so even in the smallest towns you have a cinema that shows art house films from all over the world.
quotes.author: Stellan Skarsgard

quotes.quote: When you work in Norway, you actually have to have a contract about lunches because Norwegians don't eat lunch normally, so they just throw out a loaf of bread and some coldcuts.
quotes.author: Stellan Skarsgard

quotes.quote: Norway or Switzerland are two marvelous countries, I very much admire, the most advanced countries in the world in fact with great qualities of life.
quotes.author: Jose Manuel Barroso

quotes.quote: In Norway, everyone knows everyone, and everyone is very supportive of each other. If there is anyone new, or a new song is coming out, everyone will probably know about it.
quotes.author: Astrid S

quotes.quote: Norway is high mountains and deep fjords. It is wide open spaces and rocky coastlines. It is islands and archipelagos. It is lush farmland and rolling moors. The sea laps Norway’s shores in the north, west and south. Norway is midnight sun and polar night. It is harsh winters and mild winters. It is hot summers and cold summers. Norway is a long and sparsely populated country. But above all, Norway is its people.
quotes.author: Harald V

quotes.quote: My greatest hope for Norway is that we will be able to take care of one another. That we will continue to build this country – on a foundation of trust, fellowship and generosity of spirit. That we will feel that we are – despite our differences – one people. That Norway is one.
quotes.author: Harald V

quotes.quote: Norway did not even have a revolution at the time the rest of Europe was busy figuring out human rights and stuff, because we were busy fighting over how to spell it.
quotes.author: Erik Naggum

quotes.quote: Norway, too, has noble wild prospects; and Lapland is remarkable for prodigious noble wild prospects.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Right now I would rank Norway as the largest country in the world, I have never seen anything like it.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Norway is pretty forward thinking in terms of gender equality, but we don't seem to practice it as well as we think. I'm constantly thinking: How much power have we really gained? We have to keep fighting to even keep what we've fought for already.
quotes.author: Jenny Hval

quotes.quote: The future of Norway isn't about competing on being the cheapest but the most innovative. We have an expensive welfare state and the only answer to continue that way is to become more competitive, especially on knowledge.
quotes.author: Erna Solberg

quotes.quote: This is the only country in the world, that worries about what it is. The rest of them know what they are. No one ever needs to go searching for the heart of Norway. Or looks for the soul of Mozambique. They know what they are.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: For many years, it seemed as if nothing changed in Norway. You could leave the country for three months, travel the world, through coups d'etat, assassinations, famines, massacres and tsunamis, and come home to find that the only new thing in the newspapers was the crossword puzzle.
quotes.author: Jo Nesbo

quotes.quote: Norway's a very gender-aware country, and we're very liberal. There are lots of women's voices being heard here compared to many other countries.
quotes.author: Jenny Hval

quotes.quote: Norway will be recognized as an open democracy with the rule of law, with the universal human rights, and with the broad international engagement on the international scene taking upon ourselves responsibilities, because we are a privileged country.
quotes.author: Jonas Gahr Store

quotes.quote: As foreign minister of Norway, I learnt how natural changes provoked by climate change are creating new sources of political instability.
quotes.author: Jonas Gahr Store

quotes.quote: I think integration in Norway is, by all standards, going relatively well. People are working, taking education, learning the language. But, yes, it is a challenge. And democracy and democratic debate has to be open to take that debate openly and not push questions aside.
quotes.author: Jonas Gahr Store

quotes.quote: The whole of northern Norway was covered with snow to depths which none of our soldiers had ever seen, felt, or imagined. There were neither snow-shoes nor skis - still less skiers.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Norway is the cradle of skiing. It's a good sport. For kids, it's a good way to stay out of trouble. It's also a lot of fun for adults.
quotes.author: Cecilie Klaumann

quotes.quote: We need to expand outside Norway given that the Norwegian continental shelf won't be able to deliver the growth we need.
quotes.author: Eivind Reiten

quotes.quote: There is a tendency to wait for Norway to arrive and pull a rabbit out of a hat. There should be no doubt that it is up to the two parties to resolve (their problems), with the help of Norway and the international community.
quotes.author: Erik Solheim

quotes.quote: It's a bad time to be going up to Norway. The main problem for us will be the cold weather and perhaps the pitch will be in a poor state.
quotes.author: Inaki Saez

quotes.quote: That Norway has fallen to 18th place is not good, but you are still among the 20 best nations. The study gives a clear message about how Norway must improve its efforts.
quotes.author: Marc Levy

quotes.quote: It's a good jump. We're still shy of Norway, but most nations are shy of Norway and find a way to get it done.
quotes.author: Luke Bodensteiner

quotes.quote: In the land of the skunk the man with half a nose is king!
quotes.author: Chris Farley

quotes.quote: He that has a great nose, thinks everybody is speaking of it.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The nose of a mob is its imagination. By this, at any time, it can be quietly led.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: It takes little talent to see what lies under one's nose, a good deal to know in what direction to point that organ.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: My nose was part of my heritage, and if I had talent to sing and to act, why wasn't that enough?
quotes.author: Barbra Streisand

quotes.quote: One has a nose. The nose scents and it chooses. An artist is simply a kind of pig snouting truffles.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: I never thrust my nose into other men's porridge. It is no bread and butter of mine. Every man for himself and God for us all.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: If your nose is up in the air, you cannot see where you are going.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Many a man's tongue broke his nose
quotes.author: Seumas Macmanus

quotes.quote: The nose is generally the organ in which stupidity is most readily displayed.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Whatever tears one may shed, in the end one always blows one's nose.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: I have a very sensitive nose. I identify with dogs. I understand the world through my nose.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Instinct is the nose of the mind.
quotes.author: Delphine de Girardin

quotes.quote: Staying in with you is better than sticking things up my nose
quotes.author: Lily Allen

quotes.quote: It's not how you pick your nose, it's where you put that booger that counts.
quotes.author: Tre Cool

quotes.quote: As soon as you sit down to write about something you are pressing your nose deeper into the sewer of facts.
quotes.author: Theo Van Gogh

quotes.quote: The only real security in a relationship lies neither in looking back in nostalgia, nor forward in dread or anticipation, but living in the present relationship and accepting it as it is now.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: True nostalgia is an ephemeral composition of disjointed memories.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Time was passing like a hand waving from a train I wanted to be on. I hope you never have to think about anything as much as I think about you.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is a process by which dreams become memories without ever coming true.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Nostalgia paints a smile on the stony face of the past.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is a necessary thing, I believe, and a way for all of us to find peace in that which we have accomplished, or even failed to accomplish. At the same time, if nostalgia precipitates actions to return to that fabled, rosy-painted time, particularly in one who believes his life to be a failure, then it is an empty thing, doomed to produce nothing but frustration and an even greater sense of failure.
quotes.author: R.A. Salvatore

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is something we think of as fuzzy. But it's pain. Pain concerning the past.
quotes.author: Peter Carey

quotes.quote: The nostalgia of a moment's love can be an illusionary precipice from which we fall from truth; in heartbreak, what we escape to in the past is what tortures us in the present.
quotes.author: Mike Norton

quotes.quote: It was nostalgic in that painful way nostalgia could be.
quotes.author: Kristen Ashley

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is a file that removes the rough edges from the good old days.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Every act of rebellion expresses a nostalgia for innocence and an appeal to the essence of being.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is one of the legitimate and certainly one of the most enduring of human emotions; but the politics of nostalgia is at best distracting, at worst pernicious.
quotes.author: Irving Kristol

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is a product of dissatisfaction and rage. ItÂ´s a settling of grievances between the present and the past.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: You can't have a better tomorrow if you are thinking about yesterday all the time.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: For me, nostalgia is an involuntary emotion. I think it's just a natural human response to loss.
quotes.author: Michael Chabon

quotes.quote: Nostalgia, more than anything, gives us the shudder of our own imperfection. This is why with Chopin we feel so little like gods.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is a way of remembering people and places and things, and wishing things hadn't changed. It has a sweetness to it. Sadness is just well being sad.
quotes.author: Linda Lael Miller

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is when you want things to stay the same. I know so many people staying in the same place.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: People look back on those days through a thick veil of nostalgia, but life was hard if you were anything other than a rich, powerful white male.
quotes.author: Jon Hamm

quotes.quote: It is strange how we hold on to the pieces of the past while we wait for our futures.
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is a dangerous emotion, both because it is powerless to act in the real world, and because it glides so easily into hatred and resentment against those who have taken our Eden from us.
quotes.author: Carolyn Heilbrun

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is a form of depression both for a society and an individual.
quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

quotes.quote: The whole nostalgia thing, and just sticking with what you always liked and what you know and not taking a chance on something or expanding. I think especially after a certain age.
quotes.author: Paul Weller

quotes.quote: Nostalgia is the aching realization that you can't go back again. The longing, no matter how intense, can never be met.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul, Jr

quotes.quote: Nostalgia keeps dissolving the ironic narratives in which I have contained my past.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: This was nostalgia in the literal Greek sense: the pain of not being able to return to one's home and family.
quotes.author: John Thorn

quotes.quote: Nostalgia for what we have lost is more bearable than nostalgia for what we have never had, for the first involves knowledge and pleasure, the second only ignorance and pain.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Nostalgia locates desire in the past where it suffers no active conflict and can be yearned toward pleasantly.
quotes.author: Robert Hass

quotes.quote: The past is a candle at great distance: too close to let you quit, too far to comfort you.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.quote: The funny thing is, I'm so used to not caring what anyone says, good or bad, that unfortunately even when people say good things... I wish it made me feel good, but it doesn't.
quotes.author: Rob Zombie

quotes.quote: By not caring too much about what people think, I'm able to think for myself and propagate ideas which are very often unpopular. And I succeed.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: Not caring more about what other people think than what you think. That's freedom.
quotes.author: Demi Moore

quotes.quote: Life ends when you stop dreaming. Love ends when you stop caring. Friendship ends when you stop sharing.
quotes.author: Tyson Gentry

quotes.quote: Sometimes the only choice left to do is to stop caring. Make a pace and move forward no matter how it hurts because there is no reason to stay anymore.
quotes.author: Nova Rosa

quotes.quote: Stop worrying about someone that isn't worried about you.
quotes.author: Mitchell Perry

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There's power in looking silly and not caring that you do.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Explain to me how you having a problem with me is my problem
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: Similarly, only people as misanthropic as myself can be counted on not to have to lie to others, since we have the unique luxury of not caring what sort of opinions others formulate about us.
quotes.author: Boyd Rice

quotes.quote: I believe that all wisdom consists in caring immensely for a few right things, and not caring a straw about the rest.
quotes.author: John Buchan

quotes.quote: Without a sense of caring, there can be no sense of community.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: I've reached the point where you can't disappoint me anymore because I just don't care enough to expect anything at all.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you quit fearing pain, when you learn to love the pain, you will lose all fear of everything.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The easiest way to not get hurt is to not care, but thats the hardest thing to do.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nowadays, I could not care less about making other people like me. I'm a good person, I don't need to do that anymore
quotes.author: Beverly Mitchell

quotes.quote: I just wanted to say, thanks for all the good times, thanks for harping on me. It was just to go and show them I don't care if they like me or not anymore.
quotes.author: Rick Clausen

quotes.quote: I care not what others think of what I do, but I care very much about what I think of what I do! That is character!
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It seems like you don't care about me anymore, you say you love me but with all of your words, you don't prove it!
quotes.author: Victoria Angulo

quotes.quote: Life is not lost by dying; life is lost minute by minute, day by dragging day, in all the thousand small uncaring ways.
quotes.author: Stephen Vincent Benet

quotes.quote: The worst sin towards our fellow creatures is not to hate them, but to be indifferent to them; that's the essence of inhumanity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The individual is capable of both great compassion and great indifference. He has it within his means to nourish the former and outgrow the latter.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Indifference is the strongest force in the universe. It makes everything it touches meaningless. Love and hate don't stand a chance against it.
quotes.author: Joan D. Vinge

quotes.quote: Nothing can contribute more to peace of soul than the lack of any opinion whatever.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Only one enemy is worse than despair: indifference. In every area of human creativity, indifference is the enemy; indifference of evil is worse than evil, because it is also sterile.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: It means nothing to me. I have no opinion about it, and I don't care.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Love me or hate me, but spare me your indifference.
quotes.author: Libbie Fudim

quotes.quote: The most distressing aspect of the world into which you are going is its indifference to the basic issues, which now, as always, are moral issues
quotes.author: Robert Maynard Hutchins

quotes.quote: Desire is half of life; indifference is half of death.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Affection can withstand very severe storms of vigor, but not a long polar frost of indifference.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Parting is all we know of heaven, and all we need of hell.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Stop worrying about someone that isn't worried about you.
quotes.author: Mitchell Perry

quotes.quote: It means nothing to me. I have no opinion about it, and I don't care
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Life is not lost by dying; life is lost minute by minute, day by dragging day, in all the thousand small uncaring ways.
quotes.author: Stephen Vincent Benet

quotes.quote: It is the time you have wasted for your rose that makes your rose so important.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Don't sacrifice yourself too much, because if you sacrifice too much there's nothing else you can give and nobody will care for you.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Not caring more about what other people think than what you think. That's freedom.
quotes.author: Demi Moore

quotes.quote: The funny thing is, I'm so used to not caring what anyone says, good or bad, that unfortunately even when people say good things... I wish it made me feel good, but it doesn't.R
quotes.author: Rob Zombie

quotes.quote: How many cares one loses when one decides not to be something but to be someone.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: That was how dishonesty and betrayal started, not in big lies but in small secrets.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: I also think stress is related to control. When you're in charge of your life, you tend to not care about losing control of things that don't really matter like traffic jams.
quotes.author: Marilu Henner

quotes.quote: It's better sometimes to not care than to be too good, people will always take what they never stress to get for granted, easy come, easy go.
quotes.author: Blaze Olamiday

quotes.quote: Nowadays, I could not care less about making other people like me. I'm a good person, I don't need to do that anymore.
quotes.author: Beverley Mitchell

quotes.quote: I gave you my whole heart. You gave it back in pieces.
quotes.author: Shane Pendley

quotes.quote: Turning a breakup into a break-over ... We want women to know that as bad as it can be, it can also be an opportunity to reinvent yourself.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: A weed is but an unloved flower.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: It is not the most lovable individuals who stand more in need of love, but the most unlovable
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: break up in its final moments.
quotes.author: George Black

quotes.quote: To be with a man who hasn't tried every line, who hasn't broken up with a woman every which way you can break up with them, is kind of nice.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.quote: It's afterwards you realize that the feeling of happiness you had with a man didn't necessarily prove that you loved him
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: I just wanted to say, 'Thanks for all the good times, thanks for harping on me,' ... It was just to go and show them I don't care if they like me or not anymore.
quotes.author: Rick Clausen

quotes.quote: By not caring too much about what people think, I'm able to think for myself and propagate ideas which are very often unpopular. And I succeed.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: Life ends when you stop dreaming. Love ends when you stop caring. Friendship ends when you stop sharing.
quotes.author: Tyson Gentry

quotes.quote: Sometimes the only choice left to do is to stop caring. Make a pace and move forward no matter how it hurts because there is no reason to stay anymore.
quotes.author: Nova Rosa

quotes.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Explain to me how you having a problem with me is my problem
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: Without a sense of caring, there can be no sense of community
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: It means nothing to me. I have no opinion about it, and I don't care.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: I believe that all wisdom consists in caring immensely for a few right things, and not caring a straw about the rest.
quotes.author: John Buchan

quotes.quote: Your victory is right around the corner. Never give up.
quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

quotes.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than the one with all the facts.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Never give up on something you believe in.
quotes.author: Steve Scalise

quotes.quote: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: Never give up on something that you can't go a day without thinking about.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Rise and rise again until lambs become lions.
quotes.author: Robin Hood

quotes.quote: Don't let mental blocks control you. Set yourself free. Confront your fear and turn the mental blocks into building blocks.
quotes.author: Roopleen

quotes.quote: No matter how difficult life gets, the important thing is to live it with hope.
quotes.author: Topanga Boy Meets World

quotes.quote: Keep trying and never give up. The dream may seem difficult to reach at some point but never let go of your dream. You will be amazed by what you can accomplish when you stay determined.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying 'I will try again tomorrow.'
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way. And don't pray when it rains if you don't pray when the sun shines.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Never give up. And most importantly, be true to yourself. Write from your heart, in your own voice, and about what you believe in.
quotes.author: Louise Brown

quotes.quote: If you fall behind, run faster. Never give up, never surrender, and rise up against the odds.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: When you feel like giving up, remember why you held on for so long in the first place.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Accept what is, let go of what was, and have faith in what will be.
quotes.author: Sonia Ricotti

quotes.quote: If you believe it will work out, you'll see opportunities. If you believe it won't, you will see obstacles.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Never give up on something you really want. It's difficult to wait, but more difficult to regret.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as failure. There are only results.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: If you want to increase your success rate, double your failure rate.
quotes.author: Thomas Watson

quotes.quote: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: I am not discouraged because every wrong attempt discarded is a step forward.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Better than nothing is not good enough for you!
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: There comes a point when you have to realize that you'll never be good enough for some people. The question is, is that your problem or theirs?
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You may never be good enough for some people, but you will always be the best for those who deserve you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Good is not good enough when better is expected.
quotes.author: Lou Lamoriello

quotes.quote: Better is not good enough; the best is yet to come!
quotes.author: T. B. Joshua

quotes.quote: You are not your mistakes: they are what you did, not who you are.
quotes.author: Lisa Lieberman-Wang

quotes.quote: The moment someone tells you or makes you feel like you're not good enough is the moment you know you're better than them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When people tell you're not good enough, don't mind them.
quotes.author: Toni Gonzaga

quotes.quote: Never think that you are not good enough for anyone, always ask yourself if they are good enough for you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There's not one human being on the planet earth who has never felt, at some point, unaccepted. At some point in our lives, we feel like we're not good enough, but we have to step back and realize that we are.
quotes.author: Jussie Smollett

quotes.quote: The worst feeling in the world is knowing you did the best you could and it still wasn't good enough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Never let someone tell you that you or your dreams are impossible, improbable, or not ‘good enough’ for their liking, especially when they have no experience or knowledge of your true heart and powers.
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.quote: Shame is the most powerful, master emotion. It's the fear that we're not good enough.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: And it is easy to believe you are not good enough if you listen to everybody else.
quotes.author: Mackenzie Astin

quotes.quote: You are good. But it is not enough just to be good. You must be good for something. You must contribute good to the world. The world must be a better place for your presence. And the good that is in you must be spread to others.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Just doing as well as you did last time is not good enough.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: And above all things, never think that you're not good enough yourself. A man should never think that.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: It's a lie to think you're not good enough. It's a lie to think you're not worth anything.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: Never do they hurt your feelings or make you feel like you are not good enough, but rather they build you up and show you the things about yourself that make you special and even beautiful.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Do not let anyone tell you what you can be. Do not let anyone tell you that you are not good enough or smart enough. Remember that nobody is better than you. Everybody puts on their pants one leg at a time.
quotes.author: Farrah Gray

quotes.quote: Don't let anyone tell you you're not good enough. You're good enough, you are too good. Love your family with all your heart and listen to it.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: We start to feel not good enough and we withdraw our hearts energy and sensor our authentic expression, and that hurts!
quotes.author: Agapi Stassinopoulos

quotes.quote: All you can do is all you can do... If all you can do, is still not good enough, then go do something else.
quotes.author: Bradford Winters

quotes.quote: Don't let anyone make you feel like you're not good enough, smart enough or cool enough. Do your own thing.
quotes.author: Benji Madden

quotes.quote: If something is not good enough, stop doing it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

quotes.quote: Don't ever say you're not good enough. If that person can't see how amazing you are then they are the one who's not good enough.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Above all else, never think you're not good enough.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: We are afraid of failure, of ridicule, of being rejected. We are afraid we're not good enough.
quotes.author: Rhonda Britten

quotes.quote: You have to realize that, if you don't get signed right away, it's not because you're not talented. It's not because you're not good enough. The stars have to align perfectly in order to get signed. And sometimes it works out, and sometimes it doesn't.
quotes.author: Carmen Rasmusen

quotes.quote: Perfection is shallow, unreal, and fatally uninteresting.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: The vast majority of human beings are not interested in reason or satisfied with what it teaches.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: People are not interested in you. They are not interested in me. They are interested in themselves - morning, noon and after dinner.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: You have to be interested. If you're not interested, you can't be interesting.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.quote: Parents are not interested in justice, they're interested in peace and quiet.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: The world is not interested in what we do for a living. What they are interested in is what we have to offer freely - hope, strength, love and the power to make a difference!
quotes.author: Sasha Azevedo

quotes.quote: Nothing is interesting if you are not interested.
quotes.author: Lionel Shriver

quotes.quote: Only a good-for-nothing is not interested in his past.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Bitter people are not interested in what you say, but what you hide.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: We are not interested in the possibilities of defeat. They do not exist.
quotes.author: Queen Victoria

quotes.quote: If you're not interested in getting better, it's time for you to stop leading.
quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.quote: A writer is not interested in explaining reality, he’s only interested in capturing it.
quotes.author: Brendan Kennelly

quotes.quote: Just because you do not take an interest in politics doesn't mean politics won't take an interest in you.
quotes.author: Pericles

quotes.quote: People who are not interested in food always seem rather dry and unloving and don't have a real gusto for life.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: The body is not interested in anything you are interested in. And that is the battle that is going on all the time.
quotes.author: U.G. Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: You cannot talk to people successfully if they think you are not interested in what they have to say or you have no respect for them.
quotes.author: Larry King

quotes.quote: You cannot will yourself to be interested in something you're not interested in. But you can actively discover and deepen your interest.
quotes.author: Angela Duckworth

quotes.quote: If youre not interested in life, then photography has no meaning.
quotes.author: Ruth Bernhard

quotes.quote: We are not interested in the unusual, but in the usual seen unusually.
quotes.author: Beaumont Newhall

quotes.quote: God is not interested in our spiritual life. He's interested in our life.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: Anyone who's not interested in model airplanes must have a screw loose somewhere.
quotes.author: Paul MacCready

quotes.quote: You are responsible for every part of your image, even the parts you're not interested in.
quotes.author: Jay Maisel

quotes.quote: God is not interested in you doing this for Him, He is interested in doing things through you.
quotes.author: Eric Ludy

quotes.quote: The men who are not interested in philosophy need it most urgently; they are most helplessly in its power.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: God is not interested in the seeds he put in you; He is interested in the fruits that must come out of you!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The Bible is not interested in precisionism unless the context indicates that precision is particularly important.
quotes.author: D. A. Carson

quotes.quote: A lighthouse is not interested in who gets its light! It just gives it without thinking! Giving light is its nature!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Only men who are not interested in women are interested in women's clothes. Men who like women never notice what they wear.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Anyone who wants to sell you overnight success or wealth is not interested in your success; they are interested in your money.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: People in general are not interested in paying extra for increased safety. At the beginning seat belts cost $200 and nobody bought them.
quotes.author: Gene Spafford

quotes.quote: God is not interested in our public displays of piety. He's not interested in religion in terms of the outward show. He's interested in godliness.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: Waiting is painful. Forgetting is painful. But not knowing which to do is the worse kind of suffering.
quotes.author: Paul Coelho

quotes.quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: Honesty allows us to live with not knowing. We do not know the full story; we do not know where we are in the story. We do not know who, ultimately, is at fault or who will carry the blame in the end.
quotes.author: David Whyte

quotes.quote: Not knowing anything is the sweetest life.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Being at ease with not knowing is crucial for answers to come to you.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The only thing that makes life possible is permanent, intolerable uncertainty; not knowing what comes next.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Sometimes, not knowing what you're doing allows you to do things you never knew you could do.
quotes.author: Nell Scovell

quotes.quote: Our greatest motivation in life comes from not knowing the future.
quotes.author: Thomas Frey

quotes.quote: Although men are accused of not knowing their own weakness, yet perhaps few know their own strength. It is in men as in soils, where sometimes there is a vein of gold which the owner knows not of.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: To choose love and jump in not knowing, with a lot of unknowns, is a brave act.
quotes.author: Mara Brock Akil

quotes.quote: There's nothing better than not knowing what's going to happen until you put the pieces together.
quotes.author: Feist

quotes.quote: Strange is our situation here on earth. Each of us comes for a short visit, not knowing why, yet sometimes seeming to divine a purpose.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Creativity is the joy of not knowing it all.
quotes.author: Ernie J Zelinski

quotes.quote: A dream is a creation of the intelligence, the creator being present but not knowing how it will end.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Sometimes surrender means giving up trying to understand and becoming comfortable with not knowing.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Sometimes it feels as though happiness is just a word people say to hide the despair of not knowing anything.
quotes.author: Michael Gilbert

quotes.quote: If you don't know where you make your mistakes, that's your worst mistake: not knowing where your mistakes are at.
quotes.author: Meek Mill

quotes.quote: Police officers put the badge on every morning, not knowing for sure if they'll come home at night to take it off.
quotes.author: Tom Cotton

quotes.quote: The challenge that so many people have is not knowing how to take that first step of reaching out to another person for help.
quotes.author: Kate Middleton

quotes.quote: Omnipotence is not knowing how everything is done; it's just doing it.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: It's exciting not knowing what tomorrow, or the next month, or the next year holds.
quotes.author: Lucy Boynton

quotes.quote: It's not knowing what to do, it's doing what you know.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The difficulties of not knowing are always much greater than the effort of learning.
quotes.author: Andrew Loomis

quotes.quote: Things are always changing. Part of being successful here is being comfortable with not knowing what's going to happen.
quotes.author: Susan Wojcicki

quotes.quote: The real trouble comes from not knowing what we really want in the first place.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: You don't love me now / You just hurt me now / It's over, it's over / I'm not looking back / I'm not going back / It's over, it's over.
quotes.author: Radu Bolfea

quotes.quote: I'm not thinking of you, / I'm not broken in two, / I'm not looking back, / My love's wasted on you.
quotes.author: Tim Mcewan

quotes.quote: No turning back / I'm moving on / Not looking back / I'm giving him / All that I have / No turning back.
quotes.author: Leslie Jordan

quotes.quote: I start to run, I'm still young / Not looking back from where I come / You get this life, just one time / You do yours and I'll do mine / So I run.
quotes.author: Steve Tibbetts

quotes.quote: I'm not looking back / I'm done with that / Wanna give You all I have.
quotes.author: Jon White

quotes.quote: I don't regret / Not looking back / What better way to cut the crap.
quotes.author: The Greenkeeper

quotes.quote: Oh no, I'm not looking back / To rewrite our story's past / I gave up years ago / And as guarded as I am / I've got things I've left unsaid / I'm not a kid.
quotes.author: Willy Beaman

quotes.quote: Slow but sure, I'm commin' around. / No I'm not looking back I'm moving on now / But I, won't go so far as to say that I'm fine. / Too much of what I've felt for you remains. / I'd like to believe in the healing hands of time.
quotes.author: Mark Nesler

quotes.quote: I'm finally up to speed / I'm in over my head / And I'm not looking back.
quotes.author: Matthew Sweet

quotes.quote: I know I'm stronger now / Who's looking south / Not me I'm not looking back / I'm done denying the truth to anyone / Cause I'm alive.
quotes.author: Robert McCracken

quotes.quote: I'm not looking back, I'm so done with that / All the sorrow and regret / And I remember almost everything / Watch me walk as I forget.
quotes.author: Robert Arthur Mould

quotes.quote: No I'm not looking back no more / The past is close behind.
quotes.author: Nathan Willett

quotes.quote: Now that is over and I've seen right through / Not looking back again I'll start anew / Was making love to you such a wasted time / Maybe I love you, still, I'll get you off my mind.
quotes.author: Mick Brown

quotes.quote: You're fascinated with the old me / And I bet you hate it when we don't scream / You're stuck in the past / And I'm not looking back.
quotes.author: Tommy Cooperman

quotes.quote: Oh what a freedom like a sail in the wind, / Not looking back, not forgetting where I've been / Smiling as I watch the years roll by, / I'm moving on from my mistakes, / And I'm learning how to take it day by day, / On my highway.
quotes.author: Brett James

quotes.quote: Go, see how far I can reach / I'm not looking back / Until I get exactly what I need / Cause there is no shine of your possibilities.
quotes.author: Tommy Lee

quotes.quote: I can hear my mama crying as I cross that county line / Cause she knows I'm not looking back I'm leaving all this shit behind / I told her I'm a soldier I'm wiser, and I'm older / I got my education now I'm out of here it's over.
quotes.author: Smith

quotes.quote: It's not up to you to save me / And there's no turning back, this is it. / I'm on a one-way track / Not looking back.
quotes.author: Janove Ottesen

quotes.quote: Bottle it up and learn to live again / You're not taking it slow or just fast enough / Not looking back when there's a reason to move on / Some things you can't erase / We all need space.
quotes.author: William Yip

quotes.quote: No looking back / Just focus on what's coming.
quotes.author: William Chevalier

quotes.quote: Don't look back, keep movin' ahead / You're guaranteed to win.
quotes.author: Joseph Johnson

quotes.quote: No more looking back, / No more living in the past, / Yesterday's gone and that's a fact, / Now there's no more looking back.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: Moving on away from you / I guess it's time, time to break free / I don't look back / No looking back.
quotes.author: Anders Pettersson

quotes.quote: I've never particularly liked the idea of looking back; I'd rather look forward.
quotes.author: Jane Asher

quotes.quote: If you're always looking back at what you've lost, you'll never discover the treasure that lies just up ahead.
quotes.author: J.E.B. Spredemann

quotes.quote: Look up, always. Look back, never.
quotes.author: Karen Quan

quotes.quote: Don't look back. Something might be gaining on you.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: Never look back unless you are planning to go that way.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Never look backwards or you'll fall down the stairs.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Always look at what you have left. Never look at what you have lost.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: I'd rather live my life knowing that I'm not perfect than spend my whole life pretending to be.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: Look, we are human, we make mistakes. I will gladly shout from the rooftops that I am not perfect. Nor will I ever be.
quotes.author: Dianna Agron

quotes.quote: Life's not perfect. Some loose ends may never get trimmed up and tidied.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: I know I'm not perfect & will never become. Yet, I'm proud of being Me, with all humility & imperfections. Cause this is the only life I have.
quotes.author: Abu Sufyan ibn Harb

quotes.quote: No one is perfect in this world. Forgive people for not knowing better and learn to move on.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: I'm not perfect, but if there are any points given for caring about people with every fiber of your being and giving life all you've got every day, then I suppose I have a shot.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: People are not perfect... very often the relationships that are strongest are those where people have worked through big crises, but they've had to work through them. So the challenge to us is to work through that.
quotes.author: Patricia Hewitt

quotes.quote: I'm not perfect, but those flaws make an interesting person.
quotes.author: Mary Frann

quotes.quote: Maybe you're not perfect, but you're willing to actually look at yourself and take some kind of accountability. That's a change. It might not mean that you can turn everything around, but I think there's something incredibly hopeful about that.
quotes.author: Brie Larson

quotes.quote: Warriors of light are not perfect.Their beauty lies in accepting this fact and still desiring to grow and to learn.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: But I am not perfect in my way of putting things Because I lack the divine simplicity Of being only what I appear to be.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: I'm not perfect, but I'd like to be perfect. I'm working on it.
quotes.author: Shelley Long

quotes.quote: I understand that I'm not perfect. I made mistakes and I had a hand in everything that's happened to me, good and bad.
quotes.author: Dwyane Wade

quotes.quote: I'm not perfect. But I am trying every day to concentrate on being better.
quotes.author: Allen Iverson

quotes.quote: I make mistakes every day. I'm not perfect in my behavior, but I want to be and that's what God is after, a heart that wants to be.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: All that is not perfect down to the smallest detail is doomed to perish.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: The living is not perfect because it is liable to change; the dead is not perfect because it does not live.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: I know who I am. I am not perfect. I'm not the most beautiful woman in the world. But I'm one of them.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: I'm not perfect. And who knows how many times I've fallen short. We all fall short. That's the amazing thing about the grace of God.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.quote: I will make mistakes, after all I am not perfect, but I will do my best to make them up to you. I would never hurt you intentionally. I would not give up on you, so I hope you don't give up on me. Sincerely, The Person that Loves You.
quotes.author: Carlos Salinas

quotes.quote: The most beautiful things are not perfect, they are special.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: I may not be perfect but I am perfect enough to be a very good rendition of me.
quotes.author: Jan Hellriegel

quotes.quote: I'm not perfect; no one is perfect. Everyone makes mistakes. I think you try to learn from those mistakes.
quotes.author: Derek Jeter

quotes.quote: People are good or half good or a quarter good, and it changes all the time- but even on the best day nobody's perfect.
quotes.author: Colum Mccann

quotes.quote: Nobody's perfect. We're all just one step up from the beasts and one step down from the angels.
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: I love what I do, and I always make sure to tell my fans I'm not perfect, so don't think I am. I make mistakes. I'm human, and we all are. But I try to be the best I can be, and that's all I really can do.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: Every day is not perfect. You have your bad days and good days just like anyone else. You do not want to talk to people sometimes. It is normal.
quotes.author: Brett Favre

quotes.quote: We're not perfect; we all have things that people might not like to see, and I like to show my faults.
quotes.author: Grace Jones

quotes.quote: Everybody's got regrets. Everybody's made mistakes. Nobody's perfect.
quotes.author: Josh Duhamel

quotes.quote: I am not a perfect friend, and it is impossible not to rebuff or be rebuffed if you move about the world.
quotes.author: Anne Roiphe

quotes.quote: There are no wrong notes; some are just more right than others.
quotes.author: Thelonious Monk

quotes.quote: There are no wrong notes.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: Don't play the notes. Play the meaning of the notes.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: If you stopped playing notes, Music would still exist.
quotes.author: Victor Wooten

quotes.quote: There are no wrong notes in jazz: only notes in the wrong places.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: Notes fly so much farther than words. There is no other way to reach the infinite.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: You can't speak Music with notes alone, but you can speak Music without notes at all!
quotes.author: Victor L. Wooten

quotes.quote: The silence between two notes is as beautiful and meaningful as the notes themselves.
quotes.author: Joseph Curiale

quotes.quote: Great music as much about the space in between the notes as it is about the notes themselves.
quotes.author: Sting

quotes.quote: Silence is very important. The silence between the notes are as important as the notes themselves.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.quote: The easiest way to avoid wrong notes is to never open your mouth and sing. What a mistake that would be.
quotes.author: Pete Seeger

quotes.quote: The notes sound like they're coming from inside your mind... It was the closest thing to a psychedelic experience I've ever had.
quotes.author: Robin Pecknold

quotes.quote: It’s not the note you play that’s the wrong note – it’s the note you play afterwards that makes it right or wrong.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: The best way to waste your life, is by taking notes. The easiest way to avoid living is to just watch. Look for the details. Report. Don't participate.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: In jazz improv, there is no such thing as wrong notes, only notes that are better chosen and it's not about the note you play, it's about the note you play next.
quotes.author: Larry Carlton

quotes.quote: Look at the piano. You'll notice that there are white notes and black notes. Figure out the difference between them and you'll be able to make whatever kind of music you want.
quotes.author: George Gershwin

quotes.quote: We all do 'do, re, mi,' but you have got to find the other notes yourself.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: The Internet is just a world passing around notes in a classroom.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: The only notes that matter come in a wad.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: There are only so many notes so there must be only so many melodies.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: To me, the biggest notes and the longest notes are the easiest notes.
quotes.author: Jennifer Hudson

quotes.quote: Notes don't make music until you learn to insert silence between them.
quotes.author: Ben Folds

quotes.quote: In the liner notes, music is fine by itself. It doesn't need any explanation.
quotes.author: Terry Bozzio

quotes.quote: Notes, usually to be musical, have to move in or out. They don't sound like clarinets!
quotes.author: Ray Still

quotes.quote: If you want to make beautiful music, you must play the black and the white notes together.
quotes.author: Richard Nixon

quotes.quote: We are musical notes emanating from the quantum string section of a grand symphonic orchestra.
quotes.author: Kane Freeman

quotes.quote: Lots of times it really doesn't matter what notes you play, but what notes come before and after a run.
quotes.author: Tommy Bolin

quotes.quote: Music is the space between the notes as much as the notes themselves; it's defined as much by silence as by sound.
quotes.author: James McKean

quotes.quote: The ballet embodies the notes of music. And sometimes you almost feel like you can see the notes dance up there on the stage.
quotes.author: Robert Caro

quotes.quote: Be aware of the high notes, of the blissful faces and their soft messages, and listen for the silent message of a highly decorated gift.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Nothing in all the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: With integrity, you have nothing to fear, since you have nothing to hide. With integrity, you will do the right thing, so you will have no guilt.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
