quotes.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream.
quotes.author: Debby Boone

quotes.quote: Blessed are they who see beautiful things in humble places where other people see nothing.
quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.quote: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Saying nothing... sometimes says the most.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Nothing is more terrible than to see ignorance in action.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Against the assault of laughter, nothing can stand.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: To do nothing evil is good; to wish nothing evil is better.
quotes.author: Claudius

quotes.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: To live a pure unselfish life, one must count nothing as one's own in the midst of abundance.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Whoever blushes is already guilty; true innocence is ashamed of nothing.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: When you're just like everybody else, you've nothing to offer other than your conformity.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: There is nothing new except what has been forgotten.
quotes.author: Marie Antoinette

quotes.quote: There is nothing more uncommon than common sense.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Not everything that is faced can be changed. But nothing can be changed until it is faced.
quotes.author: James Arthur Baldwin

quotes.quote: Nothing happens unless something moves.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Ability is nothing without opportunity.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The facts: nothing matters but the facts: worship of the facts leads to everything, to happiness first of all and then to wealth.
quotes.author: Edmond de Goncourt

quotes.quote: Nothing matters so much that we should throw ourselves into a state of panic about it. No happening is so important that we should let ourselves be exiled from from inner peace and mental calm for its sake.
quotes.author: Paul Brunton

quotes.quote: For this moment, nothing matters. Look up into the stars and you're gone.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Nothing matters at all. Survival is the coin of the realm. Time is a river with banks.
quotes.author: Barry N. Malzberg

quotes.quote: To hell with tomorrow. To hell with all problems and barriers. Nothing matters but the spectacular now.
quotes.author: Tim Tharp

quotes.quote: Everything matters, but nothing matters very much.
quotes.author: Kathleen Winsor

quotes.quote: Nothing matters except life and the love you make.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.quote: Nothing matters very much, and few things matter at all.
quotes.author: Arthur Balfour

quotes.quote: Every reiteration of the idea that nothing matters debases the human spirit
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: You must not make the mistake of thinking that because nothing lasts, nothing matters.
quotes.author: Robert Charles Wilson

quotes.quote: There is no object to life. To nature nothing matters but the continuation of the species.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Nothing matters as long as you are kind and authentic. If you are, then you did your best, and that is all you can do.
quotes.author: China Forbes

quotes.quote: Nothing matters more than your health. Healthy living is priceless. What millionaire wouldn't pay dearly for an extra 10 or 20 years of healthy aging?
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: People need each other to help each other up. But we can't stand near each other because we fear each other. When you get over fear, nothing matters anymore but love.
quotes.author: Tech N9ne

quotes.quote: If there is no God, nothing matters. If there is a God, nothing else matters.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: Everything is honoured, but nothing matters.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: If nothing we do matters, then all that matters is what we do.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: The main thing to remember is everything is about the experience, nothing else really matters one way or the other.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: When nothing matters to you and nothingness matters to you a lot. You search for something to live for.
quotes.author: Kunal Ahuja

quotes.quote: Anything goes and nothing matters.
quotes.author: James Howard Kunstler

quotes.quote: Nothing matters to a man who says nothing matters.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Nothing matters, but it's perhaps more comfortable to keep calm and not interfere with other people.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: If nothing matters, there's nothing to save.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: If you have integrity, nothing else matters. If you don't have integrity, nothing else matters.
quotes.author: Alan K. Simpson

quotes.quote: For progress, we have eaten our souls up, and nothing matters anymore.
quotes.author: Claire North

quotes.quote: In th end, we all die, and nothing really matters.
quotes.author: Richard Ramirez

quotes.quote: NothingnessÂ is the basis of everything.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: Let us take our bloated nothingness out of the path of the divine circuits.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In nothingness, there is everything, energy. The ending is a beginning.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Not evenÂ nothingnessÂ preceded life.Â NothingnessÂ owes its very idea to existence.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Once you start describingÂ nothingness, you end up with somethingness.
quotes.author: Mark Strand

quotes.quote: EternalÂ nothingnessÂ is fine if you happen to be dressed for it.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: If you give people nothingness, they can ponder what can be achieved from that nothingness.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.quote: Nothingness is not nothing at all, so it is physical, but not in the sense of constant presence. Nothingness is disturbing. It is there in a mind-independent sense; it is part of what is given.
quotes.author: Timothy Morton

quotes.quote: We come from an inconceivableÂ nothingness. We stay a while in something which seems equally inconceivable, only to vanish again into the inconceivableÂ nothingness.
quotes.author: Peter Wessel Zapffe

quotes.quote: CanÂ nothingnessÂ be so prodigal?
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: The feelings of my smallness and my nothingness always kept me good company.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: More often than not,Â nothingnessÂ is reluctantly and despairingly taken to be the only hypothesis possible when all the others have failed, since by definition it cannot be disproven and is beyond the scope of reason.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: NothingnessÂ lies coiled in the heart of being like a worm.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: If it is nothingness that awaits us, let us make an injustice of it; let us fight against destiny, even though without hope of victory.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: NothingnessÂ cannot be defined; the softest thing cannot be snapped.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: What is calledÂ nothingnessÂ is to be found only in time and in speech. In time it stands between the past and future and has no existence in the present; and thus in speech it is one of the things of which we say: They are not, or they are impossible.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: You are fighting againstÂ nothingnessÂ all the time by creating a series of shields that you call personality, life history, feelings, ideas, and ways of seeing.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: To love ourÂ nothingnessÂ we must love everything in us that the proud man loves when he loves himself. But we must love it all for exactly the opposite reason.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: NothingnessÂ is an absolute infinite potential, not an empty box.
quotes.author: Adyashanti

quotes.quote: Nothingness not being nothing, nothingness being emptiness.
quotes.author: Isabelle Adjani

quotes.quote: When you go into the space ofÂ nothingness, everything becomes known.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: NothingnessÂ haunts Being.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: A novel is a machine for generating interpretations.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Entering a novel is like going on a climb in the mountains: You have to learn the rhythms of respiration - acquire the pace. Otherwise you stop right away.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: In aÂ novelÂ you have to resist the urge to tell everything.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: AÂ novelÂ is often a longer process in handling self-doubt.
quotes.author: Robert Sheckley

quotes.quote: An oldÂ novelÂ has a history of its own.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: GreatÂ novels are always a little more intelligent than their authors.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: There are three rules for writing a novel. Unfortunately, no one knows what they are.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The novel is the highest form of human expression so far attained. Why? Because it is so incapable of the absolute.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: AÂ novelÂ is a mirror carried along a main road.
quotes.author: Henri B. Stendhal

quotes.quote: Novels teach the youthful mind to sigh after happiness that never existed.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: It seems to me that goodÂ novelsÂ celebrate the mystery in ordinary life, and summing it all up in psychological terms strips the mystery away.
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.quote: A goodÂ novelÂ begins with a small question and ends with a bigger one.
quotes.author: Paula Fox

quotes.quote: AÂ novelÂ must be a rich forest known at the start only by instinct.
quotes.author: Dawn Powell

quotes.quote: A novel is a work of poetry. In order to write it, one must have tranquility of spirit and of impression.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: When novels deal in abstractions, they generally go off the rails.
quotes.author: Philipp Meyer

quotes.quote: Novels are make-believe and play for adults.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.quote: Novel writing is the slowest art form in the world. It is not a sprint. It is not even a marathon. It is a series of marathons that stretch over and over across a continent.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.quote: AÂ novelÂ must give a sense of permanence as well as a sense of life.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: Writing aÂ novelÂ is agony.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: GoodÂ novelÂ are written by people who are not frightened.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Not everyÂ novelÂ that wants to be a tragedy gets to be one.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: To read a novel is a difficult and complex art. You must be capable not only of great fineness of perception, but of great boldness of imagination.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: NovelÂ writing is solitary work.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.quote: AÂ novelÂ is an impression, not an argument; and there the matter must rest.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: If you're writing a novel, you're in a room for three or four years. There's not much coming in from the outside.
quotes.author: Mordecai Richler

quotes.quote: When you read a novel, your own imagery is the most important. It's what makes reading such a wonderful thing.
quotes.author: Daniel Craig

quotes.quote: EveryÂ novelÂ generates its own climate, when you get going.
quotes.author: Penelope Lively

quotes.quote: In aÂ novel, the only budgetary limitations are that of your imagination.
quotes.author: Howard Gordon

quotes.quote: EveryÂ novelÂ is an ideal plane inserted into the realm of reality.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: AÂ novelÂ is a tricky thing to map.
quotes.author: Reif Larsen

quotes.quote: November is usually such a disagreeable month as if the year had suddenly found out she was growing old and could do nothing but weep and fret over it.
quotes.author: Anne Shirley

quotes.quote: November is auspicious in so many parts of the country: the rice harvest is already in, the weather starts to cool, and the festive glow which precedes Christmas has began to brighten the landscape.
quotes.author: F. Sionil Jose

quotes.quote: In November, the smell of food is different. It is an orange smell. A squash and pumpkin smell. It tastes like cinnamon and can fill up a house in the morning, can pull everyone from bed in a fog. Food is better in November than any other time of the year.
quotes.author: Cynthia Rylant

quotes.quote: Some of the days in November carry the whole memory of summer as a fire opal carries the color of moonrise.
quotes.author: Gladys Taber

quotes.quote: In November, the earth is growing quiet. It is making its bed, a winter bed for flowers and small creatures. The bed is white and silent, and much life can hide beneath its blankets.
quotes.author: Cynthia Rylant

quotes.quote: So dull and dark are the November days. The lazy mist high up the evening curled, And now the morn quite hides in smoke and haze; The place we occupy seems all the world.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: In November, the trees are standing all sticks and bones. Without their leaves, how lovely they are, spreading their arms like dancers. They know it is time to be still.
quotes.author: Cynthia Rylant

quotes.quote: Every year, in November, at the season that follows the hour of the dead, the crowning and majestic hours of autumn, I go to visit the chrysanthemums ... They are indeed, the most universal, the most diverse of flowers.
quotes.author: Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: The month of November makes me feel that life is passing more quickly. In an effort to slow it down, I try to fill the hours more meaningfully.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: November is chill, frosted mornings with a silver sun rising behind the trees, red cardinals at the feeders, and squirrels running scallops along the tops of the gray stone walls.
quotes.author: Jean Hersey

quotes.quote: And November sad, – a psalm Tender, trustful, full of balm, Thou must breathe in spirits calm.
quotes.author: Caroline May

quotes.quote: Now in November nearer comes the sun down the abandoned heaven.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: November wind has a sound different from any other. It is easy to imagine the cave of the winds in some mythical Northland where the winds are born and the gods send them out to conquer the quiet air.
quotes.author: Gladys Taber

quotes.quote: Fallen leaves lying on the grass in the November sun bring more happiness than the daffodils.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Even when November's sun is low and Winter flaps his fleecy wings, Thy gold among his silvery snow a solace in the sadness brings.
quotes.author: James Rigg

quotes.quote: In November you begin to know how long the winter will be.
quotes.author: Martha Gellhorn

quotes.quote: It is the first day of November and so, today, someone will die.
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: There comes a time when people get tired of being pushed out of the glittering sunlight of life's July and left standing amid the piercing chill of an alpine November.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Welcome sweet November, the season of senses and my favorite month of all.
quotes.author: Gregory F. Lenz

quotes.quote: The river this November afternoon / Rests in an equipoise of sun and cloud: / A glooming light, a gleaming darkness shroud / Its passage. All seems tranquil, all in tune.
quotes.author: Cecil Day-Lewis

quotes.quote: November always seems to me the Norway of the year.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: November’s sky is chill and drear, / November’s leaf is red and sear.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: November at its best—with a sort of delightful menace in the air.
quotes.author: Anne Bosworth Greene

quotes.quote: The wind that makes music in November corn is in a hurry. The stalks hum, the loose husks whisk skyward in half-playing swirls, and the wind hurries on... A tree tries to argue, bare limbs waving, but there is no detaining the wind.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: I... invite my fellow-citizens in every part of the United States, and also those who are at sea and those who are sojourning in foreign lands, to set apart and observe the last Thursday of November next as a day of thanksgiving and praise to our beneficent Father who dwelleth in the heavens.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The womb is not a clock / nor a bell tolling, / but in the eleventh month of its life / I feel the November / of the body as well as of the calendar. / In two days it will be my birthday / and as always the earth is done with its harvest.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: This is the month of nuts and nutty thoughts,—that November whose name sounds so bleak and cheerless. Perhaps its harvest of thought is worth more than all the other crops of the year.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: October is the month for painted leaves. Their rich glow now flashes round the world. As fruits and leaves and the day itself acquire a bright tint just before they fall, so the year near its setting. October is its sunset sky; November the later twilight.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Spring is brown; summer, green; autumn, yellow; winter, white; November, gray.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Autumn I love thy latter end to view / In cold Novembers days so bleak and bare / When like life's dwindld thread worn nearly thro / Wi lingering pottering pace and head bleach'd bare / Thou like an old man bids the world adieu.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: Whatever you love, do it now. Time is not on your side.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The beginning is always now.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: There is no moment more precious than the exact moment they are living. And that exact moment has a lot to do with how future moments play out.
quotes.author: Obert Skye

quotes.quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Even if yesterday existed, today is just real, not a fantasy like the past.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: There will never be any more perfection than there is now.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: You can dance in the storm. Don't wait for the rain to be over before because it might take too long. You can can do it now. Wherever you are, right now, you can start, right now; this very moment.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: In this moment, there is plenty of time. In this moment, you are precisely as you should be. In this moment, there is infinite possibility.
quotes.author: Victoria Moran

quotes.quote: The world is in your hands, now use it.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.quote: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes.quote: The time for action is now. It's never too late to do something.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Our attention is in the moment; we are not afraid of the future or ashamed of the past.
quotes.author: José Luis Ruiz

quotes.quote: Eternity is not something that begins after you're dead. It is going on all the time. We are in it now.
quotes.author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quotes.quote: You are not meant to serve time. Time is meant to serve you. Become the master of your now.
quotes.author: E'yen A. Gardner

quotes.quote: Think of what is and don't let what might have been distract you.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: It will always be now. Still tomorrow will come. If we do our best now, tomorrow will be better.
quotes.author: Brent M. Jones

quotes.quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: The real enemies of our life are the 'oughts' and the 'ifs.' They pull us backward into the unalterable past and forward into the unpredictable future. But real life takes place in the here and now.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: The future is an infinite succession of presents, and to live now as we think human beings should live, in defiance of all that is bad around us, is itself a marvelous victory.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: The past is a ghost, the future a dream, and all we ever have is now.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Planning is bringing the future into the present so that you can do something about it now.
quotes.author: Alan Lakein

quotes.quote: Live in the now and the how will take care of itself.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: Fear keeps us focused on the past or worried about the future. If we can acknowledge our fear, we can realize that right now we are okay. Right now, today, we are still alive, and our bodies are working marvelously. Our eyes can still see the beautiful sky. Our ears can still hear the voices of our loved ones.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The future is now. The past is now. Your influence is always now.
quotes.author: L.H.

quotes.quote: Today is yours to shape. Create a masterpiece!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Now is now. There is nothing but now... This, right here, is all there is.
quotes.author: Nic Sheff

quotes.quote: At that time my notions of nuclear power were utterly idyllic. At school and at the university we'd been taught that this was a magical factory that made 'energy out of nothing,' where people in white robes sat and pushed buttons. Chernobyl blew up when we weren't prepared.
quotes.author: Svetlana Alexievich

quotes.quote: If stupid hippies hadn't killed nuclear power, we'd have nuclear power plants, safer and cheaper than coal-fired plants, all over, and electric cars really would be zero emissions.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: I dispute the point that nuclear energy is 'clean' and 'cost-effective'. As I recall, when we first harnessed nuclear power it was to drop an atom bomb on a civilian population, not to save the environment.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: The mother can use a knife in the kitchen to chop vegetables and make a healthy meal, but if you give a knife to a child and the child accidentally injures himself, is it the fault of the knife! The same is with us humans and our nukes. Developing nukes is part of the external progress that I just mentioned a while ago, whereas being aware of how to use them would require internal progress, which unfortunately is happening at the speed of a turtle, because almost all humans have quite childishly accepted external progress to be the ultimate progress of humanity.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: For 50 years, nuclear power stations have produced three products which only a lunatic could want: bomb-explosive plutonium, lethal radioactive waste and electricity so dear it has to be heavily subsidised. They leave to future generations the task, and most of the cost, of making safe sites that have been polluted half-way to eternity.
quotes.author: James Buchan

quotes.quote: All the waste in a year from a nuclear power plant can be stored under a desk.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The oil companies regard nuclear power as their rival, who will reduce their profits, so they put out a lot of disinformation about nuclear power.
quotes.author: James Lovelock

quotes.quote: If nuclear power plants are safe, let the commerical insurance industry insure them. Until these most expert judges of risk are willing to gamble with their money, I'm not willing to gamble with the health and safety of my family.
quotes.author: Donna Reed

quotes.quote: With a fourth generation of nuclear power, you can have a technology that will burn more than 99 percent of the energy in the fuel. It would mean that you don't need to mine uranium for the next thousand years.
quotes.author: James Hansen

quotes.quote: A nuclear power reactor is just a fancy way of boiling water.
quotes.author: Leslie Dewan

quotes.quote: We must not let ourselves be swept off our feet in horror at the danger of nuclear power. Nuclear power is not infinitely dangerous. It's just dangerous, much as coal mines, petrol repositories, fossil-fuel burning and wind turbines are dangerous.
quotes.author: David J.C. MacKay

quotes.quote: I think there's something really poetic about using nuclear power to propel us to the stars, because the stars are giant fusion reactors. They're giant nuclear cauldrons in the sky.
quotes.author: Taylor Wilson

quotes.quote: Every dollar spent on nuclear is one less dollar spent on clean renewable energy and one more dollar spent on making the world a comparatively dirtier and a more dangerous place, because nuclear power and nuclear weapons go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Mark Z. Jacobson

quotes.quote: Humanity has nearly suffocated the globe with carbon dioxide, yet nuclear power plants that produce no such emissions are so mired in objections and obstruction that, despite renewed interest on every continent, it is unlikely another will be built in the United States.
quotes.author: Michael Specter

quotes.quote: We must learn to set our emotions aside and embrace what science tells us. GMOs and nuclear power are two of the most effective and most important green technologies we have. If—after looking at the data—you aren't in favour of using them responsibly, you aren't an environmentalist.
quotes.author: Ramez Naam

quotes.quote: One thing you can say about nuclear power: the people who believe it is the silver bullet for America's energy problems never give up.
quotes.author: Jeff Goodell

quotes.quote: Nuclear energy people perceive the greenhouse effect as a fresh wind blowing at their back.
quotes.author: Steward Udall

quotes.quote: Nuclear is ideal for dealing with climate change, because it is the only carbon-free, scalable energy source that’s available 24 hours a day.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Half the people that were out there saying 'No nukes' and 'Shut down the power plants' are now realizing that, some would say, nuclear is the best way to go for energy for the future. So I think it's natural to reexamine your beliefs as you age up.
quotes.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quotes.quote: If we are serious about replacing fossil fuels, we are going to need nuclear power, so the choice is stark: We can keep on merely talking about a carbon-free world, or we can go ahead and create one.
quotes.author: Peter Thiel

quotes.quote: Given this challenge we face today, and given the progress of fourth generation nuclear: go for it. No other alternative, zero emissions.
quotes.author: John Kerry

quotes.quote: I would like nuclear fusion to become a practical power source. It would provide an inexhaustible supply of energy, without pollution or global warming.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Of all the failed technologies that litter the onward march of science—steam carriages, zeppelins, armoured trains—none has been so catastrophic to prosperity as the last century's attempt to generate electricity from nuclear fission.
quotes.author: James Buchan

quotes.quote: Why would you want to shut down a nuclear plant, which requires at most about 1 square mile of land, to replace that power source with windmills, which would require 300 square miles of land to be paved over?
quotes.author: Stephen Moore

quotes.quote: To power the country by building 186,000 fifty-story wind turbines - and running 19,000 miles of new transmission lines - just seems impractical and preposterous compared to the idea of building a hundred new nuclear facilities primarily on the sites we already have.
quotes.author: Lamar Alexander

quotes.quote: I really have become convinced that nuclear fusion is our energy future. It's so powerful. I mean, it is the power of the stars. If we could bring that down to the laboratory and to the power plant on Earth, that would be an incredible thing.
quotes.author: Taylor Wilson

quotes.quote: Our reactor actually burns nuclear waste as fuel. So not only is it safe and powerful, it solves an important issue: It actually reduces nuclear waste instead of creating. It's the reactor of your dreams.
quotes.author: Nathan Myhrvold

quotes.quote: The sun doesn't shine at night, and wind power is highly variable. To meet our emissions goals, we're going to have to grasp every arrow in the quiver, and nuclear is one of those arrows.
quotes.author: Burton Richter

quotes.quote: When the world has 1,000, 2,000, 3,000 nuclear plants, can we call that a safe world? I think we need to properly have this debate.
quotes.author: Naoto Kan

quotes.quote: It's ridiculous that time and time again we need a radioactive cloud coming out of a nuclear power-station to remind us that atomic energy is extraordinarily dangerous.
quotes.author: Pierre Schaeffer

quotes.quote: Nudity isn't in appearance, it's in thoughts.
quotes.author: Amol Gade

quotes.quote: The most boring thing in the entire world isÂ nudity. The second most boring thing is honesty.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The best contraceptive for old people is nudity.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: The beauty of a naked body is felt only by the dressed races.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: Nudity is a problem for Americans. It disrupts our social exchange.
quotes.author: Eric Fischl

quotes.quote: NudityÂ is the costume of lovers and corpses.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: SometimesÂ nudityÂ is sexy. Sometimes it's not. Sometimes being clothed is more sexy than being nude.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.quote: Woman'sÂ nudityÂ is wiser than the philosopher's teachings.
quotes.author: Max Ernst

quotes.quote: The nude, if you tackle it, is a very fascinating subject, especially for a woman.
quotes.author: Isabel Bishop

quotes.quote: Complete nudity in itself is not erotic. It becomes so only when preceeded by or contrasted to a state of dress. In this limited context then, all clothes become somewhat immoral, if we define immorality as inciting sexual interest. Habitual nakedness may indeed be capable of elevating man to a higher mental plane.
quotes.author: Lucy Irvine

quotes.quote: There's nothing unclassy about being naked, if it's appropriate.
quotes.author: Danica Mckellar

quotes.quote: Nudity is not vulgar, else we were not born nude.
quotes.author: Anuup Kamal Agrawal

quotes.quote: NudityÂ quickly becomes unremarkable when generally practiced.
quotes.author: Martha C. Nussbaum

quotes.quote: There are few nudities so objectionable as the naked truth.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: The nudity of that feminine body had risen into her face, the body had reabsorbed it, as nature reabsorbs forsaken gardens.
quotes.author: Robert Bresson

quotes.quote: NudityÂ is undignified and an error of taste.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: The nude does not simply represent the body, but relates it, by analogy, to all structures that have become part of our imaginative experience.Â
quotes.author: Kenneth Clark

quotes.quote: Naked is a human commodity. Nudity is God's art.Â
quotes.author: David Allio

quotes.quote: There's the theory thatÂ nudityÂ doesn't really make something sexy; the characters and their relationship make it sexy.
quotes.author: Tim Robbins

quotes.quote: NudityÂ is a state of fact; lewdity, to coin a phrase, is a state of mind
quotes.author: Paul Outerbridge

quotes.quote: The nakedness of woman is the work of God.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Nakedness reveals itself.Â NudityÂ is placed on display. The nude is condemned to never being naked.Â NudityÂ is a form of dress.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: A naked woman in heels is a beautiful thing. A naked man in shoes looks like a fool.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: Nakedness is uncomely, as well in mind as body, and it addeth no small reverence to men's manners and actions if they be not altogether open. Therefore set it down: That a habit of secrecy is both politic and moral.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: NudityÂ is who people are at the most interesting point of the evening, when they take off their protective layer, when no one is watching.
quotes.author: Bridget Fonda

quotes.quote: NudityÂ is just about your body. It's easier to shut yourself off outside than reveal your inner thoughts.
quotes.author: Erica Durance

quotes.quote: HerÂ nudityÂ is her armor. It blinded the drooling fools. They couldn't see anything else while they saw her body.
quotes.author: Brent Weeks

quotes.quote: In the city,Â nudityÂ means something; in the wild, it just exists.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Too muchÂ nudityÂ is a turn off. Especially if all that flesh is on one person.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: SometimesÂ nudityÂ is gratuitous. We just live in a society where everything goes.
quotes.author: Judi Dench

quotes.quote: Constant attention by a good nurse may be just as important as a major operation by a surgeon.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Nurses are the heart of healthcare.
quotes.author: Donna Wilk Cardillo

quotes.quote: The trained nurse has become one of the great blessings of humanity, taking a place beside the physician and the priest.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: Nurses dispense comfort, compassion, and caring without even a prescription.
quotes.author: Val Saintsbury

quotes.quote: When I think about all the patients and their loved ones that I have worked with over the years, I know most of them don't remember me nor I them. But I do know that I gave a little piece of myself to each of them and they to me and those threads make up the beautiful tapestry in my mind that is my career in nursing.
quotes.author: Donna Wilk Cardillo

quotes.quote: In its basic form, nursing can be seen as a duty, but beyond the incessant operational activities that lay the foundation of our daily work, the profession is all about grace. Helping people is a noble calling. It is a privilege to serve my fellow human beings. Fifteen years has seen many ups and downs at the workplace, but I have enjoyed serving the many patients who come into my care, and have prayed for the souls of those who were on the brink of death.
quotes.author: Katherine Soh

quotes.quote: As a nurse, we have the opportunity to heal the heart, mind, soul and body of our patients, their families and ourselves. They may not remember your name but they will never forget the way you made them feel.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Nurses have come a long way in a few short decades. In the past our attention focused on physical, mental and emotional healing. Now we talk of healing your life, healing the environment, and healing the planet.
quotes.author: Lynn Keegan

quotes.quote: Nurses: one of the few blessings of being ill.
quotes.author: Sara Moss-Wolfe

quotes.quote: A nurse will always give us hope, an angel with a stethoscope.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: It would not be possible to praise nurses too highly.
quotes.author: Stephen Ambrose

quotes.quote: To do what nobody else will do, a way that nobody else can do, in spite of all we go through; is to be a nurse
quotes.author: Rawsi Williams

quotes.quote: Nursing is an art: and if it is to be made an art, it requires an exclusive devotion as hard a preparation, as any painter's or sculptor's work; for what is the having to do with dead canvas or dead marble, compared with having to do with the living body, the temple of God's spirit? It is one of the Fine Arts: I had almost said, the finest of Fine Arts.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: Our job as nurses is to cushion the sorrow and celebrate the joy, everyday, while we are "just doing our jobs."
quotes.author: Christine Belle

quotes.quote: How can anybody hate nurses? Nobody hates nurses. The only time you hate a nurse is when they're giving you an enema.
quotes.author: Warren Beatty

quotes.quote: ... as a nurse, it's important to look calm on the surface when you're absolutely crapping yourself inside. So, if someone is waving a machete at you, which has happened to me when I was a nurse, it's important to make that person feel that you're in control.
quotes.author: Jo Brand

quotes.quote: No man, not even a doctor, ever gives any other definition of what a nurse should be than this - 'devoted and obedient.' This definition would do just as well for a porter. It might even do for a horse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: It is the nurse that the child first hears, and her words that he will first attempt to imitate.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: Nursing would be a dream job if there were no doctors.
quotes.author: Gehrard Kocher

quotes.quote: Save one life, and you're a hero. Save a hundred lives, and you're a nurse.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Panic plays no part in the training of a nurse.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kenny

quotes.quote: Being a nurse means to hold all your own tears and start drawing smiles on people's faces.
quotes.author: Dana Basem

quotes.quote: Bound by paperwork, short on hands, sleep, and energy, nurses are rarely short on caring.
quotes.author: Sharon Hudacek

quotes.quote: Nurses may not be angels but they are the next best thing.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: The character of the nurse is as important as the knowledge she possesses.
quotes.author: Carolyn Jarvis

quotes.quote: Caring is the essence of nursing.
quotes.author: Leninger

quotes.quote: Some people think that doctors and nurses can put scrambled eggs back in the shell.
quotes.author: Cass Canfield

quotes.quote: Treat the patient, not the X-ray.
quotes.author: James M. Hunter

quotes.quote: The most important practical lesson than can be given to nurses is to teach them what to observe.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: The hospital will never be healthy for patients if it's not a healthy environment for nurses, where their voices are heard and where they can care for their patients and use the full extent of their knowledge, abilities, and skills. After all, hospitals today have become one big intensive care unit: all patients need intensive caring.
quotes.author: Tilda Shalof

quotes.quote: Nurses are humans by birth and heroes by choice.
quotes.author: Renee Thompson

quotes.quote: It may seem a strange principle to enunciate as the very first requirement in a Hospital that it should do the sick no harm.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: Every nurse was drawn to nursing because of a desire to care to serve or to help.
quotes.author: Christina Feist Hellmeir

quotes.quote: The character of the nurse is as important as the knowledge she possesses.
quotes.author: Carolyn Jarvis

quotes.quote: It would not be possible to praises nurses too highly.
quotes.author: Stephen Ambrose

quotes.quote: The trained nurse has become one of the great blessings of humanity, taking a place beside the physician and the priest.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: Caring is the essence of nursing.
quotes.author: Jean Watson

quotes.quote: If love can't cure it, nurses can.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nurses dispense comfort, compassion, and caring without even a prescription.
quotes.author: Val Saintsbury

quotes.quote: Nurses are the heart of healthcare.
quotes.author: Donna Wilk Cardillo

quotes.quote: Being a nurse means to hold all your own tears and start drawing smiles on people's faces.
quotes.author: Dana Basem

quotes.quote: Some people think that doctors and nurses can put scrambled eggs back into the shell.
quotes.author: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

quotes.quote: A nurse will always give us hope, an angel with a stethoscope.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: Always thank your nurse. Sometimes they're the only one between you and a hearse.
quotes.author: Warren Beatty

quotes.quote: Every nurse is angel with a key for healthy community. All in caring for patients is part of nursing soul.
quotes.author: Aleksandar Radenovi

quotes.quote: Being in contact with physicians and family members, in addition to the sick, you become, in hospitals, in healthcare facilities and in homes, the crossroads of a thousand relationships, which require attention, competence and compassion. Before the uniqueness of each situation, indeed, it is never enough to follow a protocol, but a constant (and tiresome) effort of discernment and attention to the individual person is required. All this makes your profession a veritable mission and makes you ‘experts in humanity.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Nurses are key to achieving not just the health-related Sustainable Development Goals, but all the Sustainable Development Goals. Nurses are the foundation of our ambition to universal health coverage. That’s what we should believe. Your role in transforming our health systems to ensure everyone can lead healthy and productive lives is indispensable – and everybody should know that.
quotes.author: Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus

quotes.quote: Nurses can be direct and objective, even stern. They can be sympathetic and appreciative. They are, by nature and training, consoling and caring. Compassion defines and motivates them. They set high standards for themselves and constantly strive to meet them. It is no wonder that our patients trust them and that we depend on them.
quotes.author: Bill Robertson

quotes.quote: No man, not even a doctor, ever gives any other definition of what a nurse should be than this—"devoted and obedient." This definition would do just as well for a porter. It might even do for a horse. It would not do for a policeman.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: She is a 'ministering angel' without any exaggeration in these hospitals, and as her slender form glides quietly along each corridor ... she may be observed alone, with a little lamp in her hand, making her solitary rounds.
quotes.author: John Cameron Macdonald

quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this—I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: Nursing is not for everyone. It takes a very strong, intelligent, and compassionate person to take on the ills of the world with passion and purpose, and work to maintain the health and well-being of the planet. No wonder we're exhausted at the end of the day.
quotes.author: Donna Cardillo

quotes.quote: As a nurse, we have the opportunity to heal the heart, mind, soul and body of our patients, their families and ourselves. They may not remember your name but they will never forget the way you made them feel.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Reminder: Nurses are skilled in problem-solving, organizing, planning, and analyzing. We're detail oriented, innovative, and resourceful. We're both analytical and creative. Give us a job that needs to be done, and we get it done with the time and resources available, regardless of how scarce. And talk about managing multiple priorities — nurses are masters at this.
quotes.author: Donna Cardillo

quotes.quote: What we need at this time in history is 3 million Florence Nightingales on steroids. We need nurse advocates; nurse members of Congress; nurses running for local and state office; nurse journalists; nurse truth-tellers; nurse filmmakers; and nurses willing to be assertive, outspoken, and unafraid to speak their truth.
quotes.author: Keith Carlson

quotes.quote: Rejoice in your work; never lose sight of the nursing leader you are now and the nursing leader you will become.
quotes.author: Dr. S. Fitzsimons

quotes.quote: Somehow our knowledge of the biosciences and of medical and nursing research, our critical thinking skills, our role in initiating interventions that promote healing and prevent complications, our ability to navigate complex organizational systems and to communicate with people in crisis—all of this seems still to be largely invisible.
quotes.author: Shawn Kennedy

quotes.quote: Do you believe any children survive? / I wonder if you wanna stay alive / And I wonder if you feel this gift / If you have to work a thirty-six hour shift / But I wonder now when you'll understand / When the woman in white comes to take your hand / And you put your heart, and I think you know / That a nurse's life is full of woe.
quotes.author: Stephen William Bragg

quotes.quote: Call the nurse / Call the nurse / I'm in pain, I'm in pain / Everything hurts / Vital signs / In horizontal lines / I'm lyin' here / Lying here / Outta my mind / Nurse Betty / Well she tore my heart apart, yeah / Turned my life into an episode of ER, and / Everybody likes drama / But it's too much for me.
quotes.author: Phil Thornalley

quotes.quote: As dropping moisture on December flowers, / As sunlight breaking o'er the August plain, / As shines the Virgin on the midnight hours, / So is thy presence at the bed of pain; / And as the flowers revive to bloom more fair, / And o'er the plain the wattles burst in fire, / And midnight hours to morn at last repair, / So hope and life thy minist'rings inspire; / And though for me there's but the life and hope / That lie abundant past the gates of Death, / Yet thither as with feeble steps I grope / Thy friendly arm assists my failing breath; / Nor will I deem of Providence the worse / Who sent me pain to send me thee for nurse.
quotes.author: William Gay

quotes.quote: Nursing care comes in many forms. Sometimes it is the ability to make someone feel physically comfortable by various means. Other times it is the ability to improve the body's ability to achieve or maintain health. But often it is an uncanny yet well honed knack to see beyond the obvious and address, in some way, the deeper needs of the human soul.
quotes.author: Donna Wilk Cardillo

quotes.quote: As a nurse, we have the opportunity to heal the heart, mind, soul and body of our patients, their families and ourselves. They may forget your name, but they will never forget how you made them feel.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Nurses are the hospitality of the hospital.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: Let us never consider ourselves finished nurses. We must be learning all of our lives.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: Nursing is not for everyone. It takes a very strong, intelligent, and compassionate person to take on the ills of the world with passion and purpose and work to maintain the health and well-being of the planet. No wonder we're exhausted at the end of the day!
quotes.author: Donna Wilk Cardillo

quotes.quote: How can anybody hate nurses? Nobody hates nurses. The only time you hate a nurse is when they're giving you an enema.
quotes.author: Warren Beatty

quotes.quote: No man, not even a doctor, ever gives any other definition of what a nurse should be than this â€“ 'devoted and obedient.' This definition would do just as well for a porter. It might even do for a horse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: Nurses: one of the few blessings of being ill.
quotes.author: Sara Moss-Wolfe

quotes.quote: A nurse is compassion in scrubs.
quotes.author: Lexie Saige

quotes.quote: The doctors may be mapping out the war games, but it is the nurses who make the conflict bearable.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: A nurse will always give us hope, an angel with a stethoscope.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Nurses are there when the last breath is taken and nurses are there when the first breath is taken. Although it is more enjoyable to celebrate the birth, it is just as important to comfort in death.
quotes.author: Christine Bell

quotes.quote: Being a nurse means to hold all your own tears and start drawing smiles on people's faces.
quotes.author: Dana Basem

quotes.quote: Every nurse is an angel with a key for healthy community! All in caring for patients is part of nursing soul!
quotes.author: Alexsandar Radunovic

quotes.quote: Rejoice in your work; never lose sight of the nursing leader you are now and the nursing leader you will become.
quotes.author: Sue Fitzsimons

quotes.quote: To do what nobody else will do, in a way that nobody else can, in spite of all we go through; is to be a nurse.
quotes.author: Rawsi Williams

quotes.quote: The nurses were all angels in my eyes.
quotes.author: Randy Castillo

quotes.quote: It would not be possible to praise nurses too highly.
quotes.author: Stephen Ambrose

quotes.quote: When you're a nurse you know that every day you will touch a life or a life will touch yours.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Nurses are the heart of healthcare.
quotes.author: Donna Wilk Cardillo

quotes.quote: Our job as nurses is to cushion the sorrow and celebrate the job, everyday, while we are just doing our jobs.
quotes.author: Christine Belle

quotes.quote: Nurses serve their patients in the most important capacities. We know that they serve as our first lines of communication when something goes wrong or when we are concerned about health.
quotes.author: Lois Capps

quotes.quote: The character of a nurse is just as important as the knowledge he/she possesses.
quotes.author: Carolyn Jarvis

quotes.quote: Some people think that doctors and nurses can put scrambled eggs back in the shell.
quotes.author: Cass Canfield

quotes.quote: Whether a person is a male or female, a nurse is a nurse.
quotes.author: Gary Veale

quotes.quote: God appoints our graces to be nurses to other men's weaknesses.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Caring is the essence of nursing.
quotes.author: Jean Watson

quotes.quote: Nurses are a unique kind. They have this insatiable need to care for others, which is both their biggest strength and fatal flaw.
quotes.author: Dr. Jean Watson

quotes.quote: For too long nurses have been undervalued, restricted in what they could do, with too few career opportunities in clinical practice. For far too long, nurses have endured a pay system that has held them back â€“ both professionally as well as financially.
quotes.author: John Hutton

quotes.quote: Constant attention by a good nurse may be just as important as a major operation by a surgeon.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: There is more hunger for love and appreciation in this world than for bread.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: To expect too much is to have a sentimental view of life and this is a softness that ends in bitterness.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: Bitterness is like cancer. It eats upon the host. But anger is like fire. It burns it all clean.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Those who cannot work with their hearts achieve but a hollow, half-hearted success that breeds bitterness all around.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: It is hardly possible to build anything if frustration, bitterness and a mood of helplessness prevail.
quotes.author: Lech Walesa

quotes.quote: Bitterness and resentment only hurt one person, and it's not the person we're resenting - it's us.
quotes.author: Alana Stewart

quotes.quote: If you're betrayed, release disappointment at once.By that way, the bitterness has no time to take root.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: It weren't too loo long before I seen something in me, had changed. A bitter seed was planted inside of me. And I just didn't feel so, accepting, anymore.
quotes.author: Kathryn Stockett

quotes.quote: There is no disappointment so numbing...as someone no better than you achieving more.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.quote: Bitterness: anger that forgot where it came from.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: It is okay of talking about the past, as long as there's no bitterness and anger. It only gives you a heart attack. It won't change the past either.
quotes.author: Ann Marie Aguilar

quotes.quote: Things don't go wrong and break so you can become bitter and give up. They happen to break you down and build you up so you can be all that you were intended to be.
quotes.author: Charlie Jones

quotes.quote: As I walked out the door toward the gate that would lead to my freedom, I knew if I didn't leave my bitterness and hatred behind, I'd still be in prison.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Years of love have been forgot, In the hatred of a minute.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is a promise not a feeling. When you forgive other people, you are making a promise not to use their past sin against them.
quotes.author: Jay Adams

quotes.quote: He gave everything to everybody. Except to me.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the key that unlocks the door of resentment and the handcuffs of hate. It is a power that breaks the chains of bitterness and the shackles of selfishness.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: The bitterness of poor quality is remembered long after the sweetness of low price has faded from memory.
quotes.author: Aldo Gucci

quotes.quote: Bitterness imprisons life; love releases it
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: An evidence that our will has been broken is that we begin to thank God for that which once seemed so bitter, knowing that His will is good and that, in His time and in His way, He is able to make the most bitter waters sweet.
quotes.author: Nancy Leigh Demoss

quotes.quote: The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: It's quite highly possible that I have peaked. I mean, I just can't imagine what else I could do beyond this. It's really a bittersweet kind of feeling.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: I do not want to choose which one of you I must love or hate. Here, I am free to do neither. I want no part of your bitterness.
quotes.author: Patricia A. Mckillip

quotes.quote: Never succumb to the temptation of bitterness.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Bitterness is like drinking poison and waiting for the other person to die
quotes.author: Steve Ostten

quotes.quote: It is better to live in peace than in bitterness and strife.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the key that unlocks the door of resentment and the handcuffs of hate. It is a power that breaks the chains of bitterness and the shackles of selfishness.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Bitterness and resentment only hurt one person, and it's not the person we're resenting-it's us.
quotes.author: Alana Stewart

quotes.quote: Hurt leads to bitterness, bitterness to anger, travel too far that road and the way is lost.
quotes.author: Terry Brooks

quotes.quote: Don't nurture a sense of guilt; rather, nurture a sense of responsibility married with a sense of humility.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: If you nurture your mind, body, and spirit, your time will expand. You will gain a new perspective that will allow you to accomplish much more.
quotes.author: Brian Koslow

quotes.quote: Nurture your great spirit for a great self.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Learn to nurture and trust your instincts as well as your conscious reasoning. Often, one's instincts will offer the better judgment.
quotes.author: Ken Danby

quotes.quote: You cannot create genius. All you can do is nurture it.
quotes.author: Ninette de Valois

quotes.quote: Each one of us has a natural instinct to rise, like a flame of the lamp. Lets nurture this instinct.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: We must nurture tolerance, collective wisdom, and democracy.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: To nurture a garden is to feed not just on the body, but the soul.
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: Always be on the lookout for ways to turn a problem into an opportunity for success. Always be on the lookout for ways to nurture your dream.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: We nurture our creativity when we release our inner child. Let it run and roam free. It will take you on a brighter journey.
quotes.author: Serina Hartwell

quotes.quote: We must recognize and nurture the creative parts of each other without always understanding what will be created.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Nature is a definite thing. But nurture is just as powerful. It can really mess with you.
quotes.author: Henry Cavill

quotes.quote: Nurture your own confidence and make it real; don't pretend to be someone you're not.
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: The more you nurture a feeling of loving kindness, the happier and calmer you will be.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Let us nurture the practice of family values, by embracing policies that value families.
quotes.author: Benjamin Jealous

quotes.quote: If you nurture Life, Life will nurture you.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: We all nurture impulses which promise freedom from the demands of others, even if that freedom means death.
quotes.author: Sam Tanenhaus

quotes.quote: Nurture doubt as a creative strategy.
quotes.author: Joshua L. Goldberg

quotes.quote: Nurture your minds with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: We must nurture and love, if life is to have any real meaning. But First we must find a way to survive against the things that prevent us from doing so.
quotes.author: Terry Brooks

quotes.quote: Nurture strength of spirit to shield you in sudden misfortune. But do not distress yourself with imaginings. Many fears are born of fatigue and loneliness.
quotes.author: Max Ehrmann

quotes.quote: You must nurture the force within you. You are the only person that can behold the divine force for your divine purpose.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Nurture the spontaneous peaceful life.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: People who continue to nurture long-term and new friendships as they grow older are more likely to enjoy health and vitality.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
quotes.author: Michael Murdock

quotes.quote: To nurture your career, it makes sense to cultivate your strengths. To nurture your moral core, it is necessary to confront your weaknesses.
quotes.author: David Brooks

quotes.quote: My hope is that we continue to nurture the places that we love, but that we also look outside our immediate worlds.
quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

quotes.quote: Nurture the qualities in yourself that you desire in your friends.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: For good nurture and education implant good constitutions.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Great coaches are visionaries. Great coaches instill, nurture, and encourage vision, then model and motivate surrender to it.
quotes.author: Thomas G. Bandy

quotes.quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: To eat is a necessity, but to eat intelligently is an art.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Our bodies are our gardens, to which our wills are our gardeners.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Diet is the essential key to all successful healing.
quotes.author: Joseph Raynauld Raymond

quotes.quote: Tell me what you eat, and I will tell you who you are.
quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Life is a tragedy of nutrition.
quotes.author: Arnold Ehret

quotes.quote: Nutrition is the only remedy that can bring full recovery and can be used with any treatment. Remember, food is our best medicine!
quotes.author: Bernard Jensen

quotes.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Your body is a temple, but only if you treat it as one.
quotes.author: Astrid Alauda

quotes.quote: Even in this high-tech age, the low-tech plant continues to be the key to nutrition and health.
quotes.author: Jack Weatherford

quotes.quote: One should eat to live; not live to eat.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you've got a kingdom.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: The food you eat can be either the safest and most powerful form of medicine or the slowest form of poison.
quotes.author: Ann Wigmore

quotes.quote: When in doubt, use nutrition first.
quotes.author: Roger Williams

quotes.quote: We are indeed much more than what we eat, but what we eat can nevertheless help us to be much more than what we are.
quotes.author: Adelle Davis

quotes.quote: Today more than 95% of all chronic disease is caused by food choice, toxic food ingredients, nutritional deficiencies, and lack of physical exercise.
quotes.author: Mike Adams

quotes.quote: Any food that requires enhancing by the use of chemical substances should in no way be considered a food.
quotes.author: John H. Tobe

quotes.quote: The best and most efficient pharmacy is within your own system.
quotes.author: Robert C. Peale

quotes.quote: Fake food—I mean those patented substances chemically flavored and mechanically bulked out to kill the appetite and deceive the gut—is unnatural, almost immoral, a bane to good eating and good cooking.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: I'm a product of good nutrition, cutting edge supplementation and hard training, and I'm an old guy.
quotes.author: Warren Cuccurullo

quotes.quote: Health food makes me sick.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: When it comes to eating, you can sometimes help yourself more by helping yourself less.
quotes.author: Richard Armour

quotes.quote: One man’s poison ivy is another man’s spinach.
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: Plain fare gives as much pleasure as a costly diet, while bread and water confer the highest possible pleasure when they are brought to hungry lips.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Food is an important part of a balanced diet.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Old people shouldn’t eat health foods. They need all the preservatives they can get.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: If we could give every individual the right amount of nourishment and exercise, not too little and not too much, we would have the safest way to health.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Managing perfect body weight is not a complicated rocket science. Our body is made up of food which we eat during our day to day life. If we are overweight or obese at the moment then one thing is certain that the food which we eat is unhealthy.
quotes.author: Subodh Gupta

quotes.quote: New York is a city with virtually no habitable public space - only private spaces expensively maintained within the general disaster.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: One's life and passion may be elsewhere, but New York is where you prove if what you think in theory makes sense in life.
quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

quotes.quote: It is often said that New York is a city for only the very rich and the very poor. It is less often said that New York is also, at least for those of us who came there from somewhere else, a city for only the very young.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: New York is to the nation what the white church spire is to the village - the visible symbol of aspiration and faith, the white plume saying the way is up!
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: I think New York is not the cultural center of America, but the business and administrative center of American culture.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: New York is like that perfect lover that just won't commit but he's so good that you hang around anyway, NYC is dreamy!
quotes.author: Bevy Smith

quotes.quote: New York is an exciting town where something is happening all the time, most unsolved.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: The great thing about living in New York is the constant change of things. It inspires me to keep moving, push forward, question ideas.
quotes.author: John Varvatos

quotes.quote: New York is the true capital of America. Every New Yorker knows it, and by God, we always shall.
quotes.author: Edward Rutherfurd

quotes.quote: The great city of New York wields more of the destinies of this great nation that five times the population of any other portion of the country.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: As a city, New York moves in the forefront of today's great trend of great cities toward neurosis. She is confused, self-pitying, helpless and dependent.
quotes.author: John Larnder

quotes.quote: New York remains what it has always been : a city of ebb and flow, a city of constant shifts of population and economics, a city of virtually no rest. It is harsh, dirty, and dangerous, it is whimsical and fanciful, it is beautiful and soaring - it is not one or another of these things but all of them, all at once, and to fail to accept this paradox is to deny the reality of city existence.
quotes.author: Paul Goldberger

quotes.quote: New York now leads the world's great cities in the number of people around whom you shouldn't make a sudden move.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: New York is appalling, fantastically charmless and elaborately dire.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: New York is the perfect place for a film festival because there's already so much energy and life here, and New Yorkers love movies.
quotes.author: Clark Gregg

quotes.quote: New York is a wonderful place to shoot. The bystanders are great. They are enthusiastic. They respect the process, and you get the energy of the city.
quotes.author: Jane Curtin

quotes.quote: The faces in New York remind me of people who played a game and lost.
quotes.author: Murray Kempton

quotes.quote: New york provides not only a continuing excitation but also a spectacle that is continuing.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: New York means so much to people. If you're inclined to leave the nest, New York is where most people think they have to go, and it's been that way since the first skyscraper.
quotes.author: Griffin Dunne

quotes.quote: New York is at once cosmopolitan and parochial, a compendium of sentimental certainties. It is in fact the most sentimental of the world's great cities â€“ in its self-congratulation a kind of San Francisco of the East.
quotes.author: John Gregory Dunne

quotes.quote: New York is the only city in the world where you can get deliberately run down on the sidewalk by a pedestrian.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.quote: New York is a great place to be fed in the arts. The arts in general are a large part of my life. The city was my postgraduate course.
quotes.author: Kathleen Battle

quotes.quote: One of the things you see in New York is that offices keep their lights on at night. They're proud of their building. Great. But they must find another way to be proud without draining energy.
quotes.author: Richard Rogers

quotes.quote: More than anything else New York is a city of superlatives, a place where the best, the brightest, the biggest is the norm.
quotes.author: Marilyn J. Appleberg

quotes.quote: New York is the biggest collection of villages in the world.
quotes.author: Alistair Cooke

quotes.quote: New York is the meeting place of the peoples, the only city where you can hardly find a typical American.
quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

quotes.quote: New York City is a great apartment hotel in which everyone lives and no one is at home.
quotes.author: Glenway Wescott

quotes.quote: New York had all the iridescence of the beginning of the world. The returning troops marched up Fifth Avenue and girls were instinctively drawn East and North toward them â€” this was the greatest nation and there was gala in the air.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: New York City is crazy and beautiful and really close to my heart, and I've always had dear friends here - family, actually, I would say.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: As for New York City, it is a place apart. There is not its match in any other country in the world.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck
